40001001	U Jesucristo uva' tiaal David, as tiaal u Abrahame' Aak unpajte. As ech vib'ii unq'a q'esla ib'aal Aak ile':
40001002	As ik'aol Abraham u Isaac; ik'aol u Isaac u Jacob; ik'aol u Jacob u Judá tuk' unq'a titz'in tatzike';
40001003	ik'aol u Judá u Fares tuk' u Zara. As Tamar ib'ii vitxutxe'. As ik'aol u Fares u Esrom ik'aol u Esrom u Aram;
40001004	ik'aol u Aram u Aminadab; ik'aol u Aminadab u Naasón; ik'aol u Naasón u Salmón;
40001005	ik'aol u Salmón u Booz. As itxutx u Booz u Rahab. Ik'aol u Booz u Obed. As itxutx u Obed u Rut. Ik'aol u Obed u Isaí;
40001006	ik'aol u Isaí u David uva' ok ijlenaalil. Ik'aol u David u Salomón. As itxutx u Salomón u ixoj uva' tixqelik u Urías.
40001007	Ik'aol u Salomón u Roboam; ik'aol u Roboam u Abías; ik'aol u Abías u Asa;
40001008	ik'aol u Asa u Josafat; ik'aol u Josafat u Joram; ik'aol u Joram u Uzías;
40001009	ik'aol u Uzías u Jotam; ik'aol u Jotam u Acaz; ik'aol u Acaz u Ezequías;
40001010	ik'aol u Ezequías u Manasés; ik'aol u Manasés u Amón; ik'aol u Amón u Josías.
40001011	As ech unb'iit teq'ol b'en unq'a tiaal Israel preexhuil tu u Babilonia, as ik'aol ve't u Josías u Jeconías tuk' unq'a titz'ine'.
40001012	Tul ma'tik ib'en ve't unq'a tiaal Israel preexhuil tu u Babilonia, as ik'aol ve't u Jeconías u Salatiel. As ik'aol u Salatiel u Zorobabel;
40001013	ik'aol u Zorobabel u Abiud; ik'aol u Abiud u Eliaquim; ik'aol u Eliaquim u Azor;
40001014	ik'aol u Azor u Sadoc; ik'aol u Sadoc u Aquim; ik'aol u Aquim u Eliud;
40001015	ik'aol u Eliud u Eleazar; ik'aol u Eleazar u Matán; ik'aol u Matán u Jacob;
40001016	ik'aol u Jacob u Xhu'l, vitzumel u Ma'le'. As a' u Ma'le' vitxutx u Jesús uva' Cristo.
40001017	As kaalaval jolol unq'a tiaal u Abraham uve' xe'tik tzan sti'. As a' ulkat ti' u David. Kaalavat jolte uve' xe'tik tzan ti' u David. As a' ulkat tul uva' sitxeypik b'en unq'a tiaal Israel preexhuil tu Babilonia. Kaalavat jolte tul siq'aavik ve't tzan unq'a tiaal Israel tu vitename'. As a' ulkat tul uva' stitz'eb' u Cristo.
40001018	Ech u titz'eb' u Jesucristo ile'. Tul k'ujlik ve't tzii ti' u Ma'le' tuk' u Xhu'le' ti' uva' la teq'o tib' cha'ma as tul ye'xnik teq'ot tib' cha'ma, as je' ve't ventasioon ti' u Ma'le', vitxutx u Jesúse', ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritue'.
40001019	As jikik chit itxumb'al u Xhu'le', vitzumel u Ma'le', vatz u Tiixhe'. As ye' nikat isa' u Xhu'le' teesal iq'ii u Ma'le' vatz unq'a tename'. Tal ve't je' u Xhu'le' ste uva' tu kuxh isuuchil la taq' ve't kan u Xhu'le' u Ma'le'.
40001020	Tul uva' nikat ib'an ve't je' u Xhu'le' tivi', as ul tal ve't uma'l u ángel ste tivatzik'. As ech tal u ángel ile': «Axh Xhu'l, tiaal David, ye' kuxh xo'v axh ti' eeq'ot eeb' tuk' u Ma'le', tan a' u Tiixhla Espíritue' kat ul aq'on kan ventasioon sti'.
40001021	As la til ve't ixoj uma'l u ne'. As tul la itz'eb'i, as Jesús ib'ii u ne'e' la eb'ane', tan a'e' la q'alpun vitename' vatz vipaave',» ti'k u ángel tal te u Xhu'le'.
40001022	As ech kat ib'an ve'te' eche' uva' tal kan u Kub'aal Tiixhe' ta'n u q'ajsan tetz viyole' tul uva' ech tal Aak ile':
40001023	La je' ventasioon ti' uma'l u q'opo ixoj. As la til ixoj uma'l u ne'. As tul la oksal ib'ii u ne'e', as Emanuel ib'ii la ib'ane', ti'k viyol u Tiixhe' uva' tal kan.  As a' isuuchil u yole' uva' Emanuel tu kuyolb'al: Ate' u Tiixhe' sqi'.
40001024	Tul ul taama u Xhu'le' ta'n vivatzik'e', as inima ve't u Xhu'le' kam uva' tal u ángel ste. As k'uxh teq'o ve't tib' u Xhu'le' tuk' u Ma'le',
40001025	as ye'l u Xhu'le' nikat ivat k'atz u Ma'le'. Pet itz'eb'nal ve't u ne'e'. As tul itz'eb' u ne'e', as Jesús ib'ii u ne'e' uva' toksa ve't u Xhu'le'.
40002001	As tul atik ok u Herodese' ijlenaalil tu u Judea, as tul b'ex itz'eb'oj u Jesúse' tu u tal tename' uva' Belén, uva' echen tu u Judea. As oon ve't ka'l unq'a naj tu u Jerusalén uva' nimal txumb'al chusel sta'n as tuk' ti' unq'a tx'umile'. As a' tzaanajkat chajnaj tu u b'uuq'eb'al q'ii.
40002002	As ech ul tal chajnaj ile': —¿Katil atkat u tijlenaal unq'a tiaal Israel uva' kat itz'eb'ya? Tan tul atik o' tu u b'uuq'eb'al q'ii as kat qil tzan uma'l u tx'umil, texhlal tetz uva' kat itz'eb'ya. Esti'e' il o' qule' ti' qoksat iq'ii u ne'e',— ti'k chajnaj.
40002003	As b'ex alpo ve't te u Herodes uva' nikat tal chajnaj. As samun ve't naj tuk' unq'a aa Jerusaléne' skajayil ta'n u yole'.
40002004	As oora chit imolo ve't u Herodes unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh uva' atik tu u Jerusaléne' tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite'. As ich'oti ve't naj te chajnaj uva' katil la itz'eb'kat u Cristo.
40002005	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —Echen la itz'eb'kat u Cristoe' tu u tal tename' uve' Belén uva' echen tzitza' tu u Judea, tan eche' ni tal u yole' uva' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n uma'l u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' ech ni tal ile':
40002006	Axh u tal tenam uve' Belén uva' echen tu u Judea, tan k'uxh ye'l aq'ii xo'l unjoltu unq'a tename' tu u Judea, as axh la aq'on el tzan uma'l u eq'on tetz b'ey vatz vuntename' uva' tiaal Israel, ti'k u yole' tal kan,—  ti'k chajnaj.
40002007	As ijutxi ve't u Herodese' imolol unq'a naje' uva' chuselik tib' ti' unq'a tx'umile'. As ib'an ve't u Herodese' ich'otil te chajnaj uva' jatva'x q'ii ichee u tx'umile' uve' til chajnaj.
40002008	As ech tal ve't u Herodes ile' tul ichaj b'en naj chajnaj tu u Belén: —B'enoj ex tu u Belén. As b'enoj etab'i itzib'lal u ne'e' sb'a'n. As tul la eleje', as la ul etal sve, tan la b'en vile' ti' voksat iq'ii,— ti'k u Herodese'.
40002009	As tul tab'i chajnaj viyol u Herodese', as b'en ve't chajnaj. As an chit u tx'umile' uva' ma'tik tilat chajnaj tu u b'uuq'eb'al q'ii as til ve't chajnaj unpajte. As a'e' eq'on b'ey vatz chajnaj. As a' b'ex txakeb'ojkat u tx'umile' tiib'a u kab'ale' uve' atikkat u ne'e'.
40002010	As va'lik chit itxuq'txun ve't chajnaj tul til ve't chajnaj u tx'umile'.
40002011	As ok ve't chajnaj tu u kab'ale'. As til ve't chajnaj u ne'e' k'atz vitxutxe', u Ma'le'. As ku' ve't chajnaj qaaloj svatz ti' toksal iq'ii u ne'e'. As ijaj ve't chajnaj unq'a ikaaxhae'. As toya ve't chajnaj u b'a'nla q'an ch'ich'e' te u ne'e', tuk' incienso, as tuk' tx'umtx'ulla tz'akab'al uva' mirra ib'ii.
40002012	Tul q'aav ve't chajnaj, as ul alpo te chajnaj tivatzik' uva' ye' la q'aav ve't chajnaj vatz u Herodese'. Esti'e' va'len b'ey teq'o ve't chajnaj ti' iq'aav tu vitename'.
40002013	Tul kuxh el ch'u'l unq'a naje' uva' chuselik tib' ti' unq'a tx'umile', as ul ve't uma'l u ángel tivatzik' u Xhu'le' unpajte. As ech ul tal ile': «Xhu'l, txakpen. As kuxh tu u Egipto tuk' u ne'e' as tuk' vitxutxe'. As la atin ex tzitzi'. As in lanal alon see uva' jatu la el ch'u'l ex tzitzi', tan tuk ichuk u Herodes u ne'e' ti' iyatz'ata',» ti'k u ángele' tal te u Xhu'le'.
40002014	As yak kuxh ul ve't taama u Xhu'le' tu u aq'b'ale'. As txakpu ve'te'. As teq'o ve't u ne'e' tuk' vitxutxe'. As b'en ve't tu u Egipto.
40002015	A' atinkat cha'ma tu u Egiptoe'. Pet kamnal ve't u Herodes. As b'ex ib'ana kam uva' tal u Tiixhe' te unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyole', tan ech tal Aak ile': «Kat unmolo tzan vunK'aole' tu u Egipto,» ti'k u Tiixhe'.
40002016	Tul til ve't u Herodese' uva' chulil kan naj syol ta'n unq'a naje' uva' chuselik tib' ti' unq'a tx'umile', as ul ve't ivi' naj. As ichaj ve't b'en naj unq'a sole' ti' iyatz'at unq'a talaj ne' xaake' tu u Beléne' tuk' tu unq'a talaj tename' uva' najlich u Belén. As a' unq'a ne'e' yatz'pi uve' ye'xnik ib'an ka'va'l iyaab', tan a' b'enkat u Herodese' ti' tachax unq'a q'iie' uva' alax ste ta'n unq'a naje'.
40002017	As b'ex ib'an u yole' uva' tal kan u Tiixhe' ta'n u q'ajsan tetz viyole' uva' Jeremías, tul ech tal ile':
40002018	La ab'il ve't tuul ivi' unq'a ixoje' tu u Ramá uva' saq'chib'al chit toq'e', tan kat kamyu ve't unq'a tale'. As a' u Raquel ni toq'e' ti' unq'a tale' uve' kat kami. As ye' nisa' uva' la mutxb'eli, ti'k u Jeremíase'.
40002019	Tul ma'tik ikam ve't u Herodese', as ul tal uma'l u ángel tivatzik' u Xhu'le' tu u Egipto.
40002020	As ech ul tal ile': «Xhu'l, txakpen. Kuxh ve'te' tuk' u ne'e' as tuk' vitxutxe'. As q'aavoj ex tu vetename', tan kat kamyu ve't u Herodese' uva' nikat alon ikam u ne'e',» ti'k u ángel.
40002021	As txakpu ve't u Xhu'le'. As teq'o ve't u ne'e' tuk' vitxutxe'. As q'aav ve't cha'ma tu u tx'ava'e' uva' tetz unq'a tiaal Israele'.
40002022	As tul tab'i u Xhu'le' uva' a' u Arquelao, vik'aol u Herodese', atik ve't ok ijlenaalil sich'exel vib'aale' tu u Judea, as xo'v ve't u Xhu'le' ti' toon tu u Judea. As ul tal ve't u ángel tivatzik' uva' la uch ib'en tu u Galilea. As esti'e' a' b'enkat ve't tu u Galilea.
40002023	As b'ex ve't cha'ma jejeb'oj tu u tename' uva' Nazaret. As b'ex ib'an ve't u yole' uve' alel kan ta'n unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' aa Nazaret u Jesúse' la ib'ane'.
40003001	As tu ve't unq'a q'iie', as ul tal ve't u Xhune' viyol u Tiixhe' tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e' uva' at tu u Judeae'. As a' u Xhune' uva' nik aq'on ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e'.
40003002	As ech nik tal u Xhun ile' tul nik tal viyol u Tiixhe': —¡Ek'axataj vepaave'! Tan il u Tiixh ile' tul ve't tuk' u tijle'me' ti' vitename',— ti'k u Xhune'.
40003003	As a' u Xhune' uve' kat tal kan u Isaías, u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', tul ech tal ile': Tan la uch uma'l u sik'i'm tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e'. As ech la tal ile': «¡Eb'antaj etuche' ti' ek'ulat u Kub'aale'! ¡As ejikb'a'taj vetxumb'ale' eche' ijikb'a'l umaj b'ey!» chaj la tale', ti'k u Isaías.
40003004	As u toksa'm u Xhune', as a' vixi'l u camello uva' chemike. As k'alik ok uma'l u tz'u'm xe' tuul. As a' unq'a sak'e' nik techb'u tuk' u ta'l kab'e'.
40003005	As mama'la tenam nikat tex ab'in ve't viyol u Xhune'. At uxhchil tzaa tu u Jerusalén as tuk' tu u Judeae' skajayil. As at uxhchil tzaa tu unq'a talaj tename' tzi' u nimla a'e' uva' Jordán ib'ii.
40003006	As jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' nikat tal vipaave' te u Tiixhe', as taq' ve't ku' u Xhune' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u nimla a'e' tuk' vib'ii u Tiixhe'.
40003007	Tul til ve't u Xhune' uva' ye' saach unq'a fariseoe' tuk' unq'a saduceoe' ooni ti' uva' la ku' xe' u a'e', as ech tal ve't u Xhun ile' te chajnaj: —¡Ech vetxumb'ale' eche' u tx'i'latxooe'! ¿Tan ab'il kat alon sete uva' la ooj ex vatz u k'axk'oe' uve' tule'?
40003008	Eb'antaj u b'a'ne', texhlal tetz uva' kat ek'axal etib' vatz u Tiixhe'.
40003009	As ye' etitz'a uva' ti' kuxh uva': «O' tiaal u Abraham,» ch'ex netale', as ye'l ex la pal ex tu u k'axk'oe' uva' tule'. Pet tuk val sete uva' eche' k'axk'o koj ib'ensat u Tiixhe' unq'a k'ub'e' stiaal u Abraham.
40003010	As ech ve't b'anel eta'ne' eche' unq'a tze'e' uva' at ve't ok u k'oxb'ale' sti' ti' itzok'pu unq'a taq'il tze'e'. As ab'iste u tze'e' uve' ye' b'a'n vivatze' ni taq'e', as la tzok'ax el. As la sutil ok tu xamal.
40003011	Jik chit tuk val sete, tan xe' kuxh a'e' ni vaq'kat ku' ex, texhlal tetz uva' kat ek'axal vepaave'. Pet ech koj uma't u uxhchile' uva' a'n tule', tan nime' u tijle'me' svi'. As jit unk'ulele' uva' la unsaapu vixa'pe'. As tul la uli, as Aake' la oksan u Tiixhla Espíritu tu vetaanxelale', as la ijikb'a' ve't ex Aak tuk' vixamalile'.
40003012	Tan ech la b'anche' sete eche' nib'anchu te u trigo, tan il u txaab'al tetz u trigoe' ile' at tiq'ab' Aak. As la ikol ve't Aak u b'a'nla trigoe' tu u tatinb'ale'. Pet ech koj u ch'ise', tan yaklo'k tu u xamale', uma'l u xamal uva' ye'xh jatu la tzaai,— ti'k u Xhune'.
40003013	As tzaa ve't u Jesúse' tu u Galilea. As ul ve't Aak tzi' u Jordáne' uva' atikkat u Xhune', ti' uva' la aq'ax ve't ku' Aak xe' u a'e' ta'n u Xhune'.
40003014	As ye' nikat isa' u Xhune'. As ech tal u Xhun ile' te u Jesúse': —Ye'le, Pap, tan ¿kam q'ii uva' in la aq'on ku' axh xe' u a'e'? Pet axhe' la aq'on ku' in xe' u a'e'. As tul a' naale' uva' in la aq'on ku' axh,— ti'k u Xhune'.
40003015	As ech tal ve't u Jesúse' ile': —Techal la untzojpisa uva' ni tal u Tiixhe',— ti'k u Jesúse'. As inima ve't u Xhune' viyol u Jesúse'. As taq' ve't ku' u Xhune' u Jesúse' xe' u a'e'.
40003016	As tul je' ve't ch'u'l u Jesúse' xe' u a'e', as ijajpu ve't tib' u almika'e'. As til ve't Aak iku' ch'u'l u Tiixhla Espíritu tu almika' uva' ech iku' ch'u'le' eche' umaj u paroomaxh. As ul ve't tiib'a u Jesúse'.
40003017	As ab'il uma'l u yol tu almika' uva' ech tal ile': —A' vunK'aole' uva', xo'n chit sve. As va'l chit untxuq'txun ve't sti',— ti'k u yole'.
40004001	As b'en ve't u Jesúse' tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e' ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritue', ti' uva' la ichuk u tx'i'lanaje' txumb'al ti' ipaavin u Jesúse'.
40004002	As ka'viinqil q'ii tuk' ka'viinqit aq'b'al uva' ye'l u Jesúse' nikat itx'a'ne'. As va'y ve't Aak.
40004003	As ul ve't u tx'i'lanaje' k'atz u Jesúse'. As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Asoj axh iK'aol u Tiixhe', as ala uva' la b'en unq'a k'ub'e' tx'ixil,— ti'k u tx'i'lanaje'.
40004004	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ech ni tal viyol u Tiixh ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: Jit kuxh u tx'ixe' la isb'a'n unq'a uxhchile'. Pet kajayil chit unq'a yole' uve' ni tel ch'u'l titzi' u Kub'aal Tiixhe', as a'e' uve' la isb'a'n unq'a uxhchile',— ti'k Aak.
40004005	As b'en ve't u Jesúse' ta'n u tx'i'lanaje' tu u tenam uva' txaael ta'n u Tiixhe' uva' Jerusalén. As je' ve't Aak vi' u tostiixhe' ta'n u tx'i'lanaje'.
40004006	As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Asoj axh viK'aol u Tiixhe', as suti ku' eeb' tzitza', tan ech ni tal u yol ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: La ichaj tzan u Tiixhe' unq'a ángel ti' ul ilochat axh. As la ul ik'ul axh unq'a ángel aq'al uva' ye' la k'axb'u ve't avoj ti' umaj u k'ub',— ti'k u tx'i'lanaje'.
40004007	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ech ni tal viyol u Tiixh ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: Ye' la uch ab'ek'at u Kub'aal Tiixhe',—  ti'k Aak.
40004008	As b'en ve't u Jesúse' vi' uma'l u nimla vitz ta'n u tx'i'lanaje'. As ik'uch ve't u tx'i'lanaje' te u Jesúse' jank'al unq'a vee' at tulaj unq'a tename' skajayil vatz u tx'ava'e' as tuk' unq'a itx'iib'al iq'ii unq'a tename' skajayil.
40004009	As ech tal naj ile': —Asoj la ku' axh qaaloj sunvatz ti' ooksat unq'ii, as la vaq' unq'a vee' see skajayil,— ti'k u tx'i'lanaje'.
40004010	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Jetz'en el sunvatz, tx'i'lanaj, tan ech ni tal uma't u yol ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: Ta'n kuxh u Tiixhe', u Kub'aale', la ku' axh qaaloj svatz. As Aak kuxhe' la anima,—  ti'k u Jesúse'.
40004011	As taq' ve't kan u tx'i'lanaje' u Jesúse'. As ul ve't ka'l unq'a ángel k'atz Aak ti' ilochpu ve't Aak.
40004012	As tul tab'i ve't u Jesúse' yol uva' ma'tik tok ve't u Xhune' tu u kaarsa, as q'aav ve't Aak tu u Galilea.
40004013	As taq' ve't kan Aak u Nazaret. As a' b'exkat ve't Aak jejeb'oj tu u Capernaúm uva' echen tzi' u nimla naab'e' uva' atikkat vitx'ava' u Zabulón tuk' u Neftalí.
40004014	As b'ex ib'an ve't u yole' uve' alelik kan ta'n u Isaías, u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', uva' ech nik tal ile':
40004015	Unq'a uxhchile' uve' jejle'l tu vitx'ava' u Zabulón tuk' tu vitx'ava' u Neftalí, tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' echen najlich u nimla b'eye' uva' yakle'l tzi' u mare', tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' echen jalit u Jordán, as tuk' unq'a jit tiaal Israel uva' jejle'l tu u Galilea,
40004016	as a' unq'a tename' uva' eyen u taanxelale' tu u q'ej toktoe'. As la til ve't unq'a tename' uma'l u txijun tetz u taanxelale' uva' nim talche'. As jank'al unq'a tename' uva' at tzan u kamchile' sti', as la txijul ve'te', ti'k u yole' uve' tal kan u Isaías.
40004017	Tul kat oon ve't u Jesús tu u Capernaúm, as xe't ve't Aak ti' talat viyol u Tiixhe'. As ech nik tal Aak ile': —¡Ek'axataj vepaave'! Tan il u Tiixh ile' tul ve'te' tuk' u tijle'me' ti' vitename',— ti'k u Jesús.
40004018	Tul nik ixaan u Jesús tzi' u mar tu u Galilea, as til ve't Aak u Simón uva' Lu', tuk' u titz'ine' uva' Lixh. As nik isuti b'en chajnaj vik'ache' xe' u mar, tan txeyol txay chajnaj.
40004019	As ech tal u Jesús ile' te chajnaj: —Xekeb'oj ex svi'. As la voksa ve't ex ti' uva' la eteq'o tzan unq'a tename' ti' tok sunk'atz,— ti'k u Jesús.
40004020	As yak kuxh taq' ve't kan chajnaj unq'a ik'ache'. As xekeb' ve't chajnaj ti' u Jesús.
40004021	B'iil kuxh ixaa u Jesús. As b'ex ilej Aak ka'va't unq'a txeyol txay uva' titz'in tib', tuk' u Jacobo tuk' u Xhun, vik'aol u Zebedeo. As xonlik kuxh chajnaj tuk' vib'aale' tu u barco, tan nikat kuxh ik'ooa chajnaj unq'a ik'ache'. As imolo ve't u Jesús chajnaj.
40004022	As yak kuxh taq' ve't kan chajnaj vib'aale' tuk' u barco. As xekeb' ve't chajnaj ti' u Jesús.
40004023	As b'ex ve't u Jesús chusun tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh, tulaj unq'a talaj tename' tu u Galilea skajayil. As nikat tal u Jesús isuuchil u b'a'nla yole' ti' u Tiixhe' uva' la ul ve't tuk' u tijle'me' ti' vitename'. As nikat ib'a'nxisa ve't Aak unq'a aach'o'me' skajayil, k'uxh kam kuxh ch'o'mil.
40004024	As pax ve't itzib'lal Aak tulaj unq'a tename' tu u Siria. As mama'la aach'o'm eq'ol tzan vatz Aak. As ati uva' sub'ul atik ok sk'atz. As ati uva' ch'u'jil elnallukat. As ati uva' ye' nikat itx'ol itiin vichi'ole'. As kat ib'a'nxisa ve't u Jesús skajayil.
40004025	As mama'la tenam xekelik ti' Aak. As xekelik unq'a aa Galilea tuk' unq'a aa Decápolis, tuk' unq'a aa Jerusalén, tuk' ka't unq'a aa Judea, as tuk' ka't unq'a tename' uva' jalit u Jordán.
40005001	As til ve't u Jesús u mama'la tenam. As je' ve't Aak vi' uma'l u vitz. As xoneb' ve't tzan Aak. As jetz'en ve't ok unq'a ichusulib' Aake' sk'atz.
40005002	As xe't ve't Aak chusun. As ech tal ve't Aak ile':
40005003	—Achveb'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' ootzimal sta'n uva' techal chit la lochpu ta'n u Tiixhe', tan a' uxhchile' uva' at tokeb'al xo'l unq'a tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'.
40005004	As achveb'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' nitxumune', tan la mutxb'el ve'te' ta'n u Tiixhe'.
40005005	As achveb'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' sula aama, tan tetze' u vatz tx'ava'e' skajayil la ib'ane'.
40005006	As achveb'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' niva'y u taanxelale' as nitzaj itzi' ti' ib'anat u jike' uva' ni tal viyol u Tiixhe', tan a'e' la lochpu ta'n Aak.
40005007	As achveb'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' nitxum ivatz imool, tan la itxum u Tiixhe' ivatz.
40005008	As achveb'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' tx'aael ve't u taanxelale' ta'n u Tiixhe', tan la til ve't tib' tuk' Aak.
40005009	As achveb'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' nichukun txumb'al ti' iya'sal ch'a'o, tan a'e' uva' me'al ik'aol u Tiixhe'.
40005010	As achveb'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni paleb'en unq'a k'axk'oe' ti' ib'anat u jike' vatz u Tiixhe', tan a' uxhchile' uva' at tokeb'al xo'l unq'a tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'.
40005011	As achveb'al chit ex ti' uva' nenima in as k'uxh la xe't unq'a uxhchile' seti'. As la yoq'pu ve't ex. As kam kuxh chuli yolil la alpu seti'.
40005012	Chiib'ojtaj ex. As txuq'txunoj ex, tan nime' vetx'aja'me' tuk aq'axoj sete tu almika'. As chiib'ojtaj ex k'uxh la epaleb'e k'axk'o, tan ech chit kat ulb'el unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' tul uva' ye'xnik ul ex.
40005013	As ech exe' u atz'ame' xo'l unq'a tename'. Pet asoj la pal ve't ipitz'polil u atz'ame', as ye' la txakon ve'te', tan la koj uch ichee ipitz'polil unpajte. Pet la kuxh mak'pik ve't ele' tu b'ey. As la pal ipach' ve't unq'a xaole'.
40005014	As ech exe' eche' umaj txijub'al xo'l unq'a tename', eche' uma'l u tenam uva' at je' vi' uma'l u vitz, tan kajayil uxhchil la ilon.
40005015	As la koj uchi uva' tul la matxax umaj xamal, as a' la mujaxkat ok jaq' umaj kaaxha. Pet a' la aq'axkat je' vi' u matxb'ale', aq'al uva' la itxiju u xamale' unq'a uxhchile' skajayil uve' at tu u kab'ale'.
40005016	Echat chit ex la ib'ane', tan exe' la k'uchun u b'a'ne' vatz unq'a uxhchile' eche' nib'an u xamale' tul nitxijune'. As la til unq'a uxhchile' u b'a'ne' uve' neb'ane'. As la toksa ve't unq'a uxhchile' iq'ii u Kub'aal Tiixhe' uva' echen tu almika'.
40005017	Kamal netitz'a uva' kat ul in ti' ul veesat iyak'il u tzaq'ite' uva' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Moisés, tuk' viyol unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol Aake'. As jit eesamal iq'iie' kat ul unb'ana. Pet kat ul in ti' ul valat isuuchil, as ti' ul unb'anata' kam uve' nital svi'.
40005018	As tuk val sete, tan tul ye'xnaj sotz u almika'e' tuk' u vatz tx'ava'e', as ye'le uva' ye' koj tuk ib'an umaj yol uva' tz'ib'amal kan. Pet techal chite' tuk ib'ane' skajayil kam uve' tz'ib'amal kan.
40005019	Tan ab'il uva' la teesa iyak'il umaj unq'a tzaq'ite' uve' tz'ib'amal kan uva' ch'oo kuxh iyolb'ele', asoj la ichus te unq'a tename' uva' ye' la nimali, as la eesal iq'ii u uxhchile' xo'l unq'a tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'. Pet ab'il uve' la niman unq'a tzaq'ite' as la ichus te unq'a tename' uva' la nimali, as nim chit talche' la ib'ane'.
40005020	As tuk val sete, asoj ye' la pal ex ti' enimat u jikla tzaq'ite' ti' uva' nib'an unq'a fariseo as tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', as ye'l etokeb'al xo'l u tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'.
40005021	As ootzimal seta'n uva' ech ni tal uma'l u yol ile' uva' alax kan te unq'a tename' uva' na'ytzan: «Eyatz'ak umaj uxhchil, tan ab'il uve' la yatz'oni as tetz chit ve'te' uva' la b'en tu u choob'al paave',» ti'k u yole'.
40005022	Pet tuk val sete, as ab'il uve' la kuxh ul ivi' ti' umaj imool, as la chee ipaav vatz u b'anol isuuchil unq'a tename'. As ab'il uve' la toksa je' iq'ii tul la teesa iq'ii vimoole', as la chee ipaav vatz unq'a b'anol isuuchil u tename' uve' molel tib'. As ab'il uve' la chi'an taama ti' vimoole' tul niyoq'on sti', as a' la aq'axkat ve't b'en tu u choob'al paave'.
40005023	As tuk val sete, tul la eteq'o b'en umaj oy vatz u atinb'ale' uva' niyatz'pukat unq'a txooe', asoj la ul sek'u'l uva' yael etib' tuk' umaj etitz'in etatzik,
40005024	as la etaq' kan u oye' vatz u nachb'al Tiixhe'. As la b'en echuk vetitz'in etatzike' uve' yael etib' stuk'. As tul la ik'ul tib' eyol stuk', as a'n la b'en etaq'o'k u oye' vatz u nachb'al Tiixhe'.
40005025	Asoj at umaj uxhchil ni alon uva' la ixoch ex, as tul uva' atil ex tu b'ey, as oora kuxh la eyol sevatzaj ti' u yaaib'e' uva' neb'ane', tan la ib'ane' uva' la b'en ixoch ex te u b'aal tename'. As la aq'ax ve't ok ex tiq'ab' u mayule' uve' ni xeen u kaarsae'. As la juplik ve't ok ex tu u kaarsa.
40005026	As jik chit ni val sete, tan ye'l exe' la el ch'u'l ex tu u kaarsae'. Pet lanal chit echoo skajayil, jank'al uva' la ijaj u b'anol isuuchil unq'a tename' sete.
40005027	As ootzimal seta'n uva' ech ni tal uma't u yol ile' uva' alax kan: Ye' la ichuk u naje' tixoj. As ye' la moolin u ixoje', ti'k u tzaq'ite'.
40005028	Pet tuk val sete, tan ab'il uve' la ilon umaj ixoj asoj la kuxh tachva b'en naj u ixoje' ti' ib'anat u va'lexhe' stuk', as kat paavinyu ve't naj tu u taanxelale'.
40005029	Asoj la paavin ex ta'n u seb'al evatze', as eya'sataj epaavine' eela kuxh stuk' uva' kat eteesal el u b'aq' evatze', tan aal b'a'ne' uva' la etz'ej umaj u b'aq' evatze'. As ye' la b'en vechi'ole' skajayil tu u choob'al paave'.
40005030	Asoj la paavin ex ta'n u seb'al eq'ab'e', as eya'sataj epaavine' eela kuxh stuk' uva' kat etzok'lu el veq'ab'e' as kat sutil el, tan aal b'a'ne' uva' la etz'ej umaj veq'ab'e'. As ye' la b'en vechi'ole' skajayil tu u choob'al paave'.
40005031	As ootzimal seta'n unpajte uva' alax kan uva' ech ni tal ile': Ab'il la ijatx tib' tuk' tixqel as techanal la taq' naj uma'l u u'uj tiq'ab' ixoj, texhlal tetz uva' jatxel ve't tib' naj tuk' ixoj, ti'k u yole'.
40005032	Pet tuk val sete, tan asoj la ijatx tib' u naje' tuk' u tixqele', as tul ye'l ixoj kat iyansa tib' tuk' uma'toj naj, as iq'aaq'al naj uva' la paavin u tixqel naje'. As ab'il la teq'o tib' tuk' u ixoje', as la paavin ve'te' k'atz ixoj.
40005033	As ab'imal uma't u yol seta'n uva' alax kan te unq'a tename' na'ytzan uva' ech tal ile': Asoj la aal umaj ayol tuk' viB'ii u Tiixhe', as techal la atzojpisa kam uva' kat aala. As ye' la achuli yol, ti'k u yole'.
40005034	Pet tuk val sete, tan kamini'k kuxh etoksa k'atz veyole' ti' uva' la nimali. As etoksak kuxh u almika'e' k'atz veyole', tan ixonleb'al u Tiixhe' u almika'e'.
40005035	As mita'n u tx'ava'e' la etoksa k'atz veyole', tan ti' uva' ech u tx'ava'e' eche' ti'leb'al toj u Tiixhe'. As mita'n kuxh u Jerusalén la etoksa ti' veyole', tan ti' uva' itenam u Nimla Ijlenaale' u Jerusalén.
40005036	As mita'n kuxh la etoksa u xi'l evi'e' k'atz veyole', tan eche' la koj oleb' ex ti' isajb'isal uma'l u xi'l evi'e'. As mita'n la oleb' ex ti' iq'ejb'isale'.
40005037	Pet ech eyolon ile' tul la yolon ex: «An chite',» chaj ex, asoj an chittu'. As: «Ye'le,» chaj ex asoj jit'e'che'. Tan asoj jit ech eyolone' tul la yolon ex, as xe' u tx'i'lanaje' tzaanajkat vetxumb'ale'.
40005038	As ootzimal uma't u yole' seta'n uva' alel kan uva' ech ni tal ile': Ab'il uva' la poq'on el tzan b'aq' ivatz imool, as la poq'lik el u b'aq' ivatze' unpajte. As ab'il uva' la itoopisa el tee imool, as la toopisal el u tee unpajte, ti'k u yole'.
40005039	Pet ech koj uve' tuk val sete, tan eq'aavisak ich'exel u va'lexhe' uve' la b'anchu sete. Pet asoj la itz'ich umaj uxhchil u seb'al evatze', as etaq'taj ok unjalit vevatze'.
40005040	Asoj ab'il la ichuk ixe't seti' ti' imaat vekami'xhe', as etaq'taj vekami'xhe' tuk' vexheerkae' ste.
40005041	Asoj la alax sete ti' uva' la etija b'en umaj ijatz tu uma'l i'l, as ka'va'l i'l la etijakat b'en.
40005042	Asoj ab'il la jajon umaj kam sete, as etaq'taj ste. Asoj ab'il la ul jajon umaj kam sete sk'am, as ye'l ex la epi'u etib' ti' etaq'at ste.
40005043	As ootzimal uma't u yole' seta'n uva' alax kan uva' ech ni tal ile': «Xo'noj unq'a emoole' sete. As chi'anoj etaama ti' unq'a uxhchile' uve' nichi'an taama seti',» ti'k u yole'.
40005044	Pet ech koj uve' tuk val sete, tan xo'noj unq'a uxhchile' sete uve' nich'o'n taama seti'. As b'a'noj eyolon ti' unq'a uxhchile' uva' va'lexh iyolon seti'. As eb'antaj b'a'nil te unq'a uxhchile' uva' ni b'anon u va'lexhe' sete. As enachtaj Tiixh ti' unq'a uxhchile' uve' nixe't seti'.
40005045	Asoj ech la eb'ane', as ech ek'uchate' uva' ex me'al ik'aol u Kub'aale' uva' echen tu almika', tan Aake' ni aq'on el tzan u q'iie' ti' unq'a b'a'nla aamae' tuk' unq'a tx'i'la aamae'. As ni taq' Aak u jab'ale' ti' unq'a jikla aamae' tuk' ti' unq'a paasan tziie'.
40005046	Tan asoj a' kuxh unq'a uxhchile' xo'n sete uva' xo'n ex ste, as ¿kam umaj etx'aja'm q'ii la ek'ul sti'? ¿As ma ye' etootza uva' ech nib'an unq'a uxhchile' uva' ni molon u puaje' tetz u Roma?
40005047	Asoj a' kuxh unq'a etitz'in etatzike' netiixhi, as eelatel kuxh ex tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' ye' ni niman u Tiixhe'.
40005048	Pet jik chit ex la eb'ane' eche' u Kub'aale' uva' echen tu almika', tan jik chit Aake'.
40006001	As tuk val sete uva' ye' la epaxsa vi' unq'a tename' tul la eb'an umaj b'a'nil. As ti' inik kuxhtu' uva' la til ex unq'a tename' kam uva' kat eb'ana, tan asoj la epaxsa vi' unq'a tename', as ye'l etx'aja'm la taq' u Kub'aale' uva' echen tu almika'.
40006002	As tul la eb'an umaj b'a'nil te umaj uxhchil, as ye' la epaxsa vi' unq'a tename', eche' uve' nib'an unq'a ka'vatze' tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh as tulaj unq'a b'eye' aq'al uva' la oksal iq'ii chajnaj ta'n unq'a tename'. Pet tuk val sete uva' ta'n itx'aja'm chajnaje' uva' la oksal iq'ii chajnaj ta'n unq'a tename'.
40006003	Pet ech koj ex, tan tul la eb'an umaj u b'a'nil te umaj uxhchil, as katini'k etalkat. As mita'n la etal te umaj uxhchil uva' k'ulel tib' eyol stuk',
40006004	aq'al uva' ye'xheb'il la ootzin uva' kat eb'an uma'l u b'a'nil te umaj uxhchil. Pet a' kuxh u Kub'aale' uva' at tu almika' ootzin tetz u b'a'nile' uve' kat eb'ana, tan na'le' vatz Aak kam uve' neb'ane'. As la til unq'a uxhchile' u b'a'nile' uve' la ib'an Aak sete.
40006005	As tul la enach Tiixh, as eb'anak etetz eche' uve' nib'an unq'a naje' uve' ka'vatz, tan tul ninach chajnaj Tiixh, as acha'v chit te chajnaj tul nitxakeb' chajnaj tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh as tulaj unq'a ju' pe'e' as tu k'ayib'ale', ti' uva' la til unq'a tename'. Pet tuk val sete uva' ta'n itx'aja'm chajnaje' uva' la oksal iq'ii chajnaj ta'n unq'a tename'.
40006006	Pet ech koj ex, tan tul la enach Tiixh, as la ok ex tu vekab'ale'. As la ejup u tzi' kab'ale' aq'al uva' ex kuxh sejunal tuk' u Kub'aale' uva' ye'xheb'il ni ilon, tan na'le' vetaanxelale' vatz Aak. As la til unq'a uxhchile' u b'a'nile' uve' la ib'an Aak sete.
40006007	As tul la enach Tiixh, as pilq'i'k kuxh ex ti' veyole' eche' nib'an unq'a uxhchile' uve' ye' ootzin tetz u Tiixhe', tan a' ni tal je' ste uva' asoj la kuxh pilq'u ti' viyole', as a'e' nititz'a uva' la taq' Aak ste kam uva' nijaje'.
40006008	Pet eb'anak etetz eche' uve' nib'an unq'a uxhchile', tan ootzimale' ta'n u Kub'aale' kam uve' nisa'vit seti'. As at ve't sk'u'l Aak tul ye'xnaj ejaj te Aak.
40006009	As ech la etal ile' tul la enach Tiixh: Kub'aal Tiixh, echen axh tu almika'. Tiixhla b'ii chite' tatin vab'iie'.
40006010	As ulen ve'te' tuk' u eejle'me' ti' vatename' skajayil. As a' ni qale' uva' la ab'an vatz u tx'ava'e' kam uva' ni tal aama eche' uva' nab'an tu almika'e'.
40006011	B'an b'a'nil. Aq' vas qechb'ub'ale' uva' la qechb'u jun q'ii.
40006012	As sotzsa kupaave', Pap, ti' u va'lexhe' uve' nu kub'an savatz, eche' kusotzsat ipaav u kumoole' uve' ni paavin sukuvatz.
40006013	B'an b'a'nil. Achajpuk kan o' ti' kub'en tu u va'lexhe'. Pet la akol o' vatz u tx'i'lanaje', tan ta'n axhe' at eejle'm ti' unq'a tename' skajayil. As ta'n axhe' la qoksa aq'ii sb'enameen ti' chit ib'ene'. An chite'.
40006014	Tan asoj la esotzsa ipaav unq'a emoole' uva' nipaavin sevatz, as echat la ib'an u Kub'aale' uva' echen tu almika', tan la isotzsa Aake' vepaave'.
40006015	Pet asoj ye' la esotzsa ipaav unq'a emoole' ve't ni paavin sevatz, as ye'l vepaave' la isotzsa u Kub'aale' uva' echen tu almika'.
40006016	As eb'anak etetz eche' uve' nib'an unq'a ka'vatze', tan tul uva' nikuy chajnaj iva'y, as txumleb'al chit ivatz chajnaj nib'ane' vatz unq'a tename', tan a' nisa' chajnaj uva' la til unq'a tename' uva' nikuy chajnaj iva'y. Pet tuk val sete uva' ta'n itx'aja'm chajnaje' uve' kat oksal iq'ii ta'n unq'a tename'.
40006017	Pet ech koj ex, tan tul uva' la ekuy eva'y vatz u Tiixhe', as la exee evi'. As la etx'aa evatz,
40006018	aq'al uva' ye' la pal unq'a tename' stuul kam uva' neb'ane'. Pet vatz u Kub'aal Tiixhe' la eb'ankat, tan na'le' vetaanxelale' vatz Aak. As la til unq'a tename' u b'a'nile' uve' la ib'an Aak sete.
40006019	As tuk val sete, ye' kuxh etoksa etaama ti' u tx'iib'al q'iie' tzitza' vatz u tx'ava'e', tan jank'al uva' la emole', as la pok'te'. As moj la yani. As la kuxh esuti ve't el. As moj u elq'ome' la elq'an.
40006020	Pet a' la etoksakat etaama ti' emolat unq'a nimla tx'iib'al q'iie' tu almika', tan a'e' ye' la pok'ti. As ye' la yani. As mita'n u elq'ome' la elq'an.
40006021	As katil uva' nemolkat unq'a etetze', as tzitzi'e' netoksakat etaama.
40006022	As tuk val sete, tan u b'aq' evatze' ni k'uchun uva' kam vetxumb'ale', tan asoj b'a'n u b'aq' evatze', as b'a'ne' vetxumb'ale'.
40006023	Pet asoj va'lexh u b'aq' evatze', as echen exe' tu u q'ej toktoe' tuk' vetxumb'ale'. Tan asoj echen ex tu u q'ej toktoe' tuk' vetxumb'ale', as txumleb'al kuxh etatine' tu u q'ej toktoe'.
40006024	As ye' la uch taq'onvu umaj uxhchil xe' ka'va'l b'aal aq'on, tan la tixva kan u uxhchile' uma'l u b'aal aq'one'. As la ixo'ni uma'te. As moj la inima uma'l u b'aal aq'one'. As ye' la inima uma'te. Esti'e' la val sete, etoksataj etaama ti' u Tiixhe', tan asoj netoksa etaama ti' u tx'iib'al eq'iie' vatz u tx'ava'e', as ye' la uchi uva' la etoksa etaama ti' enimat u Kub'aal Tiixhe'.
40006025	Esti'e' ni val sete uva' ye' kuxh exaansa etaama ti' uva' kam la etechb'u sq'ejal, moj kam la etuk'a, as mita'n ti' unq'a etoksa'me' uva' kam la etoksa'mi, tan nim talche' vetiichajile' ti' vetechb'ub'ale'. As nim talche' vechi'ole' ti' vetoksa'me'.
40006026	Etiltaj unq'a tz'ikine' uve' nixich'an tu almika', tan ye'l txoo ni tave'. As ye'l txoo nipitx'one'. Ye'l ik'uay txoo ati. As a' u Kub'aal Tiixhe' uva' echen tu almika' ni aq'on techb'ub'al txoo. ¿As a' kol chit ve't ye'l ex q'a? Tan nim etalche' ti' unq'a tz'ikine'.
40006027	As tuk val sete uva' ye'l umaj ex la koj oleb' ex ti' ech'iisat etxakeb'e' tuk' ka'va'toj k'uchb'al, as k'uxh nexaansa etaama sti'.
40006028	As ye' kuxh exaansa etaama ti' uva' kam la etoksa'mi. Pet etitz'ataj unq'a xu'me', tan acha'v chit ich'iie', as k'uxh ye'xhkam ni taq'onve' as ye'xhkam nichemone'.
40006029	Pet tuk val sete, tan mita'n kuxh u ijlenaal Salomón kat lejon ivejat tib' tuk' u toksa'me' ti' unq'a xu'me', as k'uxh xo'veb'alik kuxh naj ti' ivejat tib'.
40006030	As ch'i'umal chit unq'a xu'me' uve' cheesamal ta'n u Tiixhe', as k'uxh ye' kuxh jatva'l q'ii stuul as kat tzaj ve'te' as eela itz'e' ve'te' tuk' unq'a ch'ise'. As a' kol chit ye' la ib'an Aak q'a sete ti' elochpe' tan nim etalche' ti' unq'a xu'me', ex uva' b'iil kuxh u k'ujleb'al ek'u'le' at ti' u Tiixhe'.
40006031	As ye' kuxh exaansa etaama. As ye' la etal ech ile': «¿Kam tuk qechb'u? As ¿kam tuk quk'a? As ¿kam tuk qoksa'mi?» chajini'k ex etala,
40006032	tan a' kuxhe' ni titz'a unq'a tename' uve' ye' ni niman u Kub'aal Tiixhe'. Pet ech koj ex, tan ootzimale' ta'n u Kub'aal Tiixhe' uva' echen tu almika' kam uva' nisa'vit seti'.
40006033	Pet aal b'a'ne' uva' la ok ex xo'l unq'a tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'. As etoksataj etaama ti' eb'anat u jikla txumb'ale' vatz Aak. As Aake' la aq'on ve't unq'a vee' skajayil sete, kam uva' nisa'vit seti'.
40006034	Esti'e' ni val sete, ye' kuxh exaansa etaama ti' u q'iie' uve' q'ejal, tan kam kuxhe' eq'omal ta'n junun unq'a q'iie'. As kat kuxh ib'anle' kam uva' eq'omal ta'n junun unq'a q'iie'.
40007001	Ye' kuxh eb'an isuuchil vemoole', aq'al uva' ye' la b'anax esuuchil ta'n vemoole',
40007002	tan kam chit eb'anat isuuchil vemoole', as echat chit la b'anax sete. As kam chit u txumb'ale' uva' la eb'an ti' vemoole', as echat chit la b'anchu sete.
40007003	¿As kam q'ii uve' va'l kuxh esajit ok u tal ch'ise' tu vivatz vetitz'in etatzike', as tul ye' netil je' etib' tul at uma'l u potzo'm tu vevatze'?
40007004	Tan asoj at uma'l u potzo'm tu vevatze', as ¿la kol uch etalat q'a te vetitz'in etatzike' uva': «¡Qe'na! Tuk veesa el tzan u tal ch'ise' tu vavatze',» ma chaj ex la etale'? ¡Tul il u potzo'm ile' at tu vevatze'!
40007005	¡Ex kuxh ka'vatz! Eteesataj u potzo'me' tu vevatze' b'axa. As a'n la uch etilat ve't u ch'ise' tivatz vetitz'in etatzike'. As la eteesa ve't el.
40007006	Pet tuk val sete, tan ye' la uch etalat u b'a'nla yole' te unq'a uxhchile' uva' ye' la sa'on tab'it viyol u Tiixhe', tan a'e' ye' la niman. As la ib'ane' uva' la ul ivi' seti' eche' nib'an unq'a tx'i'e' tul uva' nichi' ex tx'i'. As moj ech itxumb'al unq'a uxhchile' eche' unq'a chichame', as latz' koj ti' txoo, tan la kuxh ipach' txooe' tu toj.
40007007	As ejajtaj. As la aq'pe' sete. Echuktaj. As la eleje'. As et'oktaj u tzi' kab'ale'. As la jajpe' u tzi' kab'ale' sevatz.
40007008	Tan ab'il uva' la jajon, as la ik'ule'. As ab'il uva' la chukun, as la ileje'. As ab'il uva' la t'okon u tzi' kab'ale', as la jajpe' u tzi' kab'ale' svatz.
40007009	¿As at kol umaj ex q'a uva' la tx'akon taq'ax umaj k'ub' te vetalaj intxa'e' tul la ijaj ipaan sete?
40007010	¿As moj ichib'il tx'i'latxoo la etaq' te vetalaj intxa'e' tul la ijaj unb'ooj chib'il txay sete?
40007011	Tan k'uxh tx'i'la aama chit ex, as ootzimal seta'n uva' a' u b'a'ne' netaq' te unq'a etalaj intxa'e'. ¿As a' kol chit ye'l u Kub'aal Tiixhe' q'a uva' at tu almika'? Tan nime' vib'a'nil Aake' seti'. Tan la taq' Aake' u b'a'nile' sete, ab'iste ex uva' la jajon te Aak.
40007012	As kam kuxh uva' la eb'ane', as echat la eb'an te unq'a uxhchile' eche' uva' nesa' uva' la b'anchu sete. Tan ech isuuchil u tzaq'ite' uva' tz'ib'amal kan, as tuk' ka't unq'a yole' uva' itz'ib'a kan unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe'.
40007013	As okoj ex tu u tzi' kab'ale' uva' ch'oo kuxh ivatz, tan at uma't u tzi' kab'ale' uva' nim chit ivatz. As at uma't u b'ey uva' nim chit ivatz uva' ech toon tu u choob'al paave'. As nimal unq'a tename' ni tok tu u nimla tzi' kab'ale'.
40007014	Pet ka'l kuxh unq'a uxhchile' la itx'ol tok tu u tzi' kab'ale' uva' ch'oo kuxh ivatz as tuk' tu u b'eye' uva' ch'oo kuxh ivatz uva' la eq'on unq'a uxhchile' tu vitiichajile' uve' ye'l iya'teb'al.
40007015	Esti'e' ni val sete, atoj chit enachb'al vatz unq'a chulin yole' uva' nu kuxh ib'ensa tib' q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe'. As ech tilon vitxumb'ale' eche' uma'l u b'a'nla kaneero'. Pet ech koj u taanxelale', tan eche' uma'l u xo' ti' ichi'at ex.
40007016	Pet a' vitxumb'al unq'a uxhchile' la k'uchun sete ma b'a'n moj ye'le, eche' nib'an unq'a tze'e', tan ye' la uch quxat uuva ti' u ch'i'xe'. As ye' la uch quxat higuera ti' u vokkin ch'i'x.
40007017	As jank'al unq'a tze'e' uve' b'a'n, as b'a'n vivatz tze'e'. Pet ech koj u tze'e' uve' ye' b'a'n, tan va'lexh vivatz tze'e'.
40007018	As u tze'e' uve' b'a'n, as ye' la uch taq'at tze' ivatz uva' ye' b'a'n; as u tze'e' uve' ye' b'a'n, as ye' la uch taq'at tze' ivatz uva' b'a'n.
40007019	Pet jank'al unq'a tze'e' uve' va'lexh ivatz ni taq'e', as la tzok'ax el. As la oksal tu u xamale'.
40007020	Esti'e' ni val sete uva' a' vitxumb'al unq'a uxhchile' la k'uchun ma b'a'n moj ye'le, eche' uva' nib'an unq'a tze'e'.
40007021	As jit kajayil unq'a uxhchile' uva' ni alon sve: «¡Kub'aal Jesús! ¡Kub'aal Jesús!» taq'e' ni tal sve, as ye'l tokeb'al xo'l unq'a tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'. Pet ta'n kuxh unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni niman kam uve' nisa' Aak uva' la ib'ane'.
40007022	As la ib'an uma'l u q'ii uva' nimal uxhchil la alon sve, «¡Kub'aal Jesús! ¡Kub'aal Jesús!» chaj la tal sve. As ati la alon uva': «Tuk' vab'iie', Pap, kat qal vayole'; as tuk' vab'iie' kat qeesa el unq'a sub'ule'; as tuk' vab'iie' kat kuk'uch vanimla b'a'nile' vatz unq'a tename',» chaj ve'te' la tal sve.
40007023	As ech la val ve't ile': «Ye' vootzaj ex. Jetz'enoj el ex sunvatz, tan ex b'anol tetz unq'a va'lexhe',» chaj in la val ve't ste.
40007024	As ab'il uve' la ab'in vunyole' as la inima, as la ib'an eela tuk' umaj naj uva' at itxumb'al, as la ilak vikab'ale' vi' u sivane'.
40007025	As tul la ul uma'l u mam jab'al tuk' uma'l u mam kajiq' ti' u kab'ale', as la sipk'u ve't unq'a a'e'. As ye'l u kab'ale' la ku'i, tan chab'amal chit ik'ujeb' u kab'ale' vi' u sivane'.
40007026	Pet ab'il uve' la ab'in vunyole' as ye' la inima, as la ib'an eela tuk' uma't u naj uva' ye'l itxumb'al ati uva' la ilak ikab'al vi' u sanab'e'.
40007027	As tul la ul ve't u mam jab'ale' tuk' u mam kajiq'e' ti' u kab'ale', as la sipk'u ve't unq'a a'e'. As la pal tija ve't u a'e' u kab'ale'. As txumleb'al chit ve't te'p u kab'ale' la ib'ane',— ti'k u Jesús.
40007028	As tul ya' ve't u Jesús ti' iyolone', as teq'o ve't taama unq'a tename' ti' u chusb'ale' uva' nik tal Aak,
40007029	tan ech iyolon Aake' eche' umaj naj uva' at tijle'm. Pet ech koj unq'a naje' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', tan jit'e'ch ichusun chajnaje' eche' uve' nik ib'an Aak.
40008001	As tul ku' ch'u'l u Jesús vatz u vitze', as a' chit mama'la tename' xekelik ve't ti' Aak.
40008002	As ul ve't uma'l u naj k'atz u Jesús uva' atik ok ch'a'k chin sti'. As ku' naj qaaloj vatz Aak. As ech tal naj ile': —Pap, asoj la asa', as b'an b'a'nil sve. As eesa u ch'o'me' svi', tan la oleb' axhe',— ti'k naj tal te u Jesús.
40008003	As taq' ve't b'en u Jesús iq'ab' ti' naj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Nunsa'. Kat b'a'nxiy ve't axhe',— ti'k Aak. As yak kuxh el ve't u ch'a'k chine' ti' naj.
40008004	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Tuk val see uva' katini'k chit aalkat uva' kat b'a'nxiy axh. Pet kuxh k'uch eeb' vatz unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh. As kuxh aq' u oye' uva' alel kan ta'n u Moisés, texhlal tetz uva' kat txanyu ve't axh,— ti'k Aak tala.
40008005	As tul ok u Jesús tu u Capernaúm, as ul uma'l viq'esal unq'a sole' vatz u Jesús. As ijaj naj b'a'nil te Aak.
40008006	As ech tal naj ile': —Pap, b'an b'a'nil. B'a'nxisa uma'l vas unk'am uve' nich'o'ne', tan ile' koxhle'l tunkab'al. As ye' nitx'ol ve't itiinsat tib', tan nimxinal chittu',— ti'k u naje' tal te u Jesús.
40008007	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —B'a'n kuxhe'. B'en unb'a'nxisa,— ti'k u Jesús.
40008008	As ech tal ve't viq'esal unq'a sol ile': —Ye'le, Pap, tan nim aalche'. As ye'l vijle'm ati uva' la oon axh tunkab'al. Pet al b'en kuxhtu' uva' la b'a'nx ve't vunk'ame'. As tuk b'a'nxoje',
40008009	tan eche' in, tan at unq'esal eche' axh. As at sol jaq' u vijle'me' unpajte. As kam uve' la val te umaj vunsole', as la ib'ane'. Asoj la val te umaj naj: «Kuxh b'en,» chaj in ste, as ma'te. Asoj: «Si'u,» chaj in te uma't naj, as la ul naj sunvatz. Asoj la val te umaj vunk'ame': «B'an u vi'le',» chaj in ste, as la ib'ane',— ti'k naj tal te u Jesús.
40008010	As tul tab'i ve't u Jesús u yole' uva' tal viq'esal unq'a sole', as txuq'txun ve't Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' xo'l unq'a tename': —Ile' jik chit tuk val sete, tan ye'l umaj naj vile'te xo'l unq'a tiaal Israel uva' ech u k'ujleb'al ik'u'le' eche' nib'an u naje'.
40008011	As tuk val sete uva' ye' saach unq'a uxhchile' la ul tib'uuq'eb'al q'ii as la ul tib'eneb'al q'ii. As la xoneb' tu almika' k'atz u Abraham, tuk' u Isaac, tuk' u Jacob ti' itx'a'ne', as tuk' unq'a tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'.
40008012	Pet nimal unq'a tiaal Israel uva' ye' nisa' tok jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe', as ech ib'en tu u q'ej toktoe'. As tzitzi' la oq'kat ve'te'. As la ik'ux ve't tib' tee ta'n u k'axk'oe',— ti'k u Jesús.
40008013	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te viq'esal unq'a sole': —Kuxh ve'te', tan kam uva' kat anima as kat ib'anla',— ti'k u Jesús. As tul kuxh tal Aak u yole', as yak kuxh el u ch'o'me' ti' vik'am naje'.
40008014	As oon ve't u Jesús tikab'al u Lu'e'. As koxhlik viji' u Lu'e' vi' ch'ach ta'n xamal ch'o'm.
40008015	As itxey ve't u Jesús iq'ab' viji' u Lu'e'. As yak kuxh el ve't u xamal ch'o'me' sti'. As txakpu ve'te'. As taq' ve't viji' u Lu'e' techb'ub'al unq'a uxhchile'.
40008016	As tul tz'otin ve'te', as ye' saach unq'a aach'o'me' eq'ol tzan vatz u Jesús. Atik unq'a aach'o'me' uva' atik ok sub'ul sk'atz. As tuk' viyol Aake' as kat el unq'a sub'ule'. As ib'a'nxisa Aak unq'a aach'o'me' skajayil.
40008017	As b'ex ib'an ve't uma't u yol uva' kat tal kan u Isaías, u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', uva' ech tal ile': Aake' la taq' tib' sqi' ti' teesat u kuch'o'me' tuk' unq'a vee' nich'o'nsan o', ti'k u yole'.
40008018	As tul til u Jesús uva' a' chit mama'la tename' nikat imol tib' k'atz Aak, as tal ve't Aak iq'ax jalit u mar.
40008019	As jetz'en ve't ok uma'l u naj k'atz Aak, uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite'. As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Pap, a' ni vale' uva' la xekeb' in see', katil kuxh uva' la b'enkat axh,— ti'k naj.
40008020	Ech tal u Jesús ile': —Unq'a chisi as at ijul txoo. As unq'a tz'ikine' uva' nixich'an vatz u almika'e' tan at isok txoo. Pet ech koj tan ye'l ivitz' ati uva' la q'a'eb' ok sti',— ti'k u Jesús.
40008021	As ech tal uma't vichusulib' Aak ile': —Pap, la xekeb' in see' ni vale', poro lanal b'en unmuj kan ak unb'aale' b'axa. As a'n la xekeb' ine' see',— ti'k naj.
40008022	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Xekeb'en svi' cheel. Imuje'n tib' unq'a uxhchile' svatzaj uva' kamnal u taanxelale' vatz u Tiixhe',— ti'k Aak.
40008023	As tul ok ve't u Jesús tu uma't u barco, as xekeb' ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aake' sti'.
40008024	As vat ve't u Jesús. As xe't ve't uma'l u mam kajiq' jab'al vi' u mar. As va'lik chit ipilq'ut tib' u a'e' ta'n u mam kajiq' jab'ale'. As nik tok ve't u a'e' tu u barco. As b'iit kuxh ye' nik ib'en ve't u barco xe' u mar.
40008025	As b'ex ib'ey ve't chajnaj u Jesús. Ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te Aak: —¡Loch o', Pap, tan tuk b'enoj ve't o' xe' u a'e'!— ti'k chajnaj.
40008026	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —¿Kam q'i nexo'va, ex uva' b'iil kuxh u k'ujleb'al ek'u'le' ati?— ti'k Aak. As txakpu ve't u Jesús. As iyaa ve't Aak u kajiq'e' tuk' u mar. As yak kuxh ya' ve't u a'e' ti' ipilq'ut tib'.
40008027	As yak kuxh samun ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aake'. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' svatzaj: —¡Xo'veb'al u tijle'm Aake', tan ninimal Aak ta'n u kajiq' jab'ale' tuk' u mar!— ti'k chajnaj svatzaj.
40008028	As oon ve't u Jesús jalit u mar tu vitx'ava' unq'a aa Gadara. As ul ilej Aak ka'va'l unq'a naj uva' atik ok sub'ul sk'atz. As a' elkat ch'u'l chajnaj tu u vi' kamnaje'. As ab'il koj nikat itx'ak ipal tu u b'eye' uve' atikkat unq'a naje' uve' atik u sub'ule' sk'atz, tan ye'xheb'il nik ichajpu pal chajnaj.
40008029	As sik'in ve't chajnaj. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¡Jesús, iK'aol Tiixh! ¿Kam nasa' sqe? ¿As ma kat ulyu ve't axh ti' ayansat o'? As tul ye'l u q'iie' ileje'te,— ti'k unq'a naje' tal te u Jesús.
40008030	As nik ik'uachin unjolol unq'a chicham najlich uve' atikkat u Jesús.
40008031	As ech tal unq'a sub'ul ile' tul ijaj b'a'nil te u Jesús: —Asoj la atilu el o', as b'an b'a'nil. Aq' qokeb'al ti' unq'a chichame',— ti'k unq'a sub'ule'.
40008032	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —¡B'enoj ex b'a!— ti'k Aak. As el ve't ch'u'l unq'a sub'ule' k'atz unq'a naje'. As ok ve't unq'a sub'ule' ti' unq'a chichame'. As ooje'l ib'en ve't unq'a chichame'. As chajpik ve't b'en txoo vatz vitz ti' toon tu u mar. As kam ve't txoo skajayil xe' u mar.
40008033	As ooj ve't unq'a xeen chichame'. As tul oon ve't chajnaj tu u tename', as tal ve't chajnaj kam kat ib'an unq'a naje' uve' atik ok unq'a sub'ule' sk'atz as tuk' uve' kat ib'an unq'a chichame'.
40008034	As el ve't ch'u'l unq'a uxhchile' skajayil uve' atik tu u tename' ti' ichukpu u Jesús. Tul lejpu ve't Aak, as ijaj ve't unq'a uxhchile' b'a'nil te Aak ti' uva' la el ve't Aak tzitzi'.
40009001	As ok ve't u Jesús tu u barco unpajte. As q'aav ve't Aak tu u tename' uva' jejlikkat Aak.
40009002	As eq'ol ve't tzan uma'l u aach'o'm vi' uma'l u ch'achi'm tze', tan tze'unik tib' vichi'ole'. As oksal ve't u aach'o'me' vatz u Jesús. Tul til u Jesús uva' k'ujlik chit ik'u'l chajnaj ti' Aak, as ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u aach'o'me': —Ye' txumun axh, vitz'in vatzik, tan kat sotzye' vapaave',— ti'k Aak.
40009003	As tul tab'i unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', as ech tal ve't je' chajnaj ile' ste: —¡Ni teesa naj iq'ii u Tiixhe' tuk' viyole'!— ti'k chajnaj.
40009004	Atik sk'u'l u Jesús uva' kam nik tal je' chajnaj ste. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —¿Kam q'i uve' va'len kuxh netitz'a ti' vunyole' uva' kat vala?
40009005	¿As ab'iste uma'toj q'i uva' ye' la oleb' in ti' ib'anche' uva' netitz'a? ¿Ma ti' uva': «Kat sotzye' vapaave',» chaj in te u aach'o'me'? ¿Pet moj: «Txakpen. As kuxh ve'te',» chaj in la val te u aach'o'me'?
40009006	Pet aq'al uva' la etootzi u tijle'm ti' ul isotzsat ipaav unq'a aapaave' vatz u tx'ava'e', as sevatz tuk valkat te u aach'o'me',— ti'k Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u aach'o'me': —Txakpen. As eq'o vasoke'. As kuxh ve't takab'al,— ti'k Aak.
40009007	As yak kuxh txakpu ve't u aach'o'me' uva' tze'unik tib' vichi'ole'. As b'en ve't naj tikab'al.
40009008	As tul til ve't unq'a tename' uve' ib'an u Jesús, as teq'o ve't taama unq'a tename'. As toksa ve't unq'a tename' iq'ii u Tiixhe', tan ti' uva' ma'tik taq'at Aak tijle'm u Jesús ti' ilochat unq'a uxhchile'.
40009009	As tul pal ve't u Jesús tzi' u mar, as til ve't Aak uma'l u naj uva' Mateo ib'ii uva' xonlik tu u atinb'al uva' nimolpukat puaj tetz u Roma. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te naj: —Si'u. Xekeb'en svi',— ti'k Aak. As txakpu ve't u Mateo. As xekeb' ve't naj ti' u Jesús.
40009010	As b'ex ve't u Jesús tx'a'on tikab'al u Mateo. Nimal unq'a molol puaje' tetz Roma tuk' unjoltu unq'a uxhchile' uve' ye' ni niman u Tiixhe', as xoneb' ve't ok chajnaj k'atz u Jesús tuk' unq'a ichusulib' Aake'.
40009011	Tul til ve't unq'a fariseo, as ich'oti ve't chajnaj itzi' unq'a ichusulib' Aake'. —¿Kam q'i uva' nu kuxh itx'a'nik ok vechusule' xo'l unq'a aapaave' tuk' unq'a molol puaje' tetz u Roma?— ti'k chajnaj.
40009012	As tul tab'i ve't u Jesús uva' ech nik tal unq'a fariseo, as ech tal ve't Aak ile' te chajnaj: —Ab'il uve' ye'l ch'o'm sti', as ye'l u aatz'ake' la txakon sti'. Pet a' unq'a aach'o'me' uve' nitxakon u aatz'ake' sti'.
40009013	As b'enoj echustaj kam isuuchil u yole' uva' ech ni tal ile': A' ni val sete uva' la etxum ivatz vemoole'. As a'e' uve' b'a'n sve ti' unq'a txooe' uva' la yatz'pu sunvatz, ti'k u yole'.  Esti'e' tuk val sete uva' jit unq'a uxhchile' tul unmolo uva' ni tal je' ste uva' ye'l ipaav ati. Pet unq'a uxhchile' uva' nich'o'n ste uva' kat paavini, as a'e' tul unmolo, aq'al uva' la ijalpu ve't vitxumb'ale',— ti'k u Jesús.
40009014	As ul ich'oti ve't ka'l vichusulib' u Xhune' te u Jesús. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Kam q'i, Pap? Tan o' tuk' unq'a fariseo as jatpajul kuxh nu kukuy kuva'y vatz u Tiixhe'. ¿As kam q'i uva' ye' nikuy unq'a achusulib'e' iva'y?— ti'k chajnaj tal te Aak.
40009015	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —As tul uva' at umaj nimla q'ii ti' teq'ot tib' umaj me'al ik'aol umaj uxhchil, ¿as lakol uch q'a uva' la ikuy unq'a ilonaale' iva'y tul il u tzumela ile' at tu u nimla q'iie'? Pet lanal ilej uma'l u q'ii uve' la ul eesal el u tzumelae' sxo'l. As a'n la ikuy ve't unq'a ilonaale' iva'y.
40009016	As ye'xheb'il la k'ooan umaj q'a'l oksa'm ta'n umaj u ak' k'oo, tan la iq'ix u ak' k'ooe' u q'a'l oksa'me'. As aal chit la q'ixmu ve't u q'a'l oksa'me' ta'n u ak' k'ooe'.
40009017	As ye' la uch taq'ax ku' u ak' vino tu umaj q'a'l tz'u'm uva' ech tilone' xhaalo, tan la iq'ix u ak' vino u q'a'l tz'u'me', tul la q'u'ili. As la peq'xik el u vino. As la tz'ejxu ve't u tz'u'me' tuk' u vino. Pet tu umaj ak' tz'u'm la ku'kat u ak' vino, aq'al uva' ye' la tz'ejxi. As mita'n la yan u tz'u'me',— ti'k u Jesús.
40009018	As antelik iyolon u Jesús tul b'ex uloj uma'l viq'esal unq'a tiaal Israel. As qaaeb' ve't naj vatz Aak. As ech tal naj ile': —B'an b'a'nil, Pap. Kuxh il vas unme'ale' uve' kat kamya. As b'an b'a'nil. Kuxh ila. As la aaq' je' aq'ab' sti', aq'al uva' la ul taama,— ti'k naj tala.
40009019	As txakpu ve't u Jesús. As b'en ve't Aak ti' naj tuk' unq'a ichusulib'e'.
40009020	As tul nik ixaan u Jesús tu b'ey, as ul ve't uma'l u ixoj k'atz Aak uva' kab'lavaxnik yaab' ixe't ixoj ch'o'noj, tan a' vitx'aao u ixoje' ye' nikat iya'e'. Pet at kuxh ve't sb'enameen. As jetz'en ok ixoj ti' iqul Aak. As ikano'k ixoj u toksa'm Aake',
40009021	tan ech nik tal je' ixoj ile' ste: «Tul kuxh la unkano'k u toksa'm u Jesús, as tuk b'a'nxoj ine',» ti'k ixoj.
40009022	As isuchq'i ve't tib' u Jesús. As isaji ve't b'en Aak ixoj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ye' txumun axh, ixoj, tan kat elyu ve't u ch'o'me' see', tan ti' uva' kat ak'ujb'a' ak'u'l svi',— ti'k u Jesús. As yak kuxh el ve't u ch'o'me' ti' ixoj.
40009023	As tul oon ve't u Jesús tu vikab'al u Jairo, as isaji ve't b'en Aak unq'a naje' uve' nik oq'san u su'e' k'atz u kamnaje'. As til ve't Aak uva' va'l chit toq' unq'a uxhchile' k'atz u kamnaje'.
40009024	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te unq'a uxhchile': —¡B'enoj el ex ti' kab'al! Tan ye'l u xvaake' kamnal koj. Pet vatik kuxhe',— ti'k Aak. As itze'le kuxh unq'a tename' viyol Aake'.
40009025	As tul el ve't ch'u'l unq'a uxhchile', as ok ve't Aak tu kab'al. As itxey ve't Aak iq'ab' u xvaake'. As txakpu ve't ixoj.
40009026	As pax ve't itzib'lal u yole' tulaj unq'a tename' as tu unjoltu unq'a atinb'ale' ti' uve' ib'an u Jesús.
40009027	As tul el ve't ch'u'l u Jesús tzitzi', as xekeb' b'en ka'va'l unq'a tzot ti' Aak. As sik'in ve't chajnaj. Ech nikat tal chajnaj ile': —¡Pap tiaal David, txum kuvatz!— ti'k chajnaj.
40009028	As oon ve't u Jesús tu kab'al. As jetz'en ve't ok unq'a tzote' k'atz Aak. As ich'oti ve't Aak te chajnaj: —¿Ma nenima uva' la untx'ol unb'a'nxisat vevatze'?— ti'k Aak. —Kano, Pap. B'an b'a'nil sqe,— ti'k chajnaj.
40009029	As ikan ve't u Jesús vivatz chajnaje'. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te chajnaj: —Tan ti' uva' kat ek'ujb'a' ek'u'l svi' as tuk unb'a'nxisa vevatze',— ti'k u Jesús.
40009030	As yak kuxh b'a'nx ve't vivatz chajnaje'. As ilon ve't chajnaj. As tal ve't Aak te chajnaj ti' uva' ye'xheb'il la tal chajnaj ste ti' uva' kat ib'a'nxisa Aak vivatz chajnaje'.
40009031	Pet tul kuxh el ch'u'l chajnaj k'atz u Jesús, as b'ex ipaxsa ve't chajnaj itzib'lal Aak tulaj unq'a tename' as tulaj unjoltu unq'a atinb'ale'.
40009032	As tul uva' nik ipaxsa ve't chajnaj itzib'lal u Jesús, as eq'ol ve't ok uma'l u aach'o'm vatz Aak uva' mem ta'n u sub'ule'.
40009033	As teesa ve't u Jesús u sub'ule' ti' u naje'. As yolon ve't naj. As teq'o ve't taama unq'a tename' skajayil. As ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile' svatzaj: —Ye' atixoj qil ib'a'nx ve't umaj uxhchil tu kutename' eche' uve' kat qilla',— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
40009034	Pet ech koj unq'a fariseo, tan ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —A' vib'ooq'ol unq'a sub'ule' aq'ol tetz u tijle'm naje' ti' teesal el unq'a sub'ule',— ti'k chajnaj.
40009035	As isoli ve't u Jesús unq'a tename' tuk' unq'a talaj tename'. As nik ichusun ve't Aak tulaj unq'a atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh. As nikat tal Aak isuuchil u b'a'nla yole' ti' u Tiixhe' uva' la ul ve't tuk' u tijle'me' ti' vitename'. As kam kuxh ch'o'mil uve' atik xo'l unq'a tename' as nik ib'a'nxisa ve't Aak unq'a aach'o'me' skajayil.
40009036	As tul til ve't u Jesús u mama'la tename' uva' ech tatine' eche' unjoloj kaneero' uva' ye'l xeen tetz ati, as itxum ve't Aak ivatz.
40009037	Ech tal ve't Aak ile' te unq'a ichusulib'e': —Ech ve't tatin unq'a tename' eche' unq'a ko'me' uva' la pitx'lu ve'te'. As tul ka'l kuxh unq'a aq'onvile' ati.
40009038	Pet ejajtaj te Tiixhe' ti' uva' la ichaj tzan Aak unq'a aq'onvile' ti' ipitx'lu ve't u ko'me',— ti'k u Jesús.
40010001	As imolo ve't u Jesús kab'laval unq'a ichusulib'e'. As taq' ve't Aak tijle'm chajnaj ti' teesal unq'a sub'ule' as ti' ib'a'nxisal unq'a aach'o'me', k'uxh kam kuxh ch'o'mil nik b'anon.
40010002	A' vib'ii kab'laval unq'a apóstol u vi'la': U Simón uva' Lu'; tuk' u Lixh, u titz'in u Simón; u Jacobo, vik'aol u Zebedeo; u Xhun, u titz'in u Jacobo;
40010003	u Pi'l; u Bartolomé; u Maxh; u Mateo uva' nik molon puaj tetz u Roma; uma't u Jacobo, vik'aol u Alfeo; u Tadeo;
40010004	uma't u Simón uva' echenik xo'l unq'a tenam uva' nik alon itilul el unq'a ib'ooq'ol unq'a tename' uva' atik kan ta'n u ijlenaale' tu u Roma; tuk' u Judas uva' Iscariote uva' kat k'ayin u Jesús.
40010005	As ichaj ve't b'en u Jesús kab'laval unq'a apóstol. As ech tal Aak ile' te chajnaj: —Tul la b'en ex, as ye' la ok ex xo'l unq'a uxhchile' uve' jit tiaal Israel. As mita'n xo'l unq'a tename' tu u Samaria la okkat ex.
40010006	Pet a' la okkat ex b'axa xo'l unq'a tename' uve' tiaal Israel, tan ech tatin unq'a uxhchile' eche' unjoloj unq'a kaneero' uve' tz'ejxinajle.
40010007	As b'en epasataj u yole', as ech la b'en etal ile' ste: Tan il u Tiixh ile' tul ve't tuk' u tijle'me' ti' vitename', chaj ex la etale'.
40010008	As b'en eb'a'nxisataj unq'a aach'o'me' tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' ato'k ch'a'k chin sti'. As etulsataj taama unq'a kamnaje'. As eteesataj el unq'a sub'ule' ti' unq'a uxhchile'. Asoj la eb'an umaj b'a'nil, as ejajak ija'mil, tan oyamal kuxhe' vetijle'me'.
40010009	As eteq'ok epuaj tetz b'ey.
40010010	As mita'n uma'toj kam la eteq'o. Eteq'ok uma'toj exa'p; eteq'ok ch'expub' eti'. As eteq'ok esam; as eteq'ok etechb'ub'al, tan uma'l u aq'onvil as tetz chite' uva' la aq'pu ve't u techb'ub'ale'.
40010011	As tul la oon ex tu umaj tenam moj tu umaj tal tenam, as la echuk umaj uxhchil uva' b'a'n itxumb'al. As la ejaj evatb'al ste. As tzitzi' la atinkat ex lanal el ch'u'l ex tu u tename'.
40010012	Tul la ok ex tu u kab'ale', as la etiixhi unq'a uxhchile' uve' at tu u kab'ale'.
40010013	Asoj b'a'n itxumb'al unq'a uxhchile' la ib'an sete, as b'a'n tatin svatzaj la ib'ane' ta'n u Tiixhe'. Asoj ye'le, as ye' b'a'n tatin u uxhchile' svatzaj. Pet ech koj ex tan b'a'n chit etatine' sevatzaj la ib'ane'.
40010014	Pet ab'il uva' ye' la k'ulun ex as ye' la isa' tab'it veyole', as la el ch'u'l ex tu u kab'ale' moj tu u tename' katil uva' ye' la k'ulpukat ex. As la echitu ve't el u pojoe' ti' vetoje' texhlal tetz uva' ye' b'a'n vitxumb'al unq'a tename'.
40010015	As jik chit tuk val sete, tan la ilej uma'l u q'ii uva' la ul u k'axk'oe' ti' u tename'. As xo'veb'al chit u k'axk'oe' la ib'ane' ti' uve' kat ib'an tu u Sodoma tuk' u Gomorra.
40010016	As tuk unchaj b'en ex. As ech eb'ene' eche' ib'en unjoloj kaneero' xo'l unq'a xo'e'. Pet atoj enachb'al eche' nib'an unq'a tx'i'latxooe'. As sula aama ex la ib'ane' eche' nib'an unq'a paroomaxhe'.
40010017	As atoj enachb'al vatz unq'a uxhchile', tan la eq'ol ok ex vatz unq'a b'anol tetz isuuchil unq'a tename'. As la q'ospu ve't ex tulaj unq'a atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh.
40010018	As ti' kuxh uva' k'ujle'l ek'u'l svi', as la eq'ol ve't ok ex vatz unq'a ijlenaale' as vatz unq'a b'anol ivatz u ijlenaale'. As la etal ve't vunyole' te unq'a ijlenaale' as te unq'a uxhchile' uva' jit tiaal Israel.
40010019	As tul la txeypik b'en ex vatz unq'a ijlenaale', as xaani'k kuxh etaama ti' uva' kam la etale', tan la aq'ax ve't eyol kam uva' la etal ve'te'.
40010020	As jit ve't exe' la yolon ex. Pet a' u Tiixhla Espíritu la aq'on veyole' kam uva' la etale'.
40010021	As la ixoch ve't tib' unq'a uxhchile' tuk' unq'a titz'in tatzike' ti' iyatz'at tib'. As echat la ib'an unq'a b'aalae' te unq'a me'al ik'aole'. As la ul ve't ivi' unq'a me'al k'aole' ti' vib'aale'. As la tal ve't iyatz'pu vib'aale'.
40010022	As la ixval ve't ex ta'n unq'a tename' ti' kuxh uva' k'ujle'l ek'u'l svi'. As ab'il uva' ye' la iya'sa inimat in, k'uxh kam kuxh k'axk'o la ipaleb'e, as at itiichajil sunk'atz la ib'ane'.
40010023	Asoj la tilul ex tu umaj tenam, as la ooj ex ti' etoon tu uma't u tenam, tan tuk val sete uva' ye'xnaj oleb' ex ti' isolil vitenam unq'a tiaal Israele' skajayil tul la b'en uloj .
40010024	As tuk chit ixvaloj ex, tan ye'l umaj u chusulib'e' uva' at pal ti' u chusul tetze'. As ye'l umaj k'am at pal ti' vib'aal u aq'one'.
40010025	As kat ib'anle' uva' la epaleb'e unq'a k'axk'oe' eche' uve' nunpaleb'e. As tul in vechusule'. As echat chit la ib'an u k'ame' eche' nib'an u b'aal aq'one'. As ech u vatine' sexo'l eche' umaj b'aala xo'l unq'a me'al ik'aole'. Asoj kat alpi uva': «Axh Beelzebú uva' vib'ooq'ol unq'a sub'ule',» ch'elel u b'aalae', ¿as a' kol chit ye' la alax q'a ti' unq'a me'al ik'aole'?
40010026	Pet xo'vi'k ex te unq'a tename', tan jank'al unq'a yole' uva' ye'xheb'il ootzin tetz, as techal la ootzili. As jank'al unq'a yole' uva' mujel, as techal la ootzili.
40010027	As jank'al unq'a yole' uve' ni val sete cheel, as techal la b'en etal isuuchil te unq'a uxhchile'. As jank'al unq'a yole' uve' nu kuyol skujunal setuk' as b'enoj etaltaj vi' unq'a tename' skajayil.
40010028	As xo'vi'k ex te unq'a uxhchile' uve' la yatz'on vechi'ole', tan eche' la koj oleb' ti' iyatz'at vetaanxelale'. Pet exo'vataj u Tiixhe', tan la taq' b'en Aak vechi'ole' tuk' vetaanxelale' tu u choob'al paave'.
40010029	As ootzimal seta'n uva' ye'xh jatva'l nib'enkat ka'vo'j talaj tz'ikin tul nik'ayile'. As eche' la kuxh koj chajpik tzan txoo tu tx'ava', asoj jit u Kub'aal Tiixhe' la alon.
40010030	Echat kuxh ex unpajte, tan junun unq'a xi'l evi'e', as achele' skajayil ta'n Aak.
40010031	Esti'e' ni val sete uva' xo'vi'k chit ex, tan nim etalche' vatz u Tiixhe' ti' unq'a talaj tz'ikine'.
40010032	As ab'il uva' ye' la xo'vi ti' talat tib' uva' nimamal in sta'n vatz unq'a tename', as echat la unb'an sti' vatz vunB'aale' uva' echen tu almika'.
40010033	Pet ab'il uva' la teesa tib' sunk'atz vatz unq'a tename', as echat la unb'an sti' vatz vunB'aale' uva' echen tu almika'.
40010034	As kamal netitz'a uva' kat ul in ti' uva' b'a'n tatin unq'a uxhchile' svatzaj vatz u tx'ava'e', as tul ye'le tan aal tuk okoj ve't ixo'l. As techal la iyatz' ve't tib' svatzaj.
40010035	As tul kat ul in, as at unq'a naje' kat iyaa tib' tuk' vib'aale'. As at unq'a ixoje' kat iyaa tib' tuk' vitxutxe' as unq'a alib'ae' tuk' u talib'e'.
40010036	Tan ye'le uva' kat koj chit la ulkat unq'a ch'o'nchil aamae'. Pet an kuxh unq'a titz'in tatzike' la oksan u ch'o'nchil aamaile'.
40010037	Esti'e' ni val sete uva' ab'il uve' a' kuxh vitxutxe' moj vib'aale' la ixo'ni as ye' la ixo'ni in, as jit tetze' uva' la ok sunk'atz. As ab'il uve' a' kuxh la ixo'ni u me'al ik'aole' as ye' la ixo'ni in, as jit tetze' uva' la ok sunk'atz.
40010038	As ab'il uva' ye' la kuyun unq'a k'axk'oe' ti' ixekeb' svi', as ye' la uch tok ve't chusulib'il sunk'atz.
40010039	As ab'il uve' a' kuxh vitiichajile' ni titz'a ve't vatz u tx'ava'e', as ye'l itiichajil k'atz u Tiixhe' la ib'ane'. Pet ab'il uva' ye' la toksa taama ti' u vatz tx'ava'e' tan ti' uva' nimamal in sta'n, as at itiichajil k'atz u Tiixhe'.
40010040	As ab'il uve' la k'ulun ex as eela kuxh stuk' uva' in nik'ul in. As ab'il uve' ni k'ulun in as eela kuxh stuk' uva' a' vunB'aale' nik'ule'.
40010041	As ab'il uve' la k'ulun umaj u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', as eela kuxh vitx'aja'me' tuk' vitx'aja'm u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe'. As ab'il uva' la k'ulun umaj u jikla aama as eela kuxh vitx'aja'me' tuk' vitx'aja'm u jikla aamae'.
40010042	As ab'il la aq'on umaj u picheel che'vla a' te umaj vunchusulib'e' ti' kuxh uva' unchusulib', as jik chit tuk val sete uva' at itx'aja'm xe' u Tiixhe',— ti'k u Jesús.
40011001	As tul ya' ve't u Jesús ti' talat b'en itxumb'al kab'laval unq'a ichusulib'e', as b'en ve't Aak ti' ichusune' as ti' ipaxsat viyol u Tiixhe' tulaj unq'a tename'.
40011002	As tul atik ok u Xhune' tu u kaarsa, as tab'i ve't naj itzib'lal u Jesucristo. As ichaj ve't b'en u Xhune' ka'va'l unq'a ichusulib'e'
40011003	ti' b'en ich'otit te Aak. Ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Ma axh u Cristo uva' alel kan uva' la uli? ¿Pet moj la kutx'eb' tul uma'toj uxhchil?— ti'k chajnaj.
40011004	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te unq'a ichusulib' u Xhune': —B'enoj etaltaj te u Xhune' kam uva' kat etila as kam uva' kat etab'i,
40011005	tan ni tilon ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' tzotike; as nixaan ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' ko'xike; as unq'a uxhchile' uve' atik ok ch'a'k chin sti', as kat txanyu ve'te'; as ni tab'in ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' ye' nik tab'ine'; as kat ulyu ve't taama unq'a kamnaje'. As ni talax ve't u b'a'nla yole' te unq'a meeb'a'e'.
40011006	As achveb'al chit u uxhchile' uva' ye' la ka'kab'in taama ti' ik'ujb'a't ik'u'l svi',— ti'k u Jesús tal te chajnaj.
40011007	Tul q'aav ve't unq'a ichusulib' u Xhune', as tal ve't u Jesús isuuchil u yole' ti' u Xhune' xo'l unq'a tename'. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —¿Kam kat b'ex etil ti' u Xhune' tul atik tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e'? ¿Ma kat b'ex etil umaj uxhchil uva' ech vitxumb'ale' eche' vi'oj aa uva' niliiq'a'ch ta'n u kajiq'e'?
40011008	¿Pet moj a' kat b'ex etil umaj uxhchil uva' vejel chit tib' tuk' u toksa'me'? Ye'le, tan jank'al unq'a naje' uve' vejel chit tib' tuk' u toksa'me', as a' kuxh atkat chajnaje' tulaj ikab'al unq'a ijlenaale'.
40011009	¿Pet kam q'i kat b'ex etil ti' u Xhune'? ¿As moj umaj q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe'? Kano, an chite', tan q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' u Xhune'. Pet at pal u Xhune' ti' unjoltu unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe',
40011010	tan a' u Xhune' uva' ni tal u yole' uva' tz'ib'amal kan uva' ech ni tal ile': Tuk unb'axsa b'en uma'l u alol tetz vunyole' savatz. As a'e' la b'anon tuch u b'eye' savatz, ti'k u yole'.
40011011	As jik chit tuk val sete, tan ye'l uma'toj uxhchil kat itz'eb'i uva' nim talchu ti' u Xhune' uva' nik aq'on ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e'. Pet u uxhchile' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe', as ni tile' uve' nunb'ane', as antu ve't unq'a uxhchile' uve' tz'ub' kuxh talche' ni ilon, as nim ve't talche' ti' u Xhune', tan ye' kat til u Xhune' uve' nunb'ane'.
40011012	Tul xe't u Xhune' chusun, as xe't unq'a uxhchile' ti' iya'lut tib' ti' toksat tib' xo'l unq'a tename' uve' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe', tan a' ni tal unq'a uxhchile' uva' tuk' kuxh viyak'ile' uva' la ok xo'l unq'a itenam Aake'.
40011013	As kajayil chit unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', tuk' u tzaq'ite' uve' itz'ib'a kan u Moisés kat yolon kan ti' unq'a uva' ni tuch ve't cheel. As katnal ul ve't u Xhune' ti' ul ib'anata',
40011014	tan u Elías uva' alel kan u tuleb'ale' as ivaatzile' kat ul ib'an u Xhune'. Asoj la enima, as enimataj.
40011015	As ab'iste ex uva' nepal tu vunyole', as etab'itaj uve' ni vale'.
40011016	¿As kam unb'ooj la unb'an eela tuk' u txumb'ale' uve' neb'ane'? Tan eela kuxh vetxumb'ale' tuk' unq'a xaake' uve' nixoneb' tu k'ayib'al. As nisik'ine' tul nisaache'.
40011017	As ech ni tal ile' svatzaj: «K'uxh kat qoq'sa unq'a aae' sevatz, as ye'l ex kat b'ix ex; as k'uxh kat kub'itza unq'a b'itze' uva' txumleb'al chittu', as ye'l ex kat oq' ex,» ti'k chajnaj.
40011018	As tul kat ul u Xhune', as nik ikuy iva'y. As ye' nik tuk'a u ta'l u uuvae'. As kat eteesa iq'ii, tan kat etala uva' sub'ul atik ok sk'atz, uve' nik etale'.
40011019	As tul kat ul in, in, as nuntx'a'ne', as ni vuk'a u ta'l u uuvae'. As netal ve't svi' uva' in b'ich' uul as vetz k'ultzi' vib' tuk' unq'a molol puaje' tetz u Roma as tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' aapaav sevatz. Pet ech koj uve' la val sete, tan a' la etexhlakat u jikla txumb'ale' ti' uve' nunb'ane' as tuk' uve' kat ib'an u Xhune',— ti'k u Jesús.
40011020	As xe't iyaa ve't u Jesús unq'a tename' uva' ma'tik ik'uchat Aak unq'a mama'la b'a'nile' ste, tan ti' uva' ye' kat ijalpu ve't unq'a uxhchile' vitxumb'ale'. Ech tal ve't Aak ile' te unq'a uxhchile':
40011021	—¡Oyeb' chit evatz, ex aa Corazín; as oyeb' chit evatz, ex aa Betsaida! Tan a' koj kat unb'ankat unq'a nimla b'a'nile' vatz unq'a aa Tiro as vatz unq'a aa Sidón eche' uve' nunb'an sexo'l scheel, as na'ytzane'xh ijalput unq'a tename' itxumb'al vatz u Tiixhe'. As kat ik'uchle' uva' kat ijalpu ve't vitxumb'ale' ti' toksat unq'a qichkin oksa'me' as ti' taq'at je' tza'j tivi'.
40011022	Esti'e' ni val sete uva' xo'veb'al chit u k'axk'oe' uve' la ul seti' ti' unq'a aa Tiro tuk' unq'a aa Sidón, tul la ilej ve't u q'iie' uva' la b'anax isuuchil unq'a tename' skajayil.
40011023	As echat kuxh ex, ex aa Capernaúm, tan a' netale' uva' la oon ex tu almika' tuk' u tx'iib'al eq'iie'. As ye'le, tan a' la aq'pikkat b'en ex tu u k'axk'ola atinb'ale' uva' atkat unq'a kamnaje' uva' paasan tzii, tan tu koj u Sodoma ta' kat k'uchpukat unq'a b'a'nile' eche' uva' kat unk'uch sexo'l, as atile'xh unq'a aa Sodoma cheel.
40011024	Esti'e' ni val sete, tan xo'veb'al chit unq'a k'axk'oe' la ul seti' ti' unq'a k'axk'o uve' la ul ti' unq'a aa Sodoma tul la ilej u q'iie' ti' ib'anax isuuchil unq'a tename' skajayil,— ti'k u Jesús.
40011025	As an chit tu unq'a q'iie' inach ve't u Jesús Tiixh. Ech tal Aak ile': —UnB'aal, axhe' viB'aal u almika'e' tuk' u vatz tx'ava'e' skajayil. As ni voksa aq'ii, tan ti' uva' kat amuj ve't isuuchil unq'a yole' vatz unq'a uxhchile' uve' at itxumb'al ni tal je' ste. As a' kat ak'uchkat te unq'a uxhchile' uva' ech itxumb'ale' eche' unq'a talaj intxa'e'.
40011026	As an chite', unB'aal, tan eche' ta' uve' nasa',— ti'k u Jesús tul inach Aak Tiixh.
40011027	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te unq'a tename': —Tan at ve't vijle'm ti' unq'a vee' skajayil ta'n vunB'aale'. As ye'xheb'il ootzin vetz uva' in iK'aol u Tiixhe'. As ye'xheb'il ootzin tetz vunB'aale'. Pet ta'n kuxh ine' uva' ootzin tetz Aak as tuk' unq'a tename' uva' la unsa' vaq'at ste ti' uva' la tootzi Aak.
40011028	Esti'e' tuk val sete, si'unajtaj sunk'atz sekajayil, tan ine' la aq'on eti'leb'al, jank'al ex uve' koolinal ex ta'n vetaq'one' as ijtz'inalu ve't ex ta'n vepaave'.
40011029	As okojtaj ex sunk'atz. As eelataj kub'ene'. As echustaj etib' sunk'atz, tan in chit sula aama tuk' chit u vaanxelale'. As sunk'atz la elejkat u i'lichile' tetz vetaanxelale',
40011030	tan jit tza'le' ti' enimat vuntzaq'ite'. As ye'le uva' k'axk'o koj enimat u b'a'nla yole' uva' ni val sete,— ti'k u Jesús.
40012001	Tu uma'l u xeem q'ii, as b'ex paloj u Jesús tuk' unq'a ichusulib'e' xo'l unq'a trigo uva' avamalike. As nikat iva'y ve't chajnaj. As xe't itzuj ve't chajnaj ka'l ivatz unq'a trigo. As techb'u chajnaj.
40012002	Tul til ve't ka'l unq'a fariseo, as ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te u Jesús: —Saji u vee' nib'an unq'a achusulib'e', tan a'e' ye' la uch ib'anchu tu u xeem q'iie',— ti'k chajnaj.
40012003	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —¿Ma ye'xhkam b'a nesik'le uva' kat ib'an u David tuk' unq'a imoole' uva' xekik sti', tul uva' kat va'yi?
40012004	Tan kat ok ve't u David vatz u atinb'ale' uva' ninachpukat Tiixh. As unq'a paane' uva' ma'tik teesal el tzan vi' u meexhae' tu u nachb'al Tiixhe', as kat itx'a' u David tuk' unq'a imoole', k'uxh ye'l tokeb'al u David ti' techb'ut unq'a paane' as mita'n unq'a imoole' uva' xekelik sti'. Pet ta'n kuxh unq'a oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh la echb'un unq'a paane'.
40012005	¿As ma ye'xhkam b'a nesik'le tu u tzaq'ite' uve' itz'ib'a kan u Moisés ti' unq'a oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh? Tan jun xeem q'ii ni tok chajnaj tu u nachb'al Tiixhe' ti' ib'anat chajnaj u taq'one' ti' u tijle'me'. Tan k'uxh ye' la uch taq'onvu uxhchil tu u xeem q'iie', as ye'l ipaav unq'a nachol Tiixhe' vatz u Tiixhe' ti' u taq'one' uve' nib'an tu u xeem q'iie'.
40012006	As tuk val sete, tan at uma'l u uxhchil sexo'l cheel uva' nim chit talche' ti' u tostiixhe'. As ine' u uxhchile'.
40012007	As la koj pal ex stuul ti' uma'l u yol uva' ech ni tal ile': A' nunsa' uva' la etxum ivatz vemoole'. As a'e' uve' b'a'n sve ti' unq'a txooe' uve' la eyatz' je' tzan sunvatz, ti'k u yole'.  As nu koj epal stuul, as ye'l ipaave' unq'a uxhchile' la etaq' je' uve' ye'l ipaav ati.
40012008	As tul ine' uva' in, as ine' viB'aal u xeem q'iie',— ti'k u Jesús.
40012009	Tul ma'tik ipal u Jesús k'atz unq'a trigo, as ok ve't Aak tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh.
40012010	As atik ok uma'l u naj uva' k'oro'xhinik tib' uma'l viq'ab'e'. Tul nikat ichuk ka'l unq'a fariseo txumb'al ti' icheesat ipaav u Jesús. As ich'oti ve't chajnaj te Aak. Ech tal chajnaj ile': —¿Ma la uch ib'a'nxisal umaj aach'o'm tu u xeem q'iie' moj ye'le?— ti'k chajnaj.
40012011	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Asoj at umaj ex uva' at umaj ekaneero' as tul la b'en txoo tu umaj jul tu u xeem q'iie', ¿as ma ye' la b'en eteq'o je' tzan txoo tu u jule'?
40012012	¿As a' kol chit ye'l umaj uxhchil q'a? Tan nim talche' u uxhchile' ti' u kaneero'e'. Esti'e' ni val sete uva' la uch ib'anax u b'a'ne' tu u xeem q'iie',— ti'k u Jesús.
40012013	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u aach'o'me': —Yu'b'a' vaq'ab'e',— ti'k Aak. As iyu'b'a' ve't naj viq'ab'e'. As yak kuxh b'a'nx ve't viq'ab' naje'. As eela ve't viq'ab' naje' skaab'il ib'ana.
40012014	Tul el ve't ch'u'l unq'a fariseo tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh, as xe't iyol ve't chajnaj svatzaj ti' ichukax txumb'al ti' iyatz'pu u Jesús.
40012015	As ootzimalik ta'n u Jesús kam uva' nikat iyol ve't chajnaj. As el ve't ch'u'l Aak tu u tename'. As a' chit mama'la tename' xekeb' ve't ti' Aak. As nikat ib'a'nxisa ve't Aak unq'a aach'o'me' skajayil uva' kat oon k'atz Aak.
40012016	As tal u Jesús te chajnaj uva' ye'xh katil la talkat chajnaj uva' kam u tijle'm Aake'.
40012017	As b'ex ib'an ve't uma't u yol uva' tal kan u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' Isaías. Ech tal ile':
40012018	Il uma'l vunk'am ila' at sexo'l uva' txaael b'en sva'n, uva' xo'n chit sve. As tuk voksa vunTiixhla Espíritu sti', tan nitxuq'txun ve't vaama sti'. As a'e' la alon unq'a jikla yole' xo'l unq'a tename' uva' jit tiaal Israel.
40012019	As ye'l ch'a'o la ib'ane'. As ye'xhkam la sik'ini. As ye'xheb'il la ab'in u tuul ivi'e' tu b'ey.
40012020	As ye' la ul itatz' umaj aa uva' vuch'ul ve'te'. As ye'l u xamale' la itzaasa uve' nu kuxh ib'usb'ula'ne'. Pet techal chit la ilej ve't u q'iie' uva' la oleb' ve't ti' ik'ujb'a't u jikla txumb'ale' xo'l unq'a tename'.
40012021	As la ik'ujb'a' unq'a uxhchile' ik'u'l sti' uva' jit tiaal Israel, ti'k u yole' uva' tal kan u Isaías.
40012022	As eq'ol ok uma'l u aach'o'm vatz u Jesús uva' tzot as mem unpajte, tan atik ok sub'ul sk'atz. As ib'a'nxisa ve't u Jesús u naje'. As yolon ve't naj. As ilon naj.
40012023	As teq'o ve't taama unq'a tename'. As ech tal ve't ile' svatzaj: —¿Moj jit u tiaal David u naje' uva' alel kan u tuleb'ale'?— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
40012024	As tul tab'i ve't unq'a fariseo, as ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —Ye'le, pet a' vib'ooq'ol unq'a sub'ule' uva' Beelzebú ni aq'on tijle'm naj ti' teesal el unq'a sub'ule',— ti'k chajnaj.
40012025	As ootzimalik vitxumb'al chajnaje' ta'n u Jesús uva' kam nikat tal chajnaj ti' Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —As jank'al unq'a nimla tename', asoj jatxel tib', as ye'l iyol nik'ul tib' svatzaj. As la kuxh te'pisa ve't tib' u tename'. As echat tatin unq'a uxhchile' tu umaj tenam as moj tu umaj kab'al, tan asoj ye' la ik'ul tib' iyol svatzaj, as ye'l unq'a uxhchile' b'a'n koj tatine' la ib'ane'.
40012026	As echat kuxh b'anel ta'n u Satanás, tan asoj a' u Satanás ni laq'b'an el unq'a imoole', as jatxel tib'e' svatzaj. As la kuxh yook'e' u tatin u tx'i'lanaje'.
40012027	Tan asoj ni veesa el unq'a sub'ule' ta'n u Satanás uva' Beelzebú, ¿as ab'il etz u yak'ile' q'i uve' nitxakonsa unq'a echusulib'e' tul ni teesa el unq'a sub'ule'? As ech ni valkate' sete uva' an chit chajnaj ni k'uchun uva' sotznal ek'u'l tul ni teesa el chajnaj unq'a sub'ule'.
40012028	Pet nunlaq'b'a el unq'a sub'ule' ta'n viTiixhla Espíritu u Tiixhe', as a' texhlal tetze' uva' kat ulyu ve't u tijle'm u Tiixhe' ti' vitename'.
40012029	As la koj uch tok umaj uxhchil tikab'al umaj naj uva' xo'veb'al chit viyak'ile' ti' b'en telq'at el tzan u tetz naje'. Pet lanal k'alpe' u naje' uva' xo'veb'al chit viyak'ile', as a'n la uch telq'al ve't unq'a tetz naje'.
40012030	Pet tuk val sete, tan ab'il uva' jit echen sunk'atz, as a'e' ni ch'o'n taama svi'. As ab'il uve' ye' ni lochon in, as a'e' ni majon ivatz unq'a tename' ti' tok sunk'atz.
40012031	Esti'e' tuk val sete, tan kam kuxh yoq'o'mil la tal umaj uxhchil vatz u Tiixhe' as moj kam kuxh paavil la ib'an umaj uxhchil, as la uch isotzsal ipaav u uxhchile'. Pet ab'il uva' la yoq'on ti' u b'a'nile' uva' nib'an u Tiixhla Espíritu ti' talata' uva' a' u tx'i'lanaje' ni b'anon, as ye'l ipaav u uxhchile' la sotzi.
40012032	As ab'il uva' la yoq'on svi', in uva' in, as la uch isotz ipaav u uxhchile'. Pet asoj ab'il la yoq'on ti' u Tiixhla Espíritu, as ye'l ipaav u uxhchile' la sotz ve'te', mita'n cheel tu unq'a q'iia' as mita'n tu u q'iie' uve' tule'.
40012033	Tan asoj b'a'n u tze'e', as b'a'ne' vivatz tze'e'; asoj va'lexh u tze'e', as va'lexhe' ta' vivatz tze'e', tan la exhlal unq'a tze'e' tul la vatzin tze'.
40012034	¡Ech etxumb'ale' eche' unq'a tx'i'latxooe'! Tan la koj uch etalat umaj b'a'nla yol, tan a' u va'lexhe' uve' at tu vetaanxelale'. Tan kam uve' at tu vetaanxelale', as a'e' ni tal vetzi'e'.
40012035	As u b'a'nla aamae', tan a' kuxh unq'a b'a'nla chaj txumb'ale' ni tel ch'u'l tu u taanxelale'. Pet ech koj u uxhchile' uva' va'lexh vitxumb'ale', tan a' kuxh u va'lexhe' ni tel ch'u'l tu u taanxelale'.
40012036	As tuk val sete, tan jank'al unq'a va'lexhla chaj yole' uva' la tal unq'a uxhchile' as tuknal ch'otpoj itzi' ti' u va'lexhe' uve' kat tala, tul la ilej ve't u q'iie' ti' ib'anax isuuchil unq'a uxhchile'.
40012037	As a' ni val kate' tan an kuxh veyole' la b'anon uva' ye'l epaav ati. As an kuxh veyole' la alon eb'en tu u k'axk'oe',— ti'k u Jesús.
40012038	As ech tal ve't ka'l unq'a uxhchil ile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', as tuk' ka't unq'a fariseo: —Chusul, a' ni qale' uva' la qil ak'uchat umaj k'uchb'al tetz uva' at eejle'm,— ti'k chajnaj.
40012039	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —¡Ech ve't vetxumb'ale' eche' unq'a uxhchile' uva' va'lexh vitxumb'ale' nib'ane'! ¡As ech ve't ex vatz u Tiixhe' eche' umaj naj uva' nichuk tixoj! As k'uxh nejaj umaj k'uchb'al tetz u vijle'me', as eche' la koj k'uchpu sete. Pet a' kuxh uva' la k'uchpu sete eche' uva' kat ib'an u Jonás, u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe',
40012040	tan echat chit tuk unb'ane' eche' uve' kat ib'an u Jonás, tan oxva'l q'ii tuk' oxva't aq'b'al kat atin u Jonás tu tuul uma'l u nimla txay. As oxva'l q'ii tuk' oxva't aq'b'al tuk' atinoj tu u tx'ava'e'.
40012041	As la ul ve't unq'a aa Nínive vatz u Tiixhe' ti' ixochat ex tu u q'iie' uva' la b'anax isuuchil unq'a tename' skajayil, tan tul uva' tab'i unq'a tename' viyol u Jonás, as yak kuxh ik'axa tib'. Pet ech koj ex, tan k'uxh at in sexo'l uva' nim valche' ti' u Jonás, as ye' nek'axa etib'.
40012042	As ab'imale' seta'n uva' ib'an u ixoj uva' ijlenaalike tu u tenam uva' Sabá, tan tzi'a'n kat tzaakat ixoj ti' ul tab'it itxumb'al te u ijlenaal uva' Salomón. As tul la ilej u q'iie' ti' ib'anax isuuchil unq'a tename' skajayil, as antu ve't u ixoje' la uli ti' ixochat ex, tan k'uxh at in sexo'l, as ye' nesa' etab'it vunyole'. As tul nim valche' ti' u Salomón.
40012043	As la val sete, tan ech etatine' la ib'ane' eche' umaj uxhchil uva' kat el ch'u'l umaj sub'ul sk'atz. As kat kuxh xaan ve't u sub'ule' tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e' ti' ichukat ti'leb'al. As tul ye' kat ilej u ti'leb'ale',
40012044	as ech kat tal ve't je' ile' ste: «La q'aav ve't in tu u vatinb'ale' uve' kat elkat ch'u'l in,» chaj la tale'. As tul la oon ve't u sub'ule', as ech ve't tatin u uxhchile' eche' umaj kab'al uva' amle'l kuxhtu', as eesamal ve't ch'is stuul, as ch'i'umal tilone'.
40012045	As la b'en teq'o ve't tzan u sub'ule' vujva't imool uva' nim talche' ti' ib'anax u va'lexhe'. As la ok ve't unq'a sub'ule' k'atz u uxhchile'. As pal chit ve't ivi' la ib'an u uxhchile' ti' uva' nik ib'an b'axa. As echat chit tuk eb'ane', jank'al ex uva' va'lexh vetxumb'ale' neb'ane',— ti'k u Jesús.
40012046	As nikattel iyolon u Jesús xo'l unq'a uxhchile' tul b'ex oonoj ve't vitxutx Aake' tuk' unq'a titz'in Aake'. As nikat isa' cha'ma iyolon tuk' Aak. As a' kuxh atkat cha'ma ti' u kab'ale' uve' atikkat Aak.
40012047	As ech b'ex tal ve't uma'l u uxhchil ile' te u Jesús: —Il ak atxutx at ti' kab'al tuk' unq'a eetz'in. As nisa' aak iyolon see,— ti'k u uxhchile'.
40012048	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Tuk val sete uva' ab'il ech tatine' sunk'atz eche' vuntxutxe' as ab'il uva' ech tatine' sunk'atz eche' unq'a vitz'ine',— ti'k Aak.
40012049	As ik'uch ve't Aak unq'a ichusulib'e' ta'n iq'ab'. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —As ech exe' vuntxutxe'; as ech exe' unq'a vitz'ine',
40012050	tan jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni b'anon kam uve' ni tal u Tiixhe' uva' at tu almika', as ech tatine' eche' vitz'in, as ech tatine' eche' vanab', as ech tatine' eche' untxutx,— ti'k u Jesús.
40013001	An chit tu u q'iie', el ve't ch'u'l u Jesús tu kab'al. As b'ex ve't Aak xonloj tzi' u mar.
40013002	As a' chit mama'la tename' imol tib' ti' Aak. As ok ve't Aak tu uma'l u barco. Xoneb' ve't Aak. As kaaik ve't kan unq'a tename' tzi' u a'e'.
40013003	Nimal unq'a yole' nikat tal Aak te unq'a tename'. As tuk' k'uchuvatz nikat ichusunkat Aak. Ech tal Aak ile': —B'ex ve't uma'l u naj avoj.
40013004	As tul av naj, as at unq'a iiae' uva' echik toon tu b'ey. As ul unq'a tz'ikine'. As ijuna ve't txoo.
40013005	As at unq'a iiae' ech toon xo'l unq'a k'ub'e' uva' ye'lkat tuul tx'ava'. As oora chit kat b'uuq'i, tan ye'l tuul tx'ava' at xo'l unq'a k'ub'e'.
40013006	As tul kat tz'e'san ve't u q'iie', as oora kuxh kat tzaj ve'te', tan ti' uva' ye'l taq'il kat b'en ta'n unq'a k'ub'e'.
40013007	As at unq'a iiae' echik toon xo'l ch'i'x. As tul kat ch'ii unq'a ch'i'xe', as kat isoka ve't unq'a ch'i'xe' u chikoe'.
40013008	Pet ech koj unq'a iiae' uva' echik toon tu u b'a'nla tx'ava'e', tan kat taq' ivatz. As ati uva' kat aq'on o'k'alal (100) ivatz ti' junun vi'l; as ati uva' kat aq'on oxk'alal (60) ivatz; as ati uva' kat aq'on vinaj laval (30) ivatz.
40013009	As ab'iste ex uva' nepal tu vunyole', as etab'itaj uve' ni vale',— ti'k u Jesús.
40013010	As ijetz' ve't ok tib' unq'a ichusulib' u Jesús sk'atz. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te Aak: —¿Kam b'an ta'ne', Pap, uva' tuk' kuxh k'uchuvatz nachusunkat te unq'a tename'?— ti'k chajnaj.
40013011	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —As ex uva' at ve't ok ex xo'l unq'a tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'. As sete tuk valkat isuuchil u tijle'm u Tiixhe', as ye'xhib'il ootzin tetz. Pet ech koj unjoltu unq'a tename', as ye'xhkam la alax isuuchil ste.
40013012	As ab'il uva' ni toksa taama ti' inimat u yole', k'uxh b'iil kuxh nipal stuul, as la alpu isuuchil ste. As aal la chee itxumb'al sti'. Pet ech koj u uxhchile' uva' ye' ni toksa taama ti' tab'it u yole' as tuk' ti' inimata', as aal la sotzsal ve't u yole' sk'u'l.
40013013	Esti'e' uva' tuk' k'uchuvatz nunchusunkat xo'l unq'a tename', tan k'uxh ni tile' kam uve' nunb'ane' as k'uxh ni tab'i unq'a yole' uva' ni vale', as ye' nipal stuul.
40013014	As a'e' nib'ane' uva' itz'ib'a kan u Isaías, u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', uva' ech ni tal ile': K'uxh nimal yol la tab'i, as ye' la pal stuul; as k'uxh nimal unq'a vee' la tile', as ye' la texhla,
