41014053	As eq'ol ve't ok u Jesús vatz viq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh. As imol ve't tib' unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh, tuk' ka't unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', as tuk' ka't unq'a b'aal tename'.
41014054	As naach kuxh xekelikkat u Lu'e' ti' u Jesús techal toon ve't naj vatz iq'anal viq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh. As xonlik ve't ok u Lu'e' k'atz ka'l unq'a xeen tetz u tostiixhe' ti' ileeat ve't ok tib' vatz xamal.
41014055	As unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh tuk' ka't unq'a b'anol isuuchil unq'a tename' uve' molik ve't tib', tan nik ichuk chajnaj txumb'al tuk' ka'l unq'a cheesan paav ti' iyatz'pu ve't u Jesús. As ye'lik iyak'il u cheesa paave' uva' nik tal unq'a uxhchile',
41014056	tan k'uxh nimal unq'a uxhchile' nik cheesan ipaav Aak, as ye' nik ik'ul tib' iyol chajnaj svatzaj ti' uva' la yatz'pu ve't Aak sti'.
41014057	As txakpu ve't ka't unq'a naj ti' icheesal ipaav Aak. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile':
41014058	—Ech kat tal naj ile' kat qab'i: «La ve'pisa ve't u tostiixhe' uve' b'anel ta'n unq'a naje'. As oxva'l kuxh q'ii la unlak uma'te uva' jit unq'a naje' la b'anon,» ti'k naj,— ti'k unq'a cheesan tetz ipaav u Jesús.
41014059	Pet jit eela u cheesa paave' nik tal chajnaj ti' Aak.
41014060	As viq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh, as txakpu ve't naj ti' ich'otit ka'l u yol te u Jesús. As ech tal ve't naj ile' te Aak: —¿Kam q'i uve' ye' natiine'? ¿As kam ni tal axh ti' unq'a yole' uve' ni tal chajnaj see'?— ti'k naj.
41014061	As jit tiin u Jesús. As ye'l umaj yol tal Aak. As ech tal ve't naj ile' unpajte: —¿Ma axh u Cristo, viK'aol u Tiixhe' uva' ni toksal iq'ii?— ti'k naj.
41014062	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ine' uve' naale'. As la etil ve't in tul uva' xonle'l ve't in tu viseb'al u Kub'aal Tiixhe' uva' nim chit u tijle'me'. As la etil unku' ch'u'l tu almika' xo'l u suutz'e',— ti'k Aak.
41014063	As iq'ix ve't viq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh u toksa'me'. Ech tal ve't naj ile': —Jit tz'ajinal la ul uma'toj uxhchil ti' ixochpu naj,
41014064	tan kat etab'il u yole' uve' ni tal naj, tan ni toksa tib' naj Tiixhil. ¿As kam ni tal ex ti' naj?— ti'k naj. As kajayil chit unq'a uxhchile' uva' molik tib' alon ve'te' uva' tetz chit ve't u Jesús uva' la kam Aak.
41014065	As xe't ve't ka'l unq'a uxhchil ti' itzub'al Aak. As ijup ve't chajnaj ivatz Aak. As itop ve't chajnaj Aak ta'n q'ab'. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —Asoj axh q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', as q'iia uva' ab'il kat q'oson axh,— ti'k chajnaj. As itz'ich ve't unq'a xeen tetz u tostiixhe' ivatz Aak ta'n q'ab'.
41014066	As echenik ku' tzan u Lu'e' vatz iq'anal vikab'al viq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh. As ul ve't uma'l vik'am viq'esal unq'a nachol Tiixhe' uva' atikkat u Lu'e'.
41014067	As tul til ve't ixoj u Lu'e' uva' nik ileeo'k tib' naj vatz xamal, as ech tal ve't ixoj ile' tul aalik ok ixoj te naj: —Antik axhe' molonik eeb' tuk' u Jesús uva' aa Nazaret,— ti'k ixoj.
41014068	Ech tal ve't u Lu' ile': —Ye' vootzaj u naje' uve' naale'; as ye' la pal in tu u yole' uve' naale',— ti'k u Lu'e'. As el ve't ch'u'l naj tzi' kab'al. As tul b'ex oq'oj ve't u pele'xhe'.
41014069	As til ve't ixoj u Lu'e' unpajte. As ech tal ve't ok ixoj ile' te unq'a uxhchile' uve' atik tzitzi': —U naje' vi'le', as imool tib' naje' tuk' unq'a ichusulib' u Jesús,— ti'k ixoj.
41014070	As tal ve't u Lu'e' unpajte uva' ye' toojtzaj naj u Jesús. As unb'iil kuxh stuul, as ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile' te u Lu'e': —An chite' vil amool eeb'e' tuk' unq'a ichusulib' u Jesús, tan axh aa Galilea. As ech ayolone' eche' chajnaj,— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
41014071	As ech tal ve't u Lu' ile': —¡Asoj nu kuxh unchuli yol sevatz, as svi' la ulkat u va'lexhe', tan vatz u Tiixhe' ni valkat uva' ye' vootzaj u naje' uve' netale'!— ti'k u Lu'e'.
41014072	As oq' ve't u pele'xhe' tika'pa. As jub'in ve't tul viyol u Jesús sk'u'l u Lu'e' uva' ma'tik talat Aak: «Tul ye'xnaj oq' u pele'xhe' tika'pa, as oxpajul ma't eesat eeb' sunk'atz,» ti'k Aak. As tul ul ve't u yole' sk'u'l u Lu'e', as xe't ve't naj oq'oj.
41015001	As ku'saj chittu', as ik'ul ve't tib' viyol unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh, tuk' ka't unq'a b'aal tename', tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', as tuk' ka't unq'a b'anol isuuchil unq'a tename'. As iqitz ve't chajnaj u Jesús. As b'ex toksa ve't ok chajnaj Aak vatz u Pilato.
41015002	As ech tal ve't u Pilato ile': —¿Ma axh u tijlenaal unq'a tiaal Israel?— ti'k naj. —An chite' uve' naale',— ti'k u Jesús.
41015003	As unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh, as nimal ipaav Aak nikat icheesa chajnaj vatz u Pilato.
41015004	As ech tal ve't u Pilato ile' te u Jesús unpajte: —¿Ye' kuxh natiine'? As tul nimal chit apaav ni tal chajnaj,— ti'k naj.
41015005	As k'uxh ech alpe' te Aak, as mita'n tal Aak umaj yol. As sotz ve't ik'u'l u Pilato sti'.
41015006	As tu u nimla q'iie' uva' pascua, as nik ichajpu u Pilato uma'l u preexhu, ab'il uva' nikat tal unq'a tename' ichajpule'.
41015007	As atik ok uma'l u naj preexhuil uva' Barrabás. As txeyik naj tuk' ka't imool, tan ma'tik iyatz'on chajnaj ti' ib'anat ch'a'o ti' u ijlenaale'.
41015008	As ul tal ve't unq'a tename' te u Pilato uva' la ichajpu naj umaj u preexhue' tu u nimla q'iie' eche' uva' nik ib'an tu jun yaab'.
41015009	Ech tal ve't u Pilato ile': —¿Ma la esa' uva' la unchajpu u naje' uva' ni toksa tib' setijlenaalil?— ti'k naj,
41015010	tan atik ve't sk'u'l u Pilato uva' ta'n kuxh ch'o'nchil aama nikat toksakat unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh u Jesús tiq'ab' naj.
41015011	As unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh tuk' ka't unq'a b'aal tename', as toksa ve't chajnaj tivi' unq'a tename' ti' uva' a' u Barrabás la chajpuli.
41015012	As ech tal ve't u Pilato ile': —¿As kam nesa' q'i uva' la unb'an ti' vetijlenaale' uve' netale'?— ti'k naj.
41015013	As taq' ve't je' unq'a tename' tuul ivi'. Ech tal ile': —¡Yatz'poj naj vatz u kuruse'!— ti'k unq'a tename'.
41015014	—¿As kam ipaav u naje' q'i kat ib'ana?— ti'k u Pilato. As aal chit taq' je' unq'a tename' tuul ivi'. As ech tal ve't ile': —¡Yatz'poj naj vatz u kuruse'!— ti'k unq'a tename'.
41015015	As ichajpu ve't el tzan naj u Barrabás. As tal ve't naj iq'ospu u Jesús ta'n tz'u'm. As toksa ve't naj Aak tiq'ab' unq'a sole' ti' uva' la b'en yatz'poj Aak vatz u kuruse'. Tan a' nital u Pilato uva' b'a'n ikaa naj vatz u tename'.
41015016	As teq'o ve't ok unq'a sole' u Jesús vatz iq'anal vikab'al u b'anol ivatz u ijlenaale'. As imol ve't unq'a sole' unq'a imoole' skajayil.
41015017	As toksa ve't unq'a sole' uma'l u mura't oksa'm ti' u Jesús. As taq' ve't je' chajnaj uma'l u koroona ch'i'x ti' ivi' Aak uva' paatx'umalike.
41015018	As ech tal chajnaj ile' te Aak: —¡Keche, pap, axh tijlenaal unq'a tiaal Israel!— ti'k chajnaj ti' teesal iq'ii Aak.
41015019	As ivek' chajnaj uma'l u aa ti' ivi' Aak. As itzub'a ve't chajnaj Aak. As qaaeb' ve't chajnaj vatz Aak ti' itze'lel Aak.
41015020	As tul ma'tik teesat chajnaj iq'ii Aak, as teesa ve't el chajnaj u mura't oksa'me' ti' Aak. As toksa ve't chajnaj u toksa'm Aake' unpajte. As teq'o ve't el chajnaj Aak ti' iyatz'pu ve't Aak vatz u kuruse'.
41015021	As tul b'ex paloj uma'l u aa Cirene uva' aalik itzaa tu vitz, as itxey ve't unq'a sole' naj ti' uva' la tija naj u kuruse'. As Simón ib'ii u naje'. As naj ib'aal u Alejandro tuk' u Rufo.
41015022	As teq'o ve't unq'a sole' u Jesús tu u atinb'al uva' Gólgota ib'ii. (As a' isuuchil u yole' uva' Gólgota: Tatinb'al B'ajil K'o'n.)
41015023	As taq' ve't chajnaj unb'iil u ta'l uuva te Aak uva' yuel tib' tuk' k'ayla tz'akab'al uva' mirra ib'ii. As jit isa' Aak tuk'ata'.
41015024	As tul ma't taq'at ve't je' unq'a sole' u Jesús vatz u kuruse', as ijatx ve't chajnaj u toksa'm Aake' svatzaj. As itx'ak ve't tib' chajnaj ti' u toksa'm Aake' ti' uva' ab'iste u naje' la eq'on u toksa'm Aake'.
41015025	As b'eluval oora q'ala'm tul uva' taq' ve't je' unq'a sole' u Jesús vatz u kuruse'.
41015026	As atik ve't je' uma'l u aq'en tivi' u kuruse' uva' tz'ib'amalikkat uva' kam sti' la kamkat Aak. As ech nik tal u tz'ib' ile': ti'k u tz'ib'e'.
41015027	As antik ka'va't unq'a elq'om taq' je' chajnaj vatz ka'va't unq'a kuruse'. Uma'l naj je' tiseb'al u Jesús; as uma't naj timax Aak.
41015028	As a'e' kat ib'ana uva' tz'ib'amal kan uva' ech ni tal ile': As kat oksal ve't xo'l tachul unq'a paasan tzi'e', ti'k u yole'.
41015029	As tul uva' nik ipal unq'a uxhchile', as nik iyiku ivi' tul nikat iyoq'on ti' u Jesús. As ech nik tal ile' te Aak: —Nikat aale' uva' la e'pisa u tostiixhe'. As titoxvu q'ii la alak unpajte, uva' naale'.
41015030	As q'alpu eeb' vatz u kamchile' scheel. As ku'en ch'u'l vatz u kuruse',— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
41015031	As echat chit nik ib'an unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh, tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', tan ech nik tal chajnaj ile' svatzaj tul nikat iyoq'on ti' u Jesús: —K'uxh kat iq'alpu naj unq'a uxhchile' vatz unq'a ch'o'me', as ye' nitx'ol ve't naj iq'alput tib' vatz u kuruse'.
41015032	Asoj naj u Cristo, u tijlenaal u kutename' uva' tiaal Israel, as ku'oj ch'u'l naj vatz u kuruse'. As tul la qil iku' ch'u'l naj, as a'n la kunima ve't naj,— ti'k chajnaj. As echat nik ib'an unq'a naje' uve' atik je' vatz unq'a kuruse' k'atz u Jesús, tan nik teesa chajnaj iq'ii Aak.
41015033	As tul chaq'aan ve't q'ii, as tokin ve't ivatz u tx'ava'e'. As techanal oon ve't oxva'l oora ku'q'ii, as a'n ilon ve't u q'iie' unpajte.
41015034	As tul oon ve't oxva'l oora ku'q'ii, as taq' ve't je' u Jesús tuul ivi'. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —¿Eloi, Eloi, lama sabactani?— ti'k Aak. A' isuuchil u yole' uva': «¡Kub'aal Tiixh, Kub'aal Tiixh! ¿Kam q'i uve' nu kuxh aaq' kan in sunjunal?» ti'k Aak.
41015035	As ka'l unq'a uxhchil uva' atik tzitzi', as tul tab'i u yole' uva' tal u Jesús, as ech tal ve't ile' svatzaj: —¡Etab'itaj! Tan nimolo ve't naj u Elías,— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
41015036	As oora chit b'ex uma'l u naj ti' tak'sat uma'l u patxkin k'oo ta'n k'ayla ta'l uuva. As ik'alo'k naj ti' iju' uma'l u aa. As taq' ve't je' naj te u Jesús. As ech tal ve't naj ile': —¡Qe'na! ¡Qil kuxhtu'! Pet tuk qile' ma tuk uloj u Elías ti' teq'ol ku' tzan naj vatz u kuruse',— ti'k naj.
41015037	As aal chit taq' ve't je' u Jesús tuul ivi' ti' isik'ine'. As kam ve't Aak.
41015038	As q'ixmu ve't u nimla ixb'u'je' uve' nik jatxon tuul u tostiixhe'. As ka'va'l ku' u ixb'u'je' stuul, tan kat q'ixmik ku' tzan tivi' as kat ul xe' toj.
41015039	As viq'esal unq'a sole' uva' txaklik k'atz u kuruse', as tul tab'i naj isik'in u Jesús as til naj uva' kam ib'an Aak tul kat kam Aak, as ech tal ve't naj ile': —An chite' vil. IK'aol Tiixhe' vil u naje',— ti'k naj.
41015040	As atik ka'l unq'a ixoj tzitzi' uva' tzi'a'n kuxh nikat isajinkat ve't tzan tul uva' sikam ve't u Jesús. As antik u Ma'le' uva' tzaanaj tu u tenam uva' Magdala, tuk' uma't u Ma'le', vitxutx u Xhu'le' tuk' u Jacob uva' itz'ina, as tuk' u Salomé.
41015041	As a' unq'a ixoje' uva' xekelik ve't ti' u Jesús uva' nik lochon k'atz Aak tul atik Aak tu u Galilea. As antik unjoltu unq'a ixoj uva' xekelik ti' Aak tul kat b'en Aak tu u Jerusalén.
41015042	As nik ib'an unq'a tename' tuche' ti' inimat u xeem q'iie', tan aalik iku' ve't q'ii as b'iitik kuxh ixe't ve't u xeem q'iie'.
41015043	As esti'e' b'ex ve't uma'l u naj uva' Xhu'l ib'ii, u aa Arimatea uva' atik ok xo'l unq'a b'anol isuuchil unq'a tename', ti' ijajat vichi'ol u Jesús te u Pilato. As nik itx'eb' naj u q'iie' ti' ik'uchat u Tiixhe' uva' at u tename' jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'.
41015044	Tul tab'i ve't u Pilato uva' ma'tik ikam ve't u Jesús, as teq'o ve't taama naj. As imolo ve't naj viq'esal unq'a sole'. As ich'oti naj uva' ma kat chit kamyu ve't u Jesús.
41015045	As tul tal ve't viq'esal unq'a sole' isuuchil uva' kat kamyu Aak, as tal ve't u Pilato uva' la uch ve't teq'ot u Xhu'le' vichi'ol Aake'.
41015046	As b'ex iloq' ve't u Xhu'le' uma'l u saj maanta. As teq'o ve't ku' tzan naj vichi'ol u Jesús vatz u kuruse'. As ib'och ve't naj tu u ixb'u'je'. As b'ex imuj ve't kan naj tu uma'l u jul uva' k'otik ok vatz uma'l u pi'un. As ib'alq'u ve't ok naj uma'l u sivan tzi' u jule'.
41015047	As u Ma'le' uva' tzaanaj tu u tenam uva' Magdala tuk' u Ma'l uva' itxutx uma't u Xhu'le', as til ve't cha'ma katil uva' mujlukat u Jesús.
41016001	Tul ma'tik ipal u xeem q'iie', as b'ex iloq' ve't u Ma'le' uva' aa Magdala tx'umtx'ulla tz'akab'al, tuk' u Salomé, as tuk' u Ma'le' uva' itxutx u Jacob, tan nikat tal cha'ma uva' la b'en toksa cha'ma u tz'akab'ale' ti' vichi'ol u Jesús.
41016002	As tul kuxh b'uq' q'ii tu u b'axa q'iie' tu xhemaana, as b'en ve't unq'a ixoje' k'atz u jule' uva' mujlukat u Jesús.
41016003	As ech nik tal ve't cha'ma ile' svatzaj tu b'ey: —¿Ab'ile' q'i tuk eesan el u sivane' tzi' u jule' sukuvatz?— ti'k cha'ma.
41016004	As tul b'iitik kuxh toon cha'ma, as til ve't b'en cha'ma uva' eesamalik ve't el u nimla sivane' tzi' u jule'.
41016005	As oon ve't cha'ma. As tul ok ve't cha'ma tu u jule', as til ve't cha'ma uva' xonlik uma'l u ángel tiseb'al cha'ma uva' ech tilone' eche' umaj chelem naj. As atik ok uma'l u chelkin oksa'm sti' uva' va'lik chit ipolal. As yak chit xo'v ve't cha'ma sta'n.
41016006	As ech tal ve't u ángel ile' te cha'ma: —Ye' kuxh xo'v ex. Ootzimale' sva'n uva' a' u Jesús nechuke' uva' aa Nazaret uva' kat yatz'pu vatz u kuruse'. As kat ulyu taama unpajte. As etiltaj uve' kat mujlukat, tan ye'xhkam at ve't tzitza'.
41016007	As b'enoj ex; b'en etaltaj te unq'a ichusulib' Aake' as tuk' te u Lu'e', tan il Aak b'axel ve't sevatz tu u Galilea. As tzitzi' la etilkat Aak, eche' uva' tal kan Aak sete,— ti'k u ángel tal te unq'a ixoje'.
41016008	As va'lik chit it'unt'uch ve't cha'ma. As oojik ve't el tzan cha'ma tu u jule'. As ye'xheb'il tal cha'ma ste tu b'ey, tan nik ixo'v ve't cha'ma.
41016009	Tul ma'tik tul ve't taama u Jesús sq'ala'm tu u b'axa q'iie' tu u xhemaanae', as b'axel ik'uch ve't tib' Aak vatz u Ma'le' uva' aa Magdala, uva' ma'tik teesat Aak vujva'l u sub'ule' sk'atz.
41016010	As b'en ve't ixoj. B'ex tal ve't ixoj te ka't unq'a ichusulib' Aake' uva' na'xnik ixekeb' ti' Aak, tan va'lik chit toq'e' ta'n txumu'm.
41016011	As tul tab'i ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aake' u yole' uva' tal u Ma'le' ti' uva' ma'tik tilat ve't ixoj Aak, tan ma'tik tul taama Aak unpajte, as ye' nik inima ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aake' u yole' uva' nik tal ixoj.
41016012	As xamtik ve't stuul, as ik'uch ve't tib' Aak te ka'va't uxhchil uva' nik ixaan tu b'ey ti' ib'en tu vitz. As jit texhla chajnaj Aak oora.
41016013	As tul texhla ve't chajnaj Aak, as b'ex tal ve't chajnaj te unq'a imoole'. As ye' nik inima unq'a imool chajnaje' u yole'.
41016014	As xamtel ve't stuul, as ik'uch ve't tib' Aak te junlavat unq'a apóstol tul uva' atik ve't ok chajnaj vatz u meexhae'. As iyaa ve't Aak chajnaj ti' uva' ye' nik ik'ujb'a' chajnaj ik'u'l ti' Aak, tan ti' uva' chajnaj chit ye' nik niman viyol unq'a uxhchile' uve' kat ilon Aak uva' ma'tik tul taama Aak unpajte.
41016015	As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —B'enoj ex. B'en etaltaj u b'a'nla yole' te unq'a tename' skajayil uva' at vatz u tx'ava'e'.
41016016	As ab'il uva' la niman unq'a unyole' uva' la b'en etal ste as la ku' ve't xe' u a'e', as a'e' ye' la b'en tu u k'axk'oe'. Pet ab'il uva' ye' la niman, as a'e' la b'en tu u k'axk'oe'.
41016017	As a' unq'a k'uchb'al tetz vunb'a'nile' u vi'la' uva' la b'en ib'an unq'a uxhchile' uve' la niman vunyole': As tuk' vunb'iie' la teesa ve't el unq'a sub'ule' ti' unq'a uxhchile' uva' ato'k u sub'ule' sk'atz. As la iyolb'e ve't unq'a niman vetze' ka't unq'a yolb'ale' uva' ye' ootzimal sta'n.
41016018	As k'uxh la itxey unq'a uxhchile' unq'a tx'i'latxooe' ta'n iq'ab', as moj la tuk'a umaj tz'akab'al uva' la yatz'oni, as ye'xhkam la b'anon. As tul la taq' je' unq'a uxhchile' iq'ab' ti' unq'a aach'o'me', as la b'a'nxe' unq'a aach'o'me',— ti'k u Jesús.
41016019	As tul ya' ve't u Jesús ti' iyolone', as eq'ol ve't je' Aak tu almika'. As xoneb' ve't Aak tiseb'al u Kub'aal Tiixhe'.
41016020	As ijatx ve't tib' unq'a ichusulib' Aake'. As b'ex tal ve't chajnaj u b'a'nla yole' tulaj unq'a tename'. As iloch ve't ku' tzan u Jesús chajnaj. As iyak'insa ve't Aak u yole' tuk' unq'a k'uchb'al tetz vib'a'nile' uve' xo'veb'al chittu' uva' b'ex ib'an chajnaj. An chite'.
42001001	Nimal unq'a uxhchile' uva' jik chit kat itz'ib'a kan ti' talax isuuchil unq'a vee' kat uch sukuxo'l
42001002	eche' uva' kat chuspu sqe ta'n unq'a qitz'in qatzike' uva' kat ilon kam uva' kat uchi tixe'teb'al unq'a yole', tan an chit chajaake' uva' kat k'ujeb' kan ti' ipaxsal unq'a yole'.
42001003	As b'a'n ve't sve uva' jik chit nuntz'ib'a b'en unq'a yole' see, pap Teófilo, tan kat unch'oti ve't sb'a'n kam chit uva' kat uchi tixe'teb'al
42001004	aq'al uva' la ootzi uva' jik chit u yole' uva' kat chuspik kan see.
42001005	Tul atik ve't ok u Herodes ijlenaalil tu u Judea, as atik uma'l oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh uva' Zacarías uva' tiaal u Abías. As Elisabet u tixqele'. As a' tzaanalkat u tixqele' xo'l unq'a tiaal u Aarón.
42001006	Jik chit itxumb'al cha'ma skaab'il vatz u Tiixhe', tan nikat inima cha'ma viyol u Tiixhe'. As jik chit nik inima ve't cha'ma u tzaq'ite' uva' tz'ib'amal kan uva' alik kan ta'n Aak.
42001007	As ye'lik chit me'al ik'aol cha'ma, tan ye'l u Elisabet nik talane'. As q'estik chit ve't cha'ma skaab'il.
42001008	As b'ex ilej ve't uma'l u q'ii tul uva' a'ik u Zacarías tuk' ka't unq'a imoole' atik ok tixhemaana ti' tilat isuuchil u tostiixhe' tu u Jerusalén.
42001009	As kat ik'ulvatzi u Zacarías uva' a'e' la ok tu u tostiixhe' ti' itz'e'sal u incienso tu u nachb'al Tiixhe', tan eche' nik ib'an uma'l oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh.
42001010	As molik tib' unq'a tename' vatz iq'anal u tostiixhe'. As tul nikat itz'e'sa u Zacarías u incienso, as tul nikat inach unq'a tename' Tiixh.
42001011	As tul atik u Zacarías vatz u atinb'ale' uve' nik itz'e'salkat u incienso, as ul ve't uma'l u ángel txakeb'oj tiseb'al u meexhae'.
42001012	As yak kuxh xo'v ve't u Zacarías. Ye' nikat ichee ve't tivi' ti' uva' kam la ib'an ve't vatz u ángel.
42001013	As ech tal ve't u ángel ile': —Zacarías, ye' xo'v axh, tan kat tab'il ve't u Tiixhe' u nachb'al Tiixhe' uve' nab'ane', tan la itz'eb' ve't uma'l vine' u eexqele', u Elisabet. As tul la itz'eb' u ne'e', as Xhun ib'ii la ab'ane'.
42001014	As la txuq'txun ve't axh ta'n chiib'ichil. As nimal unq'a uxhchile' la txuq'txun ve't sti' tul uva' la itz'eb'i,
42001015	tan nim talchu vak'aole' la ib'an vatz u Tiixhe'. As ye'l u vino la tuk'a. As mita'n uma'toj a' uva' q'u'imal seta'n. As k'uxh ye'xnaj itz'eb'i, as a' u Tiixhla Espíritu la aq'on itxumb'al ti' ib'anata' kam uva' la tal u Tiixhe' ste.
42001016	As a'e' la b'anon uva' nimal unq'a tiaal Israel la ik'axa ve't tib' ti' inimat u Kub'aal Tiixhe'.
42001017	As b'axel la ul ve't vatz Aak. As eela u tijle'me' tuk' u Elías la ib'ane' uva' xo'veb'alik chit u tijle'me', tan ti' u yole' uve' la ul tale' as la ijikb'a' ve't unq'a b'aalae' vitxumb'ale' ti' uva' la ixo'ni ve't unq'a me'al ik'aole'. As la ijikb'a' ve't unq'a paasan tziie' vitxumb'ale' ti' inimat vitxumb'al unq'a jikla aamae'. As ech la ib'an unq'a tename' ti' ik'ulat ve't Aak,— ti'k u ángel.
42001018	As ech tal ve't u Zacarías ile' te u ángel: —¿Kam la vulb'e vootzit q'i uva' asoj an chit vayole' uve' naale'? Tan q'estu ve't in tuk' u vixqele',— ti'k u Zacarías.
42001019	Ech tal ve't u ángel ile': —Ine' in Kara'p. As in ichaj u Tiixhe'. As Aake' kat chajon tzan in ti' ul valat u b'a'nla yole' see.
42001020	As ti' uva' ye' kat anima ve't uva' kat val see, as cheel tuk kaaoj ve't axh smemil. As ye'l axh la yolon ve't axh. Pet lanal itz'eb' ve't vak'aole' uve' ni val see, as a'n la yolon ve't axh unpajte,— ti'k u ángel.
42001021	As tul uva' atik ok u Zacarías tu u Tiixhla atinb'ale', as mama'la tename' nikat itx'eb'on kan vatz u q'anale'. As nikat kuxh isotz ik'u'l unq'a tename', tan ye'seb' chit el ch'u'l u Zacarías tu u Tiixhla atinb'ale'.
42001022	As tul el ve't ch'u'l u Zacarías, as ma'tik imemtu ve'te'. As nikat kuxh ik'uchun ve't tuk' iq'ab'. As kat pal ve't unq'a tename' stuul uva' at umaj kam uva' kat ik'uch u Tiixhe' ste.
42001023	As tul tz'aj ve't iq'ii u Zacarías ti' tilat isuuchil u aq'one' tu tostiixhe', as b'en ve't tikab'al.
42001024	As tul atik ve't u Zacarías tikab'al, as je' ve't ventasioon ti' u Elisabet. As o'va'l ich' uva' kolik kuxh tib' u Elisabet tu kab'al. As ech nikat tal ve't je' ile' ste:
42001025	«As kat ib'anlu ve't u Kub'aale' b'a'nil sve. Ta'ntiixh te Aak, tan a' isa' Aak uva' ye' la yoq'ax ve't in ta'n unq'a tename' ti' uva' ye'l vas val ati,» ti'k u Elisabet.
42001026	As tul ib'an vaajil ich' ije' ventasioon ti' u Elisabet, as ichaj ve't u Tiixhe' u ángel uva' Kara'p tu uma'l u tal tenam tu u Galilea uva' Nazaret ib'ii
42001027	xe' uma'l u q'opo ixoj uva' Ma'l ib'ii uva' k'ujlik ve't tzii sti' tuk' uma'l u naj uva' Xhu'l uva' tiaal tib' tuk' u David.
42001028	As tul oon ve't u ángel tu u kab'ale' uve' atikkat u Ma'le', as ech tal ve't ile': —¡Keche, Ma'l! Tan at u Tiixhe' see'. As nim ve't u b'a'nile' uva' tuk ib'an u Tiixhe' see ti' uve' nib'an Aak te unjoltu unq'a ixoje',— ti'k u ángel.
42001029	As tul tab'i u Ma'le' viyol u ángel, as yak chit sotz ve't ik'u'l ta'n u yole' uve' tal u ángel. As ech tal ve't je' ile' ste: «¿Kam isuuchil u yole' q'i uve' ni talpu sve?» ti'k u Ma'le'.
42001030	As ech tal ve't u ángel ile': —¡Ye' xo'v axh, Ma'l! Tan b'a'n ve't atxumb'al vatz u Tiixhe',
42001031	tan tuk je'oj ventasioon see'. As la itz'eb' ve't uma'l vane'. As tul la itz'eb'i, as Jesús ib'ii la ab'ane',
42001032	tan nim talchu u ne'e' la ib'ane'. As iK'aol u Tiixhe' tu almika' u ne'e', tan a' u Kub'aal Tiixhe', u kuB'ooq'ole', la oksan ve't u tijle'me' eche' uva' kat tulb'e Aak u q'esla eb'aale' uva' David.
42001033	As la ok ve't ijlenaalil ti' unq'a tiaal Israel. As ye'xh jatu la el ve't ti' u ijlenaalile', tan ye'l iya'teb'al u tijle'me' la ib'ane',— ti'k u ángel tal te u Ma'le'.
42001034	As ech tal ve't u Ma'l ile' te u ángel: —¿Kam isuuchil u yole' uve' naal sve? Tan ye'l untzumel ati,— ti'k u Ma'le'.
42001035	Ech tal ve't u ángel ile': —As a' u Tiixhla Espíritu tuk uloj see'. As a' vib'a'nil u Tiixhe' tu almika' tuk uloj see' ti' uva' la itz'eb' uma'l vane'. Esti'e' ni val see ti' u ne'e' uve' la itz'eb'i, tan Tiixhla Aamae', iK'aol u Tiixhe'.
42001036	As echat kat ib'anlu ve't vanane' uva' aatin eeb' stuk', u Elisabet, tan k'uxh q'estu ve'te', as la itz'eb' ve't uma'l vine'. As k'uxh ni talchu sti' uva' ye'xh jatu la alani, as cheel kat ib'anlu vaajix ich' ije' ventasioon sti',
42001037	tan ye'l umaj kam uva' ye' koj la itx'ol u Tiixhe' ib'anata',— ti'k u ángel.
42001038	As ech tal ve't u Ma'l ile': —Il in ila'. As ine' in ik'am u Tiixhe'. As la ib'an Aak svi' kam uve' naale',— ti'k u Ma'le'. As b'en ve't u ángel.
42001039	As an kuxh tu unq'a q'iie', as ib'an ve't u Ma'le' tuche'. As ye'ntu chit ib'en u Ma'le' tu uma'l u tal tenam uva' echen xo'l unq'a vitze' tu u Judea, ti' b'en iq'elut u Elisabet.
42001040	Tul oon ve't u Ma'le' tu vikab'al u Zacarías, as itiixhi ve't u Ma'le' u Elisabet.
42001041	As tul kuxh tab'i u Elisabet itiixhil ta'n u Ma'le', as yak kuxh iyiku ve't tib' u tal ne'e' k'atz u Elisabet. As taq' ve't u Tiixhla Espíritu itxumb'al u Elisabet ti' iyolone'.
42001042	As ech tal ve't u Elisabet ile' tul taq' je' u tuul ivi': —As nim ve't u b'a'nile' uva' tuk ib'an u Tiixhe' see ti' uve' nib'an Aak te unjoltu unq'a ixoje'. As nimal b'a'nil la ib'an u Tiixhe' te u ne'e' uva' la itz'eb'i.
42001043	¿As kam ve't vijle'm q'i uva' tul eel ve't in? Tul axh vitxutx vunB'ooq'ole',
42001044	tan tul kuxh uva' kat atiixhi in, as yak kuxh kat iyiku ve't tib' u ne'e' sunk'atz ta'n chiib'ichil.
42001045	As achveb'al chit axh, tan kat ak'ujb'a' ak'u'l ti' u Tiixhe', tan tuk tzojpisaloj unq'a yole' uva' kat alpu see ta'n u Tiixhe',— ti'k u Elisabet.
42001046	As ech tal ve't u Ma'l ile' te u Elisabet: —Va'l chit ichiib' u vaanxelale' ti' toksal iq'ii u Kub'aal Tiixhe'.
42001047	As va'l chit itxuq'txun ve't vaama ti' u Tiixhe', u sotzsan tetz vunpaave',
42001048	tan k'uxh jit nim valche' xo'l unq'a tename', as nimal b'a'nil kat ik'uch u Tiixhe' sve, tan in ik'am Aak. As la tal ve't unq'a tename' skajayil uva' achveb'al u b'a'nile' uva' kat ib'an Aak sve,
42001049	tan xo'veb'al chit vib'a'nil Aake' uve' kat ib'anlu sve. As xo'veb'al chit viyak'il Aake'. As Tiixhla b'iie' vib'ii Aake'.
42001050	As nichit itxum u Tiixhe' ivatz unq'a tename' uve' kat ib'anlu kan. As echat nib'an cheel ti' chit ib'ene' ti' unq'a tename' uve' ni xo'van Aak.
42001051	As mama'la b'a'nil nib'an Aak tuk' viyak'ile'. As jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' nije'sa tib', as kat teesa ve't Aak iq'ii.
42001052	As at unq'a ijlenaale' kat teesa Aak ti' u tijle'me'. As kat toksa ve't Aak iq'ii unq'a uxhchile' uve' ye' ni toksal iq'ii ta'n unq'a tename'.
42001053	Kat inoosa ve't Aak unq'a uxhchile' uve' niva'ye'. As kat taq' ve't kan Aak unq'a tx'ioliq'iie' vatz va'y.
42001054	As kat iloch ve't Aak unq'a mam kukuye' uva' tiaal Israel. As ye' kat sotz sk'u'l Aak ti' itxumat kuvatz,
42001055	tan eche' uve' alel kan ta'n Aak te u q'esla kub'aale' uva' Abraham, tuk' te unq'a tiaale' skajayil,— ti'k u Ma'le'.
42001056	As kamal oxva'l ich' ib'an u Ma'le' xe' u Elisabet. As q'aav ve't u Ma'le' tikab'al.
42001057	As tul ilej ve't iq'ii u Elisabet ti' talane', as itz'eb' ve't vine'e'.
42001058	As tul tab'i ve't unq'a titz'in tatzike' tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uve' echen najlich vikab'ale', as va'lik chit ichiib' ve't unq'a uxhchile' skajayil, tan ti' uva' nimla b'a'nil kat ib'anlu u Tiixhe' te u Elisabet.
42001059	As tul ib'an u ne'e' vaaxil q'ii, as b'ex tzok'axoj el unb'iil vichi'ole'. As tal ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' Zacarías u ne'e' la ib'ane' eche' ib'ii vib'aale'.
42001060	As ech tal ve't vitxutx u ne'e' ile': —Ye'le, tan Xhun ib'ii u ne'e' tuk ib'ane',— ti'k aak tala.
42001061	Ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile': —¿Kam q'i uva' ye' nasa' uva' Zacarías u ne'e'? Tan ye'l Xhun xo'l unq'a etatine',— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
42001062	As tuk' kuxh ve't k'uchu'm nik ich'oti ve't ok unq'a uxhchile' te u Zacarías ti' uva' kam ib'ii u ne'e' la ib'ane'.
42001063	As ijaj ve't u Zacarías uma'l u tal aq'en. As itz'ib'a ve't u Zacarías vib'ii u ne'e' vatz aq'en. «Xhun ib'ii u ne'e' tuk ib'ane',» ti'k u tz'ib'e' uve' itz'ib'a. As kat kuxh sotz ve't ik'u'l unq'a tename'.
42001064	As tul kuxh itz'ib'a u yole', as yak kuxh yolon ve't u Zacarías unpajte. As kat toksa ve't iq'ii u Tiixhe'.
42001065	As teq'o ve't taama unq'a tename' ta'n xo'vichil. As oora chit ipaxsa ve't unq'a tename' itzib'lal u yole' xo'l unq'a talaj tename' tu u Judea.
42001066	Jank'al unq'a tename' uve' ab'in u yole', as ech tal ve't je' ile' ste: «¿As kamal at tijle'm u ne'e' tuk ib'ane'?» ti'k unq'a uxhchile', tan atik chit vib'a'nil u Tiixhe' ti' u ne'e'.
42001067	As u Zacarías, vib'aal u ne'e', as taq' ve't u Tiixhla Espíritu itxumb'al ti' talat unq'a yole' ti' u ne'e'. As ech tal ve't ile':
42001068	—Ni voksa iq'ii u Kub'aal Tiixhe', u Tiixhe' uva' ni qoksa iq'ii, o' uva' o' tiaal Israel, tan kat ulyu ve't sukuxo'l ti' kuq'alpule'.
42001069	As kat taq'lu ve't tzan u Tiixhe' uma'l u q'alpun qetz uva' xo'veb'al chit u tijle'me'. As a'e' tiaal u q'esla kub'aale' uva' David, uva' atik tijle'm ta'n Aak.
42001070	Tan eche' uva' kat tal kan u Tiixhe' ta'n unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyole' uve' kat ul b'axa uva' txaaik ta'n Aak.
42001071	Ech tal kan ile': La ul teesa ve't o' u q'alpun qetze' vatz unq'a ch'o'nchil aamae' as tuk' vatz unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni ixvan o',
42001072	as kat itxum ve't Aak ivatz unq'a q'esla kub'aale' tan ye' nisotz sk'u'l Aak ti' u Tiixhla tzaq'ite' uva' tal kan Aak te u q'esla kub'aale' uva' Abraham.
42001073	As ye' nisotz sk'u'l Aak ti' itzojpisat uva' kat tal kan Aak te u q'esla kub'aale' uva' Abraham ti' uva' la taq' tzan Aak u q'alpun qetze',
42001074	ti' ul teesat o' Aak vatz unq'a ch'o'nchil aamae' ti' uva' ye' la xo'v ve't o' ti' qoksat ve't iq'ii u Tiixhe'.
42001075	As jik chit u kutxumb'ale' la ib'an vatz Aak. As jik chit la kunima ve't Aak techal la kukameb'e.
42001076	As tuk val see, unk'aol, tan a' u Tiixhe' uva' at tu almika' la oksan axh q'ajsan tetz viyole', tan axh tuk b'axoj ve't axh vatz u kuB'ooq'ole' ti' ijikb'a'l itxumb'al unq'a tename'
42001077	as ti' uva' la qootzi ve'te', jank'al o' uva' o' itenam u Tiixhe', uva' la teesa ve't o' Aak vatz unq'a k'axk'oe'. As la qootzi ve'te' uva' la isotzsa ve't Aak u kupaave',
42001078	tan aya'l chit ik'ul Aak ti' itxumat kuvatz. Esti'e' la ul u txijun qetze' sukuxo'l eche' ib'uuq' u q'iie' vatz u almika'e'. A'e' u Cristo uva' la ul tu almika',
42001079	ti' tul itxijut ve't Aak unq'a uxhchile' uve' echen u taanxelale' tu u q'ej toktoe'. As la ul teesa Aak unq'a uxhchile' vatz u kamchile', as la iloch o' Aak ti' uva' b'a'n qatine' sukuvatzaj,— ti'k u Zacarías.
42001080	As tul nik ich'ii ve't u Xhune', as nik iyak'in ve't itxumb'al k'atz u Tiixhe'. As a' atinkat ve'te' tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e'. As katnal ilej u q'ii uva' la ik'uch ve't tib' vatz unq'a tiaal Israel.
42002001	An chit tu unq'a q'iie', as taq'e'l tzan u Augusto uma'l u ley, tan atik ok naj ijlenaalil tu u Roma. As tale'l tzan naj uva' la eq'ol tachul unq'a tename' skajayil.
42002002	As a's tel u tachul unq'a tename' b'axa ta'n u Augusto tul uva' atik ok u Cirenio b'anol ivatz u ijlenaale' tu u Siria.
42002003	As b'en ve't unq'a uxhchile' skajayil tulaj unq'a itename' uve' itz'eb'nalkat ti' itz'ib'at ve't tib'.
42002004	As esti'e' el ve't ch'u'l u Xhu'le' tu u tename' uva' Nazaret uva' echen tu u Galilea. As a' b'enkat ve'te' tu u Belén uva' echen tu u Judea, uva' itz'eb'nalikkat u David, tan tiaalik tib' u David tuk' u Xhu'l.
42002005	As b'ex itz'ib'a ve't tib' u Xhu'le' tuk' u Ma'le', tan k'ujlik ve't tzii ti' cha'ma. As atik ve't iyaab'il u Ma'le'.
42002006	As tul uva' atik ve't cha'ma tu u Belén, as ilej ve't u q'iie' ti' titz'eb' u ne'e'.
42002007	As itz'eb' ve'te'. As a'e' u b'axa tal u Ma'le'. As ib'och ve't u Ma'le' u ne'e' tu uma'l u txo'. As ikoxhb'a' ve't ku' tu uma'l u juk'ub', tan jit ilej ve't cha'ma ivatb'al tu umaj kab'al.
42002008	As atik ka'l unq'a xeen kaneero' najlich u Belén. As nik ivata chajnaj unq'a kaneero'e' aq'b'al.
42002009	As aat kuxh til ve't chajnaj tul ve't uma'l u ángel uva' tetz u Kub'aal Tiixhe'. As yak chit txijul ve't chajnaj ta'n vilitz'lo'lan u Tiixhe'. As kat chit xo'v ve't chajnaj.
42002010	As ech tal ve't u ángel ile': —Ye' kuxh xo'v ex, tan a' uma'l u b'a'nla yole' tul val sete. As la txuq'txun ve't ex sti' tuk' unq'a tename' unpajte.
42002011	As cheel kat itz'eb'yu ve't u q'alpun tetz unq'a tename'. As a' kat itz'eb'kat tu u tenam uva' alalkat u David. As a'e' u Cristo uva' Kub'aal.
42002012	As ab'iste u ne'e' uve' ni val sete as k'uchb'al tetz uva', tan tul la b'en elej u ne'e', as b'ochel tu uma'l u txo'. As koxhlu ku' tu uma'l u juk'ub',— ti'k u ángel.
42002013	As aat kuxh til ve't unq'a xeen txooe' ichee ve't mama'la ángel svatz. As ech tal ve't unq'a ángel ile' ti' toksat iq'ii u Tiixhe':
42002014	—¡Qoksataj iq'ii u Tiixhe' uva' echen tu almika'! tan Aake' nib'anon uva' b'a'n tatin unq'a uxhchile' svatzaj vatz u tx'ava'e', tan eche' uva' nisa' u Tiixhe'— ti'k unq'a ángel.
42002015	As tul q'aav ve't unq'a ángel tu almika', as ech tal ve't unq'a xeen txoo ile' svatzaj: —Ko'naj tu u Belén. Ko'naj qil uve' kat tal u Tiixhe' sqe,— ti'k unq'a xeen txooe'.
42002016	As q'ax chit ve't ib'en chajnaj. B'ex ilej ve't chajnaj u Ma'le' tuk' u Xhu'le' tuk' u ne'e'. As koxhlik ku' u tal ne'e' tu u juk'ub'e'.
42002017	As tul til ve't chajnaj u ne'e', as kat tal ve't chajnaj te cha'ma kam uva' kat ul tal u ángel te chajnaj ti' u ne'e'.
42002018	As jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' kat ab'in viyol unq'a xeen txooe' as kat chit txuq'txun ve'te' ta'n u yole' uve' tal chajnaj.
42002019	As nikat kuxh titz'a u Ma'le' unq'a yole'. As kat ib'an ve't je' tivi' uva' kam isuuchil u yole' uve' kat tab'i.
42002020	As tul q'aav ve't unq'a xeen txooe' k'atz unq'a ikaneero'e', as va'lik chit itxuq'txun ve't chajnaj. As toksa ve't chajnaj iq'ii u Tiixhe' ti' unq'a vee' kat tab'i as ti' unq'a vee' kat tila eche' uva' kat alax te chajnaj ta'n u ángel.
42002021	As tul ib'an u ne'e' vaaxil q'ii as b'ex tzok'axoj ve't el unb'iil vichi'ole', as oksal ve't ib'ii uva' Jesús, tan eche' uve' alik kan ta'n u ángel te u Ma'le' tul uva' ye'xnik je' ventasioon sti'.
42002022	As tul ib'an u Ma'le' ka'viinqil q'ii ti' u ne'e' eche' uva' alik kan ta'n u Moisés, as eq'ol ve't u ne'e' ta'n vitxutxe' tuk' vib'aale' tu u Jerusalén ti' inachpu ve't Tiixh sti',
42002023	tan ech ni tal u yol ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Moisés: «Asoj xaak u b'axa tal u ixoje', as tetz Tiixh naj la ib'ane',» ti'k u yole'.
42002024	As inima ve't cha'ma u yole' uva' alelik kan ta'n u Moisés uva' ech ni tal ile': «As la oyal ve't untzumoj ko'rak'um as moj tzumoj paroomaxh vatz u Tiixhe',» ti'k u yole'.
42002025	As atik uma'l u pap tu u Jerusalén uva' Simeón ib'ii, as nik toksa taama ti' inachat Tiixh. As atik ok taama ti' u Tiixhe'. As nikat itx'eb'on ti' ilejat u q'iie' uva' la ul u q'alpun tetz u tename' uva' tiaal Israel ti' ilochpe'. As a'ik u Tiixhla Espíritu nik lochon u Simeón ti' ib'anata' kam uva' nik tal u Tiixhe' sti',
42002026	tan ma'tik talat u Tiixhla Espíritu ste uva' techal la til kan tul u Cristo uva' la ichaj tzan u Tiixhe'.
42002027	As an chit u Tiixhla Espíritu oksan xe' taama u Simeón ti' toon vatz u tostiixhe'. As tul b'ex oonoj u ne'e' ta'n u Xhu'le' tuk' u Ma'le' ti' toksal ve't u ne'e' vatz u Tiixhe' ti' inimat cha'ma u tzaq'ite',
42002028	as ijele ve't u Simeón u ne'e'. As ech tal ve't u Simeón ile' ti' toksat iq'ii u Tiixhe':
42002029	—Kub'aal Tiixh, la uchi uva' la kam ve't in eche' uva' alel kan a'n, tan b'a'n tatin ve't u vaanxelale' savatz,
42002030	tan kat villu ve't u q'alpun qetze'.
42002031	As axhe', Pap, la ch'iisan aq'al uva' la ilax ta'n unq'a tename' skajayil.
42002032	As la tal ve't isuuchil vayole' te unq'a tename' uve' jit tiaal Israel eche' itxijul uma'l tenam uva' echen tu u toktoe'. As la oksal iq'ii vatename' uve' tiaal Israel ta'n u ne'e',— ti'k u Simeón.
42002033	As tul tab'i ve't u Xhu'le' tuk' u Ma'le' u yole' uve' tal u Simeón ti' u ne'e', as kat chit sotz ve't ik'u'l cha'ma.
42002034	As toksa ve't u Simeón iq'ii u Tiixhe'. As ech tal ve't ile' te u Ma'le': —Tan k'ujle'l ve't u ne'e' ti' uva' at unq'a tiaal Israel la niman, as ati uva' ye' la niman. As at unq'a uxhchile' la ch'o'n ve't taama sti'.
42002035	As la ootzil vitxumb'al unq'a uxhchile' kam uve' ni titz'a taama. Pet ech koj axh, tan ech tok umaj u mam txumu'm xe' aama eche' tok umaj ch'ich' tu u taanxelal umaj uxhchil,— ti'k u Simeón tal te u Ma'le'.
42002036	Atik uma'l u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' vatz iq'anal u tostiixhe'. As An ib'ii u ixoje'. As ime'al u Fanuel uva' tiaal u Aser ixoj. As txulnalik ixoj tul teq'o tib' ixoj tuk' vitzumele'. As vujva'l kuxh yaab' teq'o tib' ixoj tuk' vitzumele'. As kat kam ve't vitzumel ixoje'.
42002037	As kaaik ve't kan ixoj txakayil kajva'l to'k'al (84) yaab'. As tul q'estik chit ve't ixoj. As b'enameen atik chit ixoj vatz iq'anal u tostiixhe'. As nik inach ixoj Tiixh sq'iil as aq'b'al. As nikat ikuy ve't ixoj iva'y ti' inachat Tiixh.
42002038	As tul ya' ve't u Simeón ti' iyolone', as jetz'en ve't ok u Ane' k'atz u ne'e' ti' taq'at ta'ntiixh te u Tiixhe' sti'. As nik tal u Ane' isuuchil u tijle'm u ne'e' te unq'a uxhchile' tu u Jerusalén uve' nik itx'eb'on ti' u q'alpun tetz unq'a tename'.
42002039	As tul tzojpu ve't u Xhu'le' tuk' u Ma'le' ti' uva' alelik kan tu u tzaq'ite' ta'n u Tiixhe', as q'aav ve't cha'ma tu u Nazaret uva' echen tu u Galilea.
42002040	As ch'iichil chit nik ib'an ve't u Jesús. As nik ichee ve't iyak'il. As nik ichee ve't itxumb'al. As nik taq' ve't tzan u Tiixhe' vib'a'nile' sti'.
42002041	As jun yaab' nikat ib'en vitxutx u Jesús tuk' vib'aale' tu u Jerusalén ti' tilat u nimla q'iie' uva' pascua ib'ii.
42002042	Tul ma'tik ib'anat u Jesús kab'laval yaab', as b'ex ve't vitxutxe' tuk' vib'aale' tu u nimla q'iie', tan ech chit nik ib'an cha'ma tu jun yaab'.
42002043	As tul pal ve't u nimla q'iie', as q'aav ve't vitxutx u Jesús tuk' vib'aale' ti' ib'en tu vitename'. As kaaik ve't kan u Jesús tu u Jerusalén. As jit ilax ikaa Aak,
42002044	tan kamal xekelik Aak xo'l unq'a tename' uva' nikat tal cha'ma. As tul uva' ma'tik ixaat ve't cha'ma uma'l q'ii xao'm, as a'n ichuk ve't cha'ma u Jesús xo'l unq'a tatine' tuk' xo'l unq'a tename' uve' ootzimalik ta'n cha'ma.
42002045	As jit ilej ve't cha'ma u Jesús. As q'aav ve't cha'ma tu u Jerusalén ti' ichukat u Jesús.
42002046	As tu ve't itoxvu q'ii, as a'n ilej ve't cha'ma u Jesús. As a' xonlikkat ok u Jesús tu u tostiixhe' xo'l unq'a naje' uve' nik ichusun u tzaq'ite' uva' tz'ib'amal kan. As nik tab'i u Jesús viyol chajnaje'. As nikat ich'oti u Jesús itzi' chajnaj.
42002047	As jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' nikat ab'in viyol u Jesús as teq'o chit ve't taama chajnaj ti' vitxumb'al u Jesús, tan ch'i'umal chit talat ve't u Jesús isuuchil unq'a yole'.
42002048	As echat chit kat ib'an vib'aal u Jesús tuk' vitxutxe' ti' uva' til cha'ma uva' tal u Jesús isuuchil u yole'. As ech tal ve't u Ma'l ile': —¿Kame' q'i, val, uve' kat oolb'e o'? As kat kuxh axaansal ve't qaama. As in tuk' ak ab'aale', as kat kuxh chukunyu ve't o' see',— ti'k u Ma'le'.
42002049	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —¿As kam q'i uve' nechuk sve? ¿As ye' kol ootzimal q'a seta'n uva' a' chit la atinkat in tu vikab'al vunB'aale'?— ti'k u Jesús.
42002050	As jit pal u Ma'le' stuul tuk' u Xhu'le' ti' uva' kam ni tokkat u yole' uve' tal u Jesús.
42002051	As tul tal u Jesús u yole', as b'en ve't Aak ti' vib'aale' tuk' ti' vitxutxe' tu u Nazaret. As nikat inima u Jesús yol kam uva' nik tal cha'ma ste. As nikat kuxh titz'a vitxutxe' unq'a yole' uve' kat tal u Jesús.
42002052	As nikat ich'ii ve't itxakeb' u Jesús. Nikat ichee ve't itxumb'al. As b'a'n vitxumb'al u Jesús vatz u Tiixhe' as tuk' vatz unq'a tename'.
42003001	As tul ib'an o'laval yaab' tok ve't u César uva' Tiberia ijlenaalil tu u Roma, as a'ik u Poncio Pilato uve' atik ok b'anol ivatz tu u Judea. As a' atikkat ok u Herodes tu u Galilea. As a' atikkat ok u Pi'le', u titz'in u Herodes, tu u Iturea tuk' tu u Trakonite. As a' atikkat ok u Lisanias tu u Abilinia.
42003002	As tul atik ok u Anás tuk' u Caifás iq'esalil oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh, as yolon ve't u Tiixhe' te u Xhune', vik'aol u Zacarías, tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e', tan a' isa' u Tiixhe' uva' la b'en ipaxsa u Xhune' viyol Aake' xo'l unq'a tename'.
42003003	As pal ve't u Xhune' tulaj unq'a tename' tzi' u Jordán ti' talat viyol u Tiixhe' te unq'a tename'. As nik tal ve'te' uva' la ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e', texhlal tetz uva' kat ik'axal unq'a uxhchile' vipaave' vatz u Tiixhe', aq'al uva' la isotzsa ve't Aak ipaav unq'a uxhchile'.
42003004	Tan eche' uma'l u yol uva' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Isaías uva' ech ni tal ile': Tan la uch uma'l u sik'i'm tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e'. As ech la tal ile': «¡Eb'antaj etuche' ti' ek'ulat u kuB'ooq'ole'! ¡As ejikb'a'taj vetxumb'ale' eche' ijikb'a'l umaj b'ey!
42003005	As la noosal u xo'l u vitze'. As la e'pul el u vitze', aq'al uva' chaq'aala chit la ib'an ve'te'. As ech ejikb'a't vetxumb'ale' eche' ijikb'a'l umaj b'ey uve' koyixi. As jank'al unq'a b'eye' uve' at jul stuul as lab'alili.
42003006	As kajayil chit unq'a tename' tuk ilon tul uva' tuk isotzsa ve't u Tiixhe' vipaav unq'a tename',» chaj la tale', ti'k u yole'.
42003007	As ul ve't unq'a tename' k'atz u Xhune' ti' uva' la taq' ku' u Xhune' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e'. As ech tal u Xhun ile': —¡Ech vetxumb'ale' eche' u tx'i'latxooe'! ¿Tan ab'il kat alon sete uva' la ooj ex vatz u k'axk'oe' uve' tule'?
42003008	Eb'antaj b'a'nil, texhlal tetz uva' kat ek'axal ve't etib' vatz u Tiixhe'. As ye' etitz'a uva' ti' kuxh uva': «O' tiaal u Abraham,» ch'ex netale', as ye'l ex la pal ex tu u k'axk'oe' uva' tule', tan tuk val sete uva' eche' k'axk'o koj ib'ensat u Tiixhe' unq'a k'ub'e' stiaal u Abraham.
42003009	As ech ve't b'anel eta'ne' eche' unq'a tze'e' uva' at ve't ok u k'oxb'ale' sti' ti' itzok'pu unq'a taq'il tze'e'. As ab'iste u tze'e' uve' ye' b'a'n vivatze' ni taq'e' as la tzok'ax el. As la sutil ok tu xamal,— ti'k u Xhune'.
42003010	As ech tal ve't ka'l unq'a uxhchil ile' xo'l unq'a tename': —¿As kam q'i la kub'ane' ti' uva' la kuk'uche' uva' kat kuk'axal qib'?— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
42003011	Ech tal u Xhun ile': —Ab'iste ex uve' at ka'va'l etoksa'm as etaq'taj umaj te vemoole' uve' ye'l tetz ati. As ab'iste ex uve' at etx'ix as etaq'taj tetz unq'a uxhchile' uve' ye'l itx'ix ati,— ti'k u Xhune'.
42003012	As ka'l unq'a uxhchil uva' nik molon puaj tetz u ijlenaale' tu u Roma, as ul ve't chajnaj k'atz u Xhune' ti' uva' la ku' chajnaj xe' u a'e'. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Chusul, kam la kub'ane' ti' uva' la kuk'uche' uva' kat kuk'axal qib'?— ti'k chajnaj.
42003013	Ech tal ve't u Xhun ile': —Ye' kuxh ejaj ka't puaj ti' uve' alel sete ta'n u ijlenaale',— ti'k u Xhune'.
42003014	As ech tal ka't unq'a sol ile': —¿As kano o' q'i? ¿Kam la kub'ane'?— ti'k chajnaj. Ech tal ve't u Xhun ile': —Ye' kuxh exo'visa unq'a uxhchile' ti' emaat unq'a tetze'. As ye' la echeesa yol ti' exochat unq'a uxhchile'. As ek'ujb'a'taj kuxh ek'u'l ti' veja'mile' uve' nek'ule',— ti'k u Xhune'.
42003015	As ye' saach unq'a tename' nikat alon svatzaj uva' kamal a' ve't u Xhune' u Cristo uva' nik tal je' ste, tan nikat itx'eb' unq'a tename' u tuleb'al u Cristo.
42003016	As ech tal ve't u Xhun ile' te unq'a tename': —Jik chit tuk val sete, tan xe' kuxh u a'e' ni vaq'kat ku' ex. Pet ech koj uma't u uxhchile' uve' a'n tule', tan nim talche' u tijle'me' svi'. As jit unk'ulele' uva' la unsaapu vik'a'jil vixa'pe'. As tul la uli, as Aake' la oksan u Tiixhla Espíritue' tu vetaanxelale', as la ijikb'a' ve't ex Aak tuk' vixamalile'.
42003017	Tan ech la b'anche' sete eche' nib'anchu te u trigo, tan il u txaab'al tetz u trigo ile' at tiq'ab' Aak. As la ikol ve't Aak u b'a'nla trigo tu u tatinb'ale'. Pet ech koj u ch'ise', tan yaklo'k tu xamal, uma'l u xamal uva' ye'xhjatu la tzaai,— ti'k u Xhune'.
42003018	As nimal chit unq'a yole' nik tal u Xhune' te unq'a tename' ti' toksat xe' taama unq'a uxhchile' ti' uva' la inima u b'a'nla yole'.
42003019	As u Herodes uva' k'ujlik kan ti' tilat isuuchil kajva'l unq'a tename' ta'n u ijlenaale' tu u Roma, as kat tixqeli ve't naj u Herodías, u tixqel u Pi'le' uva' titz'in u Herodes. Esti'e' kat iyaa ve't u Xhune' u Herodes as tuk' ti' unjoltu unq'a va'lexhe' uve' nik ib'an naj.
42003020	As aal chit paavin ve't u Herodes tuk' unjoltu unq'a va'lexhe' uva' kat ib'ana. As tal ve't naj tok u Xhune' tu u kaarsa.
42003021	As tul ye'xnik ok u Xhune' tu u kaarsa, as mama'la uxhchile' nikat taq' ku' naj xe' u a'e'. As antu ve't u Jesús kat ku' ve't xe' u a'e' ta'n u Xhune'. As tul kuxh inach u Jesús Tiixh, as ijajpu ve't tib' u almika'e'.
42003022	As ku' ve't ch'u'l u Tiixhla Espíritu tiib'a u Jesús. As ech tilone' eche' tilax umaj paroomaxh. As ab'il uma'l u tuul vi' tu almika' uva' ech tal ile': —Axhe' unK'aol uva' xo'n chit axh sve. As va'l chit untxuq'txun see',— ti'k u yole'.
42003023	As tul ib'an u Jesús vinaj laval yaab', as xe't ve't Aak ti' ipaxsal viyol u Tiixhe' xo'l unq'a tename'. As vatz unq'a tename', as ik'aol u Xhu'le' u Jesús. As ik'aol Elí u Xhu'l;
42003024	ik'aol Matat u Elí; ik'aol Leví u Matat. As ik'aol Melqui u Leví; ik'aol Jana u Melqui. As ik'aol uma't u Xhu'l u Jana.
42003025	Ik'aol Matatías u Xhu'l; ik'aol Amós u Matatías; ik'aol Nahum u Amós. As ik'aol Esli u Nahum; ik'aol Nagai u Esli.
42003026	As ik'aol Maat u Nagai; ik'aol Matatías u Maat; ik'aol Semei u Matatías. As ik'aol uma't u Xhu'l u Semei; ik'aol Judá u Xhu'l;
42003027	ik'aol Joana u Judá; ik'aol Resa u Joana; ik'aol Zorobabel u Resa; ik'aol Salatiel u Zorobabel; ik'aol Neri u Salatiel.
42003028	As ik'aol Melqui u Neri; ik'aol Adi u Melqui; ik'aol Cosam u Adi; ik'aol Elmodam u Cosam. As ik'aol Er u Elmodam;
42003029	ik'aol Josué u Er; ik'aol Eliezer u Josué; ik'aol Jorim u Eliezer; ik'aol Matat u Jorim.
42003030	As ik'aol Leví u Matat; ik'aol Simeón u Leví; ik'aol Judá u Simeón; ik'aol uma't u Xhu'l u Judá; ik'aol Jonán u Xhu'l. As ik'aol Eliaquim u Jonán;
42003031	ik'aol Melea u Eliaquim; ik'aol Mainán u Melea; ik'aol Matata u Mainán; ik'aol Natán u Matata.
42003032	As ik'aol David u Natán; ik'aol Isaí u David; ik'aol Obed u Isaí; ik'aol Booz u Obed; ik'aol Salmón u Booz; ik'aol Naasón u Salmón.
42003033	As ik'aol Aminadab u Naasón; ik'aol Aram u Aminadab; ik'aol Esrom u Aram; ik'aol Fares u Esrom, ik'aol Judá u Fares.
42003034	As ik'aol Jacob u Judá; ik'aol Isaac u Jacob; ik'aol Abraham u Isaac; ik'aol Taré u Abraham; ik'aol Nacor u Taré.
42003035	As ik'aol Serug u Nacor; ik'aol Ragau u Serug; ik'aol Peleg u Ragau; ik'aol Heber u Peleg; ik'aol Sala u Heber;
42003036	ik'aol Cainán u Sala; ik'aol Arfaxad u Cainán. As ik'aol Sem u Arfaxad; ik'aol Noé u Sem; ik'aol Lamec u Noé;
42003037	ik'aol Matusalén u Lamec; ik'aol Enoc u Matusalén; ik'aol Jared u Enoc; ik'aol Mahalaleel u Jared; ik'aol uma't u Cainán u Mahalaleel.
42003038	As ik'aol Enós u Cainán; ik'aol Set u Enós; ik'aol Adán u Set. As a' u Tiixhe' cheesan tetz u Adán.
42004001	As atik itxumb'al u Jesús ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritu ti' ib'anat Aak kam uva' ni tal u Tiixhe' ste. As el ve't ch'u'l Aak tzi' u nimla a'e' u Jordán. As oon ve't Aak tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e' ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritu.
42004002	As ka'viinqil q'ii kat atin u Jesús tu u tzuukin tz'ava'e'. As ye'l Aak kat tx'a'ni. Pet kat ikuy ve't Aak iva'y. As kat ul ve't u tx'i'lanaje' ti' ul ichukat txumb'al ti' uva' la paavin u Jesús.
42004003	As ech tal ve't u tx'i'lanaj ile': —Asoj axh iK'aol u Tiixhe', as ala uva' la b'en u k'ub'e' stx'ixil,— ti'k u tx'i'lanaje'.
42004004	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ech ni tal viyol u Tiixh ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: Jit kuxh u tx'ixe' la isb'a'n unq'a uxhchile'. Pet kajayil chit unq'a iyol u Tiixhe', as a'e' uva' la isb'a'n unq'a uxhchile',—  ti'k u Jesús.
42004005	As b'en ve't u Jesús ta'n u tx'i'lanaje' vi' uma'l u nimla vitz. As kam chit unq'a vee' at tulaj unq'a tename' skajayil vatz u tx'ava'e', as ik'uch ve't naj te u Jesús.
42004006	As ech tal ve't naj ile': —As la voksa ve't axh sib'ooq'olil unq'a tename' skajayil. As la vaq' unq'a itx'iib'al iq'iie' see, tan at tunq'ab' skajayil. As la uch vaq'at te umaj uxhchil, ab'il uve' la unsa' vaq'at ste.
42004007	Asoj la ku' axh qaaloj sunvatz ti' ooksat unq'ii, as eetze' uve' skajayil,— ti'k u tx'i'lanaje' te u Jesús.
42004008	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Jetz'en el sunvatz, Satanás, tan ech ni tal uma't u yol ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: Ta'n kuxh u Tiixhe', vaB'ooq'ole', la ku' axh qaaloj svatz. As Aak kuxhe' la anima,—  ti'k u Jesús.
42004009	As teq'o ve't u tx'i'lanaje' u Jesús vi' u tostiixhe' tu u Jerusalén. As ech tal ve't naj ile' te Aak: —Asoj axh iK'aol u Tiixhe', as suti ku' eeb' tzitza',
42004010	tan ech ni tal uma't u yol ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: La ichaj tzan u Tiixhe' unq'a ángel ti' ul ilochat axh.
42004011	As: La ul ik'ul axh unq'a ángel aq'al uva' ye' la k'axb'u ve't avoj ti' umaj k'ub',—  ti'k u tx'i'lanaje'.
42004012	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ech ni tal uma't u yol ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: Ye' la uch ab'ek'at u Kub'aal Tiixhe',—  ti'k u Jesús.
42004013	As tul kat tzojpu ve't u tx'i'lanaje' ti' ichukat txumb'al ti' iku' u Jesús tu paav, as taq' ve't kan naj u Jesús. As nik kuxh itx'eb' ve't naj ilejat uma'toj q'ii ti' ichukat txumb'al unpajte ti' u Jesús.
42004014	As atik itxumb'al u Jesús ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritu tul q'aav ve't Aak tu u Galilea. As pax ve't itzib'lal u Jesús tulaj unq'a tename' tuk' tulaj unq'a talaj tename'.
42004015	As nikat ichusun ve't u Jesús tulaj unq'a atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh ta'n unq'a tiaal Israel. As nimal unq'a uxhchile' nik oksan ve't iq'ii Aak.
42004016	As oon ve't u Jesús tu u Nazaret uva' ch'iikat Aak. As tul kat ilej u xeem q'iie', as ok ve't Aak tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh, tan ech chit nik ib'an Aak tu jun xeem q'ii. As txakeb' ve't Aak ti' isik'let Aak viyol u Tiixhe' xo'l unq'a tename'.
42004017	As aq'pik ve't ok u u'uje' te Aak uve' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Isaías, u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' tul ijaj ve't Aak u u'uje'. As ilej ve't Aak u yole' uva' ech ni tal ile':
42004018	A' viTiixhla Espíritu u Kub'aale' ni lochon in ti' unb'anata' kam uva' ni tal Aak svi'. As txaael ve't in ta'n Aak ti' valat unq'a b'a'nla yole' xo'l unq'a meeb'a'e'. As kat ichaj ve't tzan in Aak ti' ilochax unq'a uxhchile' uva' k'axb'inal u taanxelale' ta'n u paave', as ti' valat unq'a yole' ti' ichajpul ve't unq'a uxhchile' uve' k'alel ta'n u paave', as la ilon ve't unq'a tzote', as ti' unq'alput unq'a tename' uve' b'uchel kuxhtu' ta'n vipaave',
42004019	as ti' valat te unq'a uxhchile' uva' kat ilejlu ve't u q'iie' uva' la taq' ve't Aak vib'a'nile' te unq'a uxhchile', ti'k u yole' uva' isik'le u Jesús tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh.
42004020	As tul b'a'nxi, as ib'alq'u ve't Aak u u'uje'. As taq' ve't ok Aak te u lochonaale'. As xoneb' ve't Aak. As ka'yamalik chit ve't Aak ta'n unq'a uxhchile' skajayil uve' atik tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh.
42004021	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —As cheel kat ib'anlu ve't u vee' sevatz, uva' alel kan tu u u'uje',— ti'k Aak.
42004022	As acha'v chit viyol Aake' te unq'a tename'. As teq'o ve't taama unq'a tename' ti' u yole' uve' isik'le Aak. As ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile': —¿Jit kol vik'aol u Xhu'le' q'a u naje'?— ti'k unq'a tename' tal svatzaj.
42004023	Ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Pet ni vitz'a uva' ech tuk etal ile' sve: «¡Axh aatz'ak, tz'aka eeb' sajunal!» chaj ex tuk etal sve. As moj ech la etal ile': «Jank'al unq'a b'a'nile' uva' ni qab'i yol sti' uva' kat ab'an tu u Capernaúm as echat ab'an tzitza' tu vatename' cheel,» chaj ex,— ti'k u Jesús.
42004024	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' unpajte: —Tan eche' b'a'n koj iyolb'el uma'l u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' vatz unq'a uxhchile' tu vitename'.
42004025	As jik chit tuk val sete, tul uva' jit ul jab'al tu oxva'l yaab' tuk' vaajil ich' ta'n u Elías, as mama'la va'y kat ib'ana. As k'uxh nimal unq'a txakay ixoje' atik tu u Israel,
42004026	as jit ichaj b'en u Tiixhe' u Elías xe' umaj txakay ixoj tu u Israel. Pet a' ichajkat b'en Aak u Elías xe' uma'l u txakay ixoj tu u Sarepta uva' echen tu u Sidón.
42004027	As k'uxh nimal unq'a aach'o'me' atike uva' atik ok ch'a'k chin sti' tu u Israel tul uva' atik u Eliseo, u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', as ye'xheb'il kat b'a'nxi. Pet ta'n kuxh u Naamán, u aa Siria, kat b'a'nxi,— ti'k u Jesús.
42004028	As tul tab'i ve't unq'a tename' viyol u Jesús tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh, as ul ve't ivi' chajnaj ti' Aak.
42004029	As imol ve't ok tib' unq'a uxhchile' ti' Aak tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh. As tilul ve't el Aak ti'e'l u tename'. As eq'ol ve't je' Aak vi' u vitze' uva' jejlikkat unq'a tename', tan a' tal unq'a tename' uva' la sutil b'en Aak vatz u vitze'.
42004030	Pet pal kuxh ve't Aak xo'l unq'a tename'. As b'en ve't Aak.
42004031	As oon ve't u Jesús tu u Capernaúm uva' echen tu u Galilea. As tu u xeem q'iie' tu jun xhemaana nikat ichus ve't Aak unq'a uxhchile' tu u atinb'ale'.
42004032	As teq'o ve't taama unq'a uxhchile' ti' u chusb'ale' uve' nik tal Aak, tan nik ik'uch Aak tuk' viyolone' uva' atik tijle'm Aak.
42004033	As atik ok uma'l u naj tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh uva' atik ok sub'ul sk'atz. As taq' je' naj tuul ivi' ti' isik'ine'.
42004034	Ech tal ve't naj ile' ta'n u sub'ule': —¡Jesús, aa Nazaret! ¿Kam asa' sqe? ¡Ye' ul ayansa o'! Tan ootzimal sva'n uva' axhe' uva' chajel tzan axh ta'n u Tiixhe'. As aya'l chit ak'u'l nooksa aama ti' Aak,— ti'k u naje' ta'n u sub'ule'.
42004035	Ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u sub'ule': —¡Chaa tzi'! ¡Elen ti' u naje'!— ti'k Aak. As isuti ve't b'en u sub'ule' u naje' tu tx'ava' vatz unq'a uxhchile'. As el ve't u sub'ule' ti' u naje'. As jit ik'axb'isa u sub'ule' u naje'.
42004036	As kat teq'o ve't taama unq'a uxhchile' skajayil ti' uve' ib'an u Jesús. As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile' svatzaj: —¿Kam tijle'm viyol u naje' uve' ni tale'? Tan tul ni tal naj tel unq'a sub'ule' k'atz unq'a uxhchile', as ninima unq'a sub'ule' viyol naje',— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
42004037	As ipaxsa ve't unq'a uxhchile' itzib'lal u Jesús tulaj unq'a talaj tename' uva' najlike.
42004038	El ve't ch'u'l u Jesús tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh. As ok ve't Aak tu vikab'al u Simón uva' Lu'. As jajpu ve't b'a'nil te Aak ti' viji' u Lu'e', tan nimxinalik chit ve'te' ta'n xamal ch'o'm.
42004039	As jetz'en ve't ok Aak k'atz u aach'o'me'. As iyaa ve't Aak u xamal ch'o'me'. As yak kuxh el ve't u xamal ch'o'me' k'atz viji' u Lu'e'. As oora chit txakpu ve'te'. As taq' ve't techb'ub'al unq'a uxhchile'.
42004040	As tul ma'tik ib'en ve't q'ii, as teq'o ve't tzan unq'a uxhchile' unq'a aach'o'me' vatz u Jesús, k'uxh kam kuxh ch'o'mil nik b'anon. As junun taq'at ve't je' Aak iq'ab' ti' unq'a aach'o'me'. As nikat ib'a'nx ve'te'.
42004041	As tul nikat tel unq'a sub'ule' k'atz unq'a uxhchile', as va'lik chit isik'in u sub'ule' ti' tele'. Ech nik tal ile' te u Jesús: —¡Axhe' viK'aol u Tiixhe'!— ti'k unq'a sub'ule'. As iyaa ve't u Jesús unq'a sub'ule', tan ye' nisa' Aak uva' la yolon u sub'ule' tan ootzimalik ta'n u sub'ule' uva' a' u Jesús u Cristo.
42004042	As tul sajb'u ve'te', as b'ex ichuk u Jesús uma'l u atinb'al uva' ye'lkat uxhchil. As nik ichukun ve't unq'a tename' ti' Aak. As tul ilej unq'a tename' Aak, as ijaj ve't kuyb'al te Aak ti' uva' la kaaik kan Aak tu u tename'.
42004043	As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ye'le, tan techal chite' uva' la b'en unpaxsa u b'a'nla yole' te unjoltu unq'a tename', ti' uva' at u tename' jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe', tan esti'e' uva' kat ichaj tzan in Aak,— ti'k u Jesús.
42004044	As b'ex tal ve't Aak u b'a'nla yole' tu unq'a atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh tulaj unq'a talaj tename' tu u Galilea.
42005001	As tul uva' atik u Jesús tzi' u mar uva' Genesaret, as a' chit mama'la tename' oon k'atz Aak. As va'lik chit ipoch'at unq'a tename' Aak ti' tab'il viyol Aake'.
42005002	As til ve't Aak ka'va'l u barco tzi' u mar uve' elkat ch'u'l unq'a txeyol txaye'. As nikat kuxh itx'aa chajnaj unq'a ik'ache' tzi' u a'e'.
42005003	As ok ve't u Jesús tu uma'l u barco uva' tetz u Simón uva' Lu'. As ijaj Aak b'a'nil te u Lu'e' uva' la ijetz' ok naj unb'ooj u barco tzi' u a'e'. As xoneb' ve't Aak. As chusun ve't el tzan Aak tu u barco xo'l unq'a tename'.
42005004	As tul ya' u Jesús ti' iyolone' xo'l unq'a tename', as ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u Simón: —Eeq'o ok u barco tu uve' nimkat tuul u a'e'. As etaq'taj b'en unq'a ek'ache' xe' u a'e' ti' etxeyat unq'a txaye',— ti'k Aak.
42005005	Ech tal ve't u Simón ile': —Chusul, as uma'x chit aq'b'al o' ti' kutxeyat u txaye'. As ye' kat kutxey umaj txoo. Pet asoj axh la alon, as tuk vaq' b'en u k'ache' xe' u a'e' unpajte,— ti'k u Simón.
42005006	As ib'an ve't chajnaj kam uve' tal u Jesús. As a' chit mama'la txaye' ok ve't tu u k'ache'. As nik irat'mu ve't u k'ache' jaq' talal unq'a txaye'.
42005007	As ib'etxu ve't tzan chajnaj unq'a imoole' uve' echenik tu uma't u barco ti' ilochpe'. As tul ul ve't chajnaj, as inoosa chajnaj ka'va't u barco ta'n unq'a txaye'. As unb'iit kuxh ye' nikat imujtx'ik ve't b'en unq'a barco xe' u a'e' ta'n talal unq'a txaye'.
42005008	As tul til u Simón uva' Lu' inoo ve't unq'a barco ta'n unq'a txaye', as ku' ve't naj qaaloj vatz Aak. As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Ye' la uch aatin sunk'atz, Pap, tan in aapaav,— ti'k u Lu'e',
42005009	tan teq'o chit taama naj tuk' unq'a imoole' ti' unq'a mama'la txaye' uve' itxey chajnaj ta'n u Jesús.
42005010	As echat chit kat ib'an u Xhune' tuk' u Jacob. As a'e' ka'va'l vik'aol u Zebedeo uva' imool tib' tuk' u Simón. As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te u Simón: —Ye' xo'v axh, tan cheel jit ve't axh txeyol txay la ib'ane'. Pet a' ve't unq'a tename' la eeq'o tzan ti' tok sunk'atz,— ti'k u Jesús.
42005011	As ijetz' ve't el tzan chajnaj unq'a ibarco tzi' u mar. As taq' ve't kan chajnaj unq'a tetze' skajayil. As xekeb' ve't chajnaj ti' u Jesús.
42005012	As tul atik u Jesús tu uma'l u tenam uva' tu u Galilea, as b'ex oonoj uma'l u naj k'atz Aak uva' mama'la ch'a'k chin atik ok sti'. Tul til naj Aak, as ku' naj qaaloj techal toon ivatz naj vatz tx'ava' vatz Aak. As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Pap, asoj la asa', as b'an b'a'nil sve. As eesa u ch'o'me' svi', tan la oleb' axhe',— ti'k naj.
42005013	As taq' ve't b'en u Jesús iq'ab' ti' naj. Ech tal Aak ile': —B'a'n kuxhe'. Kat b'a'nxiy ve't axhe',— ti'k Aak. As yak kuxh el u ch'a'k chine' ti' naj.
42005014	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te naj: —Katini'k chit aalkat. Pet kuxh k'uch eeb' vatz u nachol Tiixhe' ti' unq'a tename'. As kuxh aq' ve't u oye' uva' alel kan ta'n u Moisés, texhlal tetz uva' kat txanyu ve't axh,— ti'k u Jesús.
42005015	As aal chit nik ipax ve't itzib'lal u Jesús xo'l unq'a tename'. As a' chit mama'la tename' nikat imol ve't tib' ti' tab'il viyol Aake' as ti' uva' la ib'a'nxisa ve't Aak unq'a aach'o'me'.
42005016	Pet b'enameen nikat tel ch'u'l u Jesús xo'l unq'a tename' ti' ib'en inachat Tiixh sijunal tu unq'a atinb'ale' uve' ye'lkat uxhchil.
42005017	As tu uma'l u q'ii tul nikat ichusun u Jesús tu uma'l u kab'al, as xonlik ok ka'l unq'a fariseo tuk' ka't unq'a uxhchile' uva' chuselik tib' ti' u tzaq'ite' uva' tz'ib'amal kan. As a' tzaakat chajnaj tulaj unq'a talaj tename' uva' tu u Galilea tuk' tu u Judea as tuk' tu u Jerusalén. As atik ve't vib'a'nil u Kub'aal Tiixhe' k'atz u Jesús ti' ib'a'nxisal unq'a aach'o'me'.
42005018	As oon ka'l unq'a naj vatz u kab'ale' uva' atikkat ok u Jesús. As chelemalik uma'l u aach'o'm ta'n chajnaj vi' uma'l u ch'achi'm tze', tan tze'unik tib' vichi'ole'. As tal chajnaj tok tu kab'al ti' taq'at ok u aach'o'me' vatz u Jesús.
42005019	As jit uch tok chajnaj ta'n unq'a mama'la tename'. As je' ve't chajnaj vi' u kab'ale'. As teesa ve't chajnaj unb'iil ivi' u kab'ale'. As taq' ve't ku' chajnaj u aach'o'me' tuk' u ch'achi'm tze'e' xo'l unq'a tename' vatz u Jesús.
42005020	As tul til ve't u Jesús uva' k'ujlik chit ik'u'l chajnaj ti' Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u aach'o'me': —Kat sotzye' vapaave',— ti'k Aak.
42005021	As unq'a fariseo tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', as ech tal ve't je' ile' ste: —¿Kam tijle'me' q'i u naje' uve' ni tale'? Tan ni teesa naj iq'ii u Tiixhe', tan ye'l umaj uxhchil at vatz u tx'ava'e' uva' la sotzsan paav. Pet ta'ne' u Tiixhe' la sotzsan u paave',— ti'k chajnaj svatzaj.
42005022	As atik sk'u'l u Jesús uva' kam nik tal je' chajnaj ste. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te chajnaj: —¿Kam q'i uve' va'len kuxh netitz'a ti' vunyole'?
42005023	¿Tan ab'iste q'i uva' ye' la oleb' in ti' ib'anche' uva' netitz'a? ¿Ma ti' uva': «Kat sotzye' vapaave',» chaj in te u aach'o'me'? ¿Pet moj: «Txakpen. As kuxh ve'te',» chaj in la vale'?
42005024	Pet aq'al uva' la etootzi u tijle'm ti' ul isotzsat ipaav unq'a aapaave' vatz u tx'ava'e', as sevatz tuk valkat te u aach'o'me',— ti'k Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u aach'o'me': —Txakpen. As eq'o vach'achi'm tze'e'. As kuxh ve't takab'al,— ti'k Aak.
42005025	As yak kuxh txakpu ve't u naje' vatz unq'a tename'. As isik' ve't naj u ch'achi'm tze'e'. As b'en ve't naj tikab'al. As va'lik chit toksat ve't naj iq'ii u Tiixhe' tul b'en naj.
42005026	As teq'o ve't taama unq'a tename' ta'n uve' ib'an u Jesús. As toksa ve't unq'a tename' iq'ii u Tiixhe' ti' uve' ib'an Aak. As ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile' svatzaj: —Xo'veb'al chit uve' kat qillu ve't cheel,— ti'k unq'a tename'.
42005027	As xamtik ve't stuul, as el ve't ch'u'l u Jesús tu u tename'. As til ve't Aak uma'l u naj uva' Leví ib'ii uva' nik molon puaj tetz u Roma. Xonlik naj tu u atinb'ale' uva' nik imolpukat u puaje'. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te naj: —Si'u. Xekeb'en svi',— ti'k Aak.
42005028	As txakpu ve't u Leví. Taq' ve't kan naj unq'a vee' skajayil. As xekeb' ve't naj ti' Aak.
42005029	As ib'an ve't u Leví tuch uma'l u nimla tx'a'o'm tikab'al ti' u Jesús. As nimal unq'a naje' ooni uva' nik molon puaj tetz u Roma. As atik ok chajnaj vatz u meexhae' k'atz Aak tuk' ka't unq'a uxhchil.
42005030	As xe't ve't ka'l unq'a fariseo ti' unq'a ichusulib' Aake', tuk' ka't unq'a uxhchile' uva' chuselik tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite'. As ech tal ve't ile': —¿Kam b'an ta'n q'i uva' netx'a'ne' as netuk'a'e' xo'l unq'a molol puaje' tetz u Roma tuk' unjoltu unq'a uxhchile' uve' ye' ni niman u Tiixhe'?— ti'k chajnaj tal te unq'a ichusulib' u Jesús.
42005031	As tul tab'i ve't u Jesús u yole' uve' alpu te unq'a ichusulib'e', as ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ab'il uve' ye'l ch'o'm sti', as ye'le u aatz'ake' la txakon sti'. Pet a' unq'a aach'o'me' uve' nitxakon u aatz'ake' sti'.
42005032	As jit unq'a uxhchile' tul unmolo uva' ni tal je' ste uva' ye'l ipaav ati. Pet a' unq'a uxhchile' uva' nich'o'n ste uva' kat paavini, as a'e' tul unmolo, aq'al uva' la ijalpu ve't vitxumb'ale',— ti'k u Jesús.
42005033	As ech tal ve't ka'l unq'a uxhchil ile' te u Jesús: —¿Kam q'i uva' jatpajul kuxh nikuy unq'a ichusulib' u Xhune' iva'y tul ninach chajnaj Tiixh? As echat chit nib'an unq'a ichusulib' unq'a fariseo. Pet ech koj unq'a achusulib'e', tan nitx'a'n chajnaj. As ni tuk'a' chajnaj. ¿As kam q'i uve' ye' nikuy chajnaj iva'y?— ti'k unq'a uxhchile' tal te u Jesús.
42005034	Ech tal ve't Aak ile': —¿La kol uch q'a uva' la iya'lu unq'a ilonaale' ikuyat iva'y tu umaj nimla q'ii ti' teq'ot tib' umaj me'al umaj uxhchil? As tul il u tzumela ile' at xo'l unq'a ilonaale'.
42005035	As lanal ilej uma'l u q'ii uva' la ul eesal el u tzumelae' sxo'l. As a'n la ikuy ve't unq'a ilonaale' iva'y,— ti'k u Jesús.
42005036	As tal ve't u Jesús uma'l u k'uchuvatz uva' ech ni tal ile': —Ye'xheb'il la jach'un umaj ak' oksa'm ti' ik'ooal umaj q'a'l oksa'm, tan asoj ech la ib'ane', as la yan ve't u ak' oksa'me'. As jit kuxh ta'ne'. Pet ye' b'a'n tilpu ve't u ak' oksa'me' tuk' u q'a'l oksa'me'.
42005037	As mita'n la uch taq'ax ku' u ak' vino tu umaj q'a'l tz'u'm uva' ech tilone' xhaalo, tan la iq'ix u ak' vino u q'a'l tz'u'me' tul la q'u'ili. As la peq'xu ve't u vino. As la tz'ejxu ve't u tz'u'm xhaaloe' tuk' u vino.
42005038	Pet tu umaj ak' tz'u'm xhaalo la ku'kat u ak' vino, aq'al uva' ye' la tz'ejxi. As mita'n la yan u tz'u'm xhaaloe'.
42005039	As ab'il uva' la uk'an u vino uva' q'u'imal as eche' la koj isa' tuk'at u ak' vino uve' ye' q'u'imal, tan ech la tal ile': «Va'l itx'umtx'ul u vino uve' q'u'imal ti' u ak' vino uve' ye' q'u'imal,» chaj u uxhchile' la tale',— ti'k u Jesús.
42006001	Tu uma'l u xeem q'ii, as b'ex paloj u Jesús tuk' unq'a ichusulib'e' xo'l unq'a trigo uva' avamalike. As pal ik'us ve't chajnaj ka'l ivatz unq'a trigo. As iyuli chajnaj tiq'ab'. As techb'u ve't chajnaj.
42006002	Tul til ve't ka'l unq'a fariseo, as ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te unq'a ichusulib' Aake': —¿Kam b'an ta'n uve' neb'ane'? As tul a'e' uve' ye' la uch ib'anchu tu u xeem q'iie',— ti'k chajnaj.
42006003	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —¿Ma ye'xhkam b'a nesik'le uva' kat ib'an u David tul uva' kat va'yi tuk' unq'a imoole' uva' xekelik sti'?
42006004	Tan kat ok ve't u David vatz u atinb'ale' uva' ninachpukat Tiixh. As kat itx'a' ve't u paane' uva' ma'tik teesal el tzan vi' u meexha tu u nachb'al Tiixhe'. As kat taq' u David te unq'a imoole' uva' xekelik sti'. As tul a' kuxh unq'a oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh uva' la echb'un unq'a paane',— ti'k u Jesús.
42006005	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —As tul ine' uva' in, as ine' viB'aal u xeem q'iie',— ti'k u Jesús tal te unq'a fariseo.
42006006	As tu uma't u xeem q'ii, as ok ve't u Jesús tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh. As chusun ve't Aak xo'l unq'a tename'. Atik ok uma'l u naj uva' k'oro'xhinik tib' viseb'al iq'ab'e'.
42006007	As nik kuxh itx'eb' ka'l unq'a fariseo tuk' ka't unq'a uxhchil uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite' ti' uva' ma tuk ib'a'nxisa u Jesús u naje' tu u xeem q'iie' moj ye'le, tan nik ichuk chajnaj txumb'al ti' icheesal ipaav Aak.
42006008	Pet ootzimalik vitxumb'al chajnaje' ta'n u Jesús. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u naje' uve' k'oro'xhinik tib' viq'ab'e': —Txakpen. As txakeb'en sukuxo'l,— ti'k Aak. As txakpu ve't naj. As ul ve't naj txakeb'oj xo'l chajaak.
42006009	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —As tuk unch'oti uma'l u yol sete. ¿Ab'iste uve' la uch kub'anat tu u xeem q'iie'? ¿Ma u b'a'ne'? ¿Pet moj u va'lexhe'? ¿As ma la uch kulochat unq'a uxhchile'? ¿Pet moj la kuxh qil ikame'?— ti'k u Jesús.
42006010	As isaji ve't b'en u Jesús unq'a tename' uve' atik ok k'atz Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u aach'o'me': —Yu'b'a' vaq'ab'e',— ti'k Aak tal te naj. As iyu'b'a' ve't naj viq'ab'e'. As yak kuxh b'a'nx ve't viq'ab' naje'.
42006011	As ul ve't ivi' unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite' tuk' unq'a fariseo ti' uve' ib'an u Jesús. As iyol ve't chajnaj svatzaj uva' kam la tulb'e chajnaj ti' tel iq'ii u Jesús vatz unq'a tename'.
42006012	As tul ilej ve't uma'l u q'ii, as je' ve't u Jesús vi' uma'l u vitz ti' inachat Tiixh. As uma'l chit aq'b'al Aak ti' inachat Tiixh.
42006013	As tul sajb'u ve'te', as imolo ve't tzan Aak unq'a ichusulib'e'. As itxaa ve't Aak kab'laval unq'a ichusulib'e'. As a' chajnaje' uve' kat ik'ujb'a' ve't kan Aak apóstol.
42006014	A' u Simón uva' kat toksa Aak vib'ii uva' Lu', tuk' u Lixh uve' titz'in tib' tuk' u Simón, tuk' u Jacobo, tuk' u Xhun, tuk' u Pi'l, tuk' u Bartolomé,
42006015	tuk' u Mateo, tuk' u Maxh, tuk' uma't u Jacobo, vik'aol u Alfeo, tuk' uma't u Simón uva' Selote ch'elel,
42006016	tuk' u Judas, vik'aol u Jacobo, tuk' u Judas uva' Iscariote uve' k'ayin u Jesús.
42006017	As ku' ve't ch'u'l u Jesús vi' u vitze' tuk' unq'a apóstol as tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uve' nik ichus tib' k'atz Aak. As txakeb' ve't chajaak xo'l unq'a tename' vatz uma'l u chaq'aala, tan molik tib' unq'a uxhchile' ti' tab'it viyol Aake'. As at uxhchil tzaa tu u Judea, tu u Jerusalén, tuk' tu unq'a tz'a'la vitze' uva' tu u Tiro, tuk' tu u Sidón. As a' nikat tale' uva' la teesa Aak u ch'o'me' sti'.
42006018	As jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' atik ok sub'ul sk'atz, as nikat ib'a'nxisa ve't u Jesús.
42006019	As a' chit mama'la tename' nikat sa'on ikanat u Jesús, tan atik vib'a'nil u Tiixhe' k'atz Aak. As nik ib'a'nxisa Aak unq'a aach'o'me' skajayil.
42006020	As isaji ve't b'en u Jesús unq'a uxhchile' uva' nik ichus tib' k'atz Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Achveb'al chit ex, jank'al ex uve' ootzimal seta'n uva' techal chit la iloch ex u Tiixhe', tan a' exe' uva' at etokeb'al xo'l u tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'.
42006021	As achveb'al chit ex, jank'al ex uve' niva'y vetaanxelale' ti' viyol u Tiixhe', tan a' exe' la iloch ex u Tiixhe'. As achveb'al chit ex, jank'al ex uve' netoq' scheel ta'n txumu'm, tan a' exe' uva' la chiib' ve't ex xamtel.
42006022	As achveb'al chit ex, jank'al ex uve' la ixval ex, as la tilul ex, as la yoq'pu ve't ex ta'n unq'a uxhchile', as sti' kuxh .
42006023	As chiib'ojtaj ex tu u q'iie' tul ech la ulb'el exe', tan nime' vetx'aja'me' tuk aq'a xoj sete tu almika'. As chiib'ojtaj ex k'uxh la epaleb'e k'axk'o, tan ech chit kat ulb'el unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' ta'n unq'a q'esla eb'aale'.
42006024	Pet ech koj ex, uva' ex tx'ioliq'ii, tan ¡oyeb' chit evatz! tan kat chiib'iy ex vatz u tx'ava'e'. Esti'e' ye'l uma'toj etx'aja'm la ek'ule'.
42006025	¡As oyeb' chit evatz, jank'al ex uve' ye'l etaanxelal niva'ye' ti' viyol u Tiixhe'! tan ti' uva' at ve't vetx'iib'al eq'iie'. As xamtel as a'n la va'y ve't vetaanxelale'. ¡As oyeb' chit evatz, jank'al ex uve' netze'len cheel ta'n chiib'ichil! tan xamtel la txumun ve't vetaanxelale'. As la oq' ve't ex.
42006026	As ¡oyeb' chit evatz tul niyolb'e ex unq'a uxhchile' skajayil ti' toksal eq'ii! tan ech kat ulb'el unq'a q'esla eb'aale' tul nikat toksa iq'ii unq'a chulin yole' uva' nik toksa tib' q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe'.
42006027	As jank'al ex uve' ni niman vunyole', as tuk val sete, xo'noj unq'a uxhchile' sete uve' nich'o'n taama seti'. Eb'antaj b'a'nil te unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni b'anon u va'lexhe' sete.
42006028	As b'a'noj eyolon ti' unq'a uxhchile' uva' va'lexh iyolon seti'. As enachtaj Tiixh ti' unq'a uxhchile' uve' nixe't seti'.
42006029	Asoj la itz'ich umaj uxhchil evatz, as etaq'taj ok unjalit vevatze'. Asoj ab'il la maon vexheerkae', as etaq'taj kan vekami'xhe' unpajte.
42006030	As ab'il uva' la jajon umaj kam sete, as etaq'taj ste. As ab'il uva' la maon umaj etetz, as ye' la eya'lu uva' la iq'aavisa sete.
42006031	As kam u b'a'nile' uva' nesa' uva' la ib'an unq'a uxhchile' sete, as echat la eb'an te unq'a uxhchile',
42006032	tan asoj a' kuxh unq'a uxhchile' xo'n sete uva' xo'n ex ste, as ye' la oksal eq'ii ti' uve' neb'ane', tan echat kuxh nib'an unq'a uxhchile' uve' ye' ni niman u Tiixhe'.
42006033	Asoj a' kuxh neb'ankat b'a'nil te unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni b'anon u b'a'nile' sete, as ye' la oksal eq'ii ti' uve' neb'ane', tan echat kuxh nib'an unq'a uxhchile' uve' ye' ni niman u Tiixhe'.
42006034	Asoj a' kuxh unq'a uxhchile' la etaq' ik'am uva' ootzimal seta'n uva' la iq'aavisa sete kam uva' kat ik'ama, as ye' la oksal eq'ii ti' uve' la eb'ane', tan echat kuxh nib'an unq'a uxhchile' uva' ye' ni niman u Tiixhe'.
42006035	Pet xo'noj unq'a uxhchile' sete uva' nich'o'n taama seti'. Eb'antaj b'a'nil ste. Etaq'taj ik'am unq'a uxhchile'. Pet ye' la etx'eb' ich'exel, aq'al uva' nim chit vetx'aja'me' la ek'ule'. As ech ek'uchate' uva' ex ve't me'al ik'aol u Tiixhe' uva' echen tu almika', tan b'a'nla txumb'ale' vitxumb'al Aake' ti' unq'a je'naj vatze' tuk' unq'a paasan tziie'.
42006036	Esti'e' ni val sete, etxumtaj chit ivatz unq'a uxhchile' eche' uve' nib'an u Kub'aal Tiixhe'.
42006037	Asoj ye' la eb'an isuuchil vemoole', as ye'l ex la b'anax esuuchil ta'n vemoole'. Asoj ye'l ipaav vemoole' la echuke', as ye'l epaav la chukpi ta'n vemoole'. Asoj la esotzsa ipaav unq'a emoole', as la sotzsal epaav unpajte.
42006038	Asoj aya'l chit ek'u'l la eloch vemoole', as aya'l chit ik'u'l u Tiixhe' la iloch ex Aak. As nimale' la taq' Aak sete ti' uve' la etaq' te vemoole',— ti'k u Jesús.
42006039	As tal ve't u Jesús uma't u k'uchuvatz uva' ech ni tal ile': —Tan ye' la itx'ol umaj tzot ich'ijil uma't tzot, tan eela iku'e' skaab'il tu jul.
42006040	Ye' la lejon itxumb'al umaj chusulib' ti' u chusul tetze'. As tul la tzojpu ve't ichusat tib' u chusulib'e', as a'n la teq'o ve't vitxumb'al u chusul tetze'.
42006041	¿As kam q'i uve' va'l kuxh esajit ok u tal ch'ise' tu vivatz vetitz'in etatzike', as tul ye' netil je' etib', tul at uma'l u potzo'm tu vevatze'?
42006042	Tan asoj at uma'l u potzo'm tu vevatze', as ¿la kol uch etalat q'a te: «Vetitz'in etatzike', tuk veesa el tzan u ch'ise' tu vavatze',» ma chaj ex la etale'? ¡Tul il u potzo'm ile' ato'k tu vevatze'! ¡Ex kuxh ka'vatz! Eteesataj u potzo'me' tu vevatze' b'axa. As a'n la uch etilat ve't u ch'ise' tivatz vetitz'in etatzike'. As la eteesa ve't el.
42006043	As jit b'a'ne' u tze'e' uva' va'lexh ivatz ni taq'e'; as jit va'lexh u tze'e' uva' b'a'n vivatze' ni taq'e',
42006044	tan la exhlal unq'a tze'e' tul la vatzin tze'. As eche' la koj uch quxat umaj higuera ti' umaj ch'i'x; as mita'n la koj uch quxat umaj uuva ti' umaj vokkin ch'i'x.
42006045	Echat b'anel ta'n unq'a uxhchile', tan u b'a'nla aamae', as a' kuxh unq'a b'a'nla chaj txumb'ale' ni tel ch'u'l tu u taanxelale'. Pet ech koj u uxhchile' uva' va'lexh vitxumb'ale', tan a' kuxh u va'lexhe' ni tel ch'u'l tu u taanxelale'. As kam uve' at tu u taanxelal u uxhchile', as a'e' ni tal vitzi'e'.
42006046	¿As kam q'i uve': «¡Kub'aal Jesús! ¡Kub'aal Jesús!» chu kuxh ex sve, tul ye' nenima unq'a yole' uve' ni val sete?
42006047	Tuk val sete, tan jank'al u uxhchile' uve' ni tok ch'u'l sunk'atz as ni tab'i vunyole' as ninima uve' ni val ste,
42006048	as ech b'an ta'n u uxhchile' eche' uma'l u naj uva' kat ilak vikab'ale', tan kat ik'ot naj u jule'. As nimal kat taq' b'en naj u jule' techal kat ilej naj u sivane'. As kat ichab'a naj taq'at b'en u tz'aje' tetz u kab'ale' vi' u sivane'. As tul kat ul ve't uma'l u mam jab'al, as kat sipk'u ve't unq'a job'ich a'e'. As jank'al chit iyak'il u a'e' kat ul iputz' tib' ti' u kab'ale'. As ye'l u kab'ale' kat tiini, tan chab'amal ik'ujeb' u kab'ale' vi' u sivane'.
42006049	Pet ech koj unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni ab'in vunyole', as ye' ninima, tan ech b'an ta'n unq'a uxhchile' eche' uma't u naj uva' kat ilak vikab'ale' vi' u sanab'e', tan ye'l tz'aj kat taq' kan naj sjaq'. As tul uva' kat sipk'u ve't unq'a job'ich a'e', as kat pal tija ve't u a'e' u kab'ale'. As txumleb'al chit te'p ve't u kab'ale' kat ib'ana,— ti'k u Jesús.
42007001	As tul ya' ve't iyolon u Jesús xo'l unq'a tename', as q'aavik ve't ok Aak tu u Capernaúm.
42007002	As atik uma'l viq'esal unq'a sol tzitzi' uva' b'iitik kuxh ikam ve't uma'l vik'am ta'n uma'l u ch'o'm. As xo'nik chit vik'ame' ste.
42007003	As tul tab'i ve't viq'esal unq'a sole' itzib'lal u Jesús, as ichaj ve't b'en naj ka'l unq'a iq'esal unq'a tiaal Israel ti' b'en ijajat ve't chajnaj b'a'nil te u Jesús ti' uva' la ul ib'a'nxisa Aak vik'am viq'esal unq'a sole'.
42007004	As tul oon ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tiaal Israel k'atz u Jesús, as ijaj ve't chajnaj kuyb'al te Aak. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te Aak: —La kujaj uma'l u b'a'nil see, pap, ti' uva' la b'en ab'a'nxisa uma'l vik'am viq'esal unq'a sole', tan b'a'ne' uva' la ab'an b'a'nil te naj, tan b'a'n itxumb'al naj.
42007005	As xo'n chit u kutename' te naj. As naje' kat b'anon isuuchil ti' ilakpu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh,— ti'k chajnaj tal te u Jesús.
42007006	As b'en ve't u Jesús ti' chajnaj. As tul b'iitik toon ve't Aak k'atz vikab'al viq'esal unq'a sole', as ichaj ve't tzan viq'esal unq'a sole' ka'l unq'a tetz k'ultzi'. As ech ul tal chajnaj ile': —Pap, ni tal tzan viq'esal unq'a sole' see uva' ye' kuxh la akoolisa eeb' ti' oon tikab'al aak. As jit tetz aak uva' la oon axh tu vikab'al aak, tan nim aalche' ti' aak uva' ni tale'.
42007007	As ye'l tijle'm aak at pal see'. Esti'e' ye' ni tul aak savatz. Pet asoj la ab'an b'a'nil, as la kuxh aal b'en u yole' ti' ib'a'nxisal vik'am aake'. As tuk b'a'nxoje' vik'ame' uva' ni tale'.
42007008	As ni tal aak uva' at ib'ooq'ol aak uva' techal ninima aak. As at isol aak unpajte uva' techal ninima kam ni tal aak ste, tan asoj la tal aak te umaj visole': «Kuxh b'en,» chaj aak ste, as ma'te. Asoj: «Si'u,» chaj aak te uma't naj, as techal la ul naj vatz aak. Asoj la tal aak te umaj vik'ame': «B'an u vi'le',» chaj aak ste, as nib'ane',— ti'k chajnaj tal te u Jesús.
42007009	As tul tab'i ve't u Jesús u yole' uva' tal tzan viq'esal unq'a sole', as txuq'txun ve't Aak sti'. As isuchq'i ve't tib' Aak ti' isajit b'en unq'a tename' uve' xekik ti' Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ile' jik chit tuk val sete, tan ye'l umaj naj vile'te xo'l unq'a tiaal Israel uva' ech ik'ujb'a't ik'u'le' svi' eche' nib'an viq'esal unq'a sole',— ti'k Aak.
42007010	As tul q'aav ve't unq'a naje' tikab'al viq'esal unq'a sole', as b'a'nik ve't vik'am naje', tul oon ve't chajnaj.
42007011	As b'en ve't u Jesús tu uma't u tenam uva' Nain. As nimalik unq'a ichusulib' Aake' xekik sti' tuk' unq'a tename'.
42007012	As b'iitik kuxh toon ve't u Jesús tzi' u tename'. As til ve't Aak uva' chelemalik uma'l u kamnaj, tal uma'l u txakay ixoj. As ta'n chite' unch'i'til u tal u ixoje'. As a' chit mama'la tename' xekik ti' ixoj.
42007013	As til ve't Aak u ixoje'. As itxum ve't Aak ivatz ixoj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ye' kuxh oq' axh,— ti'k Aak.
42007014	As jetz'en ve't ok Aak k'atz unq'a uxhchile' uve' chelen tetz u kamnaje'. As ikan ve't ok Aak vikaaxha u kamnaje'. As txakeb' ve't chajnaj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u kamnaje': —Chelem xaak, ile' tuk val see, ¡Txakpen!— ti'k Aak.
42007015	As ul ve't taama u xaake'. As xoneb' ve't naj. As xe't ve't naj yolon. As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te vitxutx u xaake': —As taq' ve't ok Aak u xaake' te vitxutxe' Il vaval ile' kat ulyu taama,— ti'k Aak.
42007016	As teq'o ve't taama unq'a uxhchile' skajayil ta'n uve' ib'an u Jesús. As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile' ti' toksal iq'ii u Tiixhe': —¡Kat ulyu ve't uma'l u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' sukuxo'l uva' nim chit talche'! As a' u Tiixhe' kat ulyu ve't sukuxo'l ti' kulochpe',— ti'k unq'a uxhchile' skajayil.
42007017	As oora kuxh pax ve't itzib'lal u Jesús tulaj unq'a tename' tu u Judea as tulaj unq'a ko'me' unpajte.
42007018	As tul tab'i ve't u Xhune' itzib'lal u Jesús kam uve' nik ib'an Aak, as imolo ve't tzan u Xhune' ka'va'l unq'a ichusulib'e'.
42007019	As ichaj ve't b'en u Xhune' chajnaj k'atz u Jesús ti' ich'otit chajnaj ste: —¿Ma axh u Cristo uva' alel kan uva' la uli? ¿Pet moj latel kutx'eb' tul uma'toj uxhchil? chaj ex la etale',— ti'k u Xhune'.
42007020	As tul oon ve't chajnaj k'atz u Jesús, as ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —A' u Xhune' uve' nikat aq'on ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e', as kat ichaj tzan o' ti' kuch'otit see uva': «¿Ma axh u Cristo uva' alel kan uva' la uli? ¿Pet moj latel kutx'eb' tul uma'toj uxhchil?»— ti'k chajnaj tal te u Jesús.
42007021	As tul a's chit ib'a'nxisat Aak unq'a aach'o'me', as nik ib'a'nxisa ve't Aak unq'a uxhchile' uve' nik ipaleb'e unq'a k'axk'oe' ta'n unq'a sub'ule'. As ye' saach unq'a tzote' kat ilon ve't ta'n Aak.
42007022	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te unq'a ichusulib' u Xhune': —B'enoj etaltaj te u Xhune' kam uve' kat etila as kam uve' kat etab'i, tan ni tilon ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' tzotike; as nixaan ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' ko'xike; as unq'a uxhchile' uve' atik ok ch'a'k chin sti', as kat txanyu ve'te'; as ni tab'in ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' ye' nik tab'ine'; as kat ulyu ve't taama unq'a kamnaje'. As ni talax ve't u b'a'nla yole' te unq'a meeb'a'e'.
42007023	As achveb'al chit u uxhchile' uva' ye' la ka'kab'in taama ti' ik'ujb'a't ik'u'l svi',— ti'k u Jesús tal te chajnaj.
42007024	As q'aav ve't unq'a ichusulib' u Xhune'. As tal ve't u Jesús isuuchil u yole' ti' u Xhune' xo'l unq'a tename'. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —¿Kam kat b'ex etil ti' u Xhune', tul atik tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e'? ¿Ma kat b'ex etil umaj uxhchil uva' ech vitxumb'ale' eche' vi'oj aa uva' niliiq'a'ch ta'n u kajiq'e'?
42007025	¿Pet moj kat b'ex etil umaj uxhchil uva' vejel chit tib' tuk' u toksa'me'? Ye'le ta', tan jank'al unq'a naje' uve' vejel chit tib' tuk' u toksa'me', as a' kuxh atkat chajnaje' tulaj ikab'al unq'a ijlenaale'. As nimal b'a'nla chaj kam at xe' chajnaj.
42007026	¿Pet kam kat b'ex etil ti' u Xhune'? ¿As moj umaj u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' kat etila? Kano. An chite', tan q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' u Xhune'. As at pal u Xhune' ti' unjoltu unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe',
42007027	tan a' u Xhune' uva' ni tal u yole' uva' tz'ib'amal kan uva' ech ni tal ile': Tuk unb'axsa b'en uma'l u alol tetz vunyole' savatz. As a'e' la b'anon tuch u b'eye' savatz, ti'k u yole'.
42007028	As tuk val sete, tan ye'l uma'toj vatz tx'ava'illa uxhchil kat itz'eb'i uva' q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe', uva' nim talchu ti' u Xhune' uva' nik aq'on ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e'. Pet ab'il uva' at tokeb'al xo'l u tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe', as a' uxhchile' uva' at pal ti' u Xhune', k'uxh ye'l tijle'm ati,— ti'k u Jesús.
42007029	As tul tab'i ve't unq'a uxhchile' viyol u Jesús tuk' unq'a naje' uva' ni molon u puaj tetz u Roma, as ech tal ile': «Jik chit itxumb'al u Tiixhe',» ti'ke, tan ma'tik iku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e' ta'n u Xhune'.
42007030	Pet ech koj unq'a fariseo tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', tan ye' kat inima chajnaj kam uva' nikat isa' u Tiixhe' ti' chajnaj. As ye' kat isa' ve't chajnaj uva' la taq' ku' u Xhune' chajnaj xe' u a'e'.
42007031	As ech tal ve't u Kub'aal Jesús ile' te chajnaj: —¿As ab'iste q'i la unb'an eela tuk' u txumb'ale' uve' neb'ane'?
42007032	Tan eela kuxh vetxumb'ale' tuk' unq'a xaake' uve' xonle'l tu k'ayib'al. As nisik'ine' tul nisaache'. As ech ni tal ile' svatzaj: «K'uxh kat qoq'sa unq'a aae' sevatz, as ye'l ex kat b'ix ex. As k'uxh kat kub'itza unq'a b'itze' uva' txumleb'al chittu', as ye'l ex kat oq' ex,» ti'k chajnaj.
42007033	As tul kat ul u Xhune', as nik ikuy iva'y. As ye' nik tuk'a u ta'l u uuvae'. As kat eteesa iq'ii, tan kat etala uva' sub'ul atik ok sk'atz.
42007034	As tul kat ul, as nitx'a'ne', as ni tuk'a u ta'l u uuvae'. As netal ve't sti' uva' b'ich' uul chittu', as tetz k'ultzi' tib' tuk' unq'a molol puaje' tetz u Roma, as tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' aapaav sevatz.
