42024045	As taq' ve't Aak itxumb'al chajnaj ti' uva' la pal chajnaj tu yole' uva' tz'ib'amal kan ti' Aak.
42024046	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te chajnaj: —Ech ni tal unq'a yol ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan svi': «La chit ipaleb'e u Cristo u kamchile'. As titoxvu q'ii la ul taama unpajte.
42024047	As tuk' vib'ii Aake' la alpukat isuuchil u yole' xo'l unq'a tename' skajayil ti' uva' la ik'axa tib' unq'a tename' ti' vipaave' as la sotzsal ve't ipaav. As a' la xe'tkat tu u Jerusalén ti' talax isuuchil u yole',» ti'k u yole' uva' tz'ib'amal kan svi'.
42024048	As exe' tuk paxsan ve't unq'a yole' svi', tan exe' kat ab'in as exe' kat ilon kam uva' kat ulb'el in.
42024049	Pet kaaoj kan ex tzitza' tu u Jerusalén. As lanal ek'ul veyak'ile' uve' la ku' ch'u'l tu almika', tan tuk unchaj tzan u lochol etetze' uve' alel kan ta'n vunB'aale',— ti'k u Jesús.
42024050	As teq'o ve't el u Jesús unq'a ichusulib'e' ti'e'l u Jerusalén. As tul oon Aak tuk' chajnaj najlich u Betania, as taq' ve't je' Aak iq'ab', as b'a'n ve't iyolon Aak ti' chajnaj.
42024051	As tul kuxh tal Aak u b'a'ne' ti' chajnaj, as ijetz' ve't el tib' Aak. As aat kuxh til ve't chajnaj teq'ol ve't je' Aak tu almika'.
42024052	As toksa ve't chajnaj iq'ii u Jesús. As q'aav ve't chajnaj tu u Jerusalén. As va'lik chit itxuq'txun ve't chajnaj.
42024053	As jun q'ii nikat imol ve't tib' chajnaj tu u tostiixhe' ti' toksal iq'ii u Tiixhe'. An chite'.
43001001	As xe' q'iisaj atik chit uma'l u uxhchil uva' nik'uchun kam b'anta'n u Tiixhe'. As echenike' k'atz u Tiixhe', tan an chit Tiixhe' u uxhchile'.
43001002	As atik chite' u uxhchile' k'atz u Tiixhe' tul ye'xnik chee u vatz tx'ava'e'.
43001003	Jank'al chit unq'a vee' ati, as a'e' cheesan tetz. As ye'l umaj kam ati uva' jit u uxhchile' cheesan tetz.
43001004	As echen u tiichajile' k'atz u uxhchile'. As a' vitiichajile' u txijun tetz u qaanxelale'.
43001005	As a' u txijun tetz u qaanxelale' ni txijun b'en u q'ej toktoe'. As jatu koj la oleb' u q'ej toktoe' ti' itzaasale'.
43001006	As atik uma'l u naj uva' Xhun ib'ii uva' ichaj tzan u Tiixhe'
43001007	ti' ul talat isuuchil unq'a yole' sukuxo'l ti' u txijun tetz u qaanxelale', aq'al uva' kajayil chit o' tuk' unq'a tename' la kuk'ujb'a' kuk'u'l ti' u txijun tetz u qaanxelale'.
43001008	Jit u Xhune' u txijun tetz u qaanxelale'. Pet a' u Xhune' u alol tetz isuuchil u yole' ti' uva' ab'il u txijun tetz u qaanxelale'.
43001009	As tul kat ul u txijun tetz u qaanxelale' uva' ta'n chite' unch'i'til vatz u tx'ava'e',
43001010	as atik u txijun tetz u qaanxelale' xo'l unq'a tename'. As k'uxh a'e' u cheesan tetz u vatz tx'ava'e' skajayil, as ye' kat texhla unq'a tename' u tijle'me'.
43001011	As k'uxh a' ulkat xo'l vitename', as ye' kat k'ulpu ve'te' ta'n vitename'.
43001012	Pet ab'il uve' kat niman as kat ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l sti', as a'e' kat oksan o' sme'al ik'aol Tiixh.
43001013	As ye'l uva' tuk' koj itxumb'al umaj vatz tx'ava'illa aama as tuk' koj u tacha'v umaj uxhchil uva' kat ok o' sme'al ik'aol Tiixh. Pet tacha'v chit u Tiixhe' uva' kat ok o' sme'al ik'aol Tiixh.
43001014	As u uxhchile' uva' nik'uchun kam b'anta'n u Tiixhe', as atik ve't sukuxo'l, as nimal ve't b'a'nil kat ib'ana, as nik tal ve't u jikla yole' te unq'a tename'. As kat teq'o ve't qaama tan ech nik ib'ane' eche' uve' nik ib'an u Tiixhe' tan a'e' unch'i'til viK'aol u Tiixhe'. Esti'e' kat teq'o ve't qaama ti' unq'a uve' nik ib'an Aak.
43001015	As tal u Xhune' isuuchil unq'a yole' sti'. As ech tal ile': —Aake' uva' kat vala, uva' ech val ile': «Xekel tzan uma'l u uxhchil svi'. As nim talche' svi', tan atik chite' tul uva' ye'xnik itz'eb' in,»— ti'k u Xhune'.
43001016	As ye' niya' u Tiixhe' ti' taq'at vib'a'nile' sqe, tan nim chit vib'a'nil Aake' sqi',
43001017	tan b'a'ne' vitzaq'it Aake' uva' atik kan sukuxo'l ta'n u Moisés b'axa. Pet aal chit nim talchu ve't vib'a'nile' tuk' u jikla yole' uva' at sqi', as u uxhchil uva' ni val sete as a'e' u Jesucristo,
43001018	tan ye'xheb'il kat ilon ika'y u Tiixhe'. Pet ta'n kuxh unch'i'til viK'aol Aake' uva' uma'l kuxh vitxumb'al Aake' stuk', as a'e' uve' kat alon isuuchil sqe.
43001019	Unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' tu u Jerusalén as kat ichaj b'en chajnaj ka'l unq'a nachol Tiixh tuk' ka't unq'a tiaal u Leví ti' b'en ich'otil te u Xhune'. As ech tal chajnaj ile': —¿Kam eejle'me' q'i?— ti'k chajnaj. As tal ve't u Xhune' isuuchil u tijle'me' te chajnaj.
43001020	As ye' kat imuj u Xhune' yol. Pet jik chit kat tal u Xhune': —Jit ine' u Cristo,— ti'k u Xhune' tal te chajnaj.
43001021	As ich'oti ve't chajnaj: —¿Ab'iste axh q'i uve' naale'? ¿Ma axh u Elías?— ti'k chajnaj. —Ye'le, jit ine',— ti'k u Xhune'. —¿Pet moj axh u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' la uli?— ti'k chajnaj. —Ye'le, jit ine',— ti'k u Xhune'.
43001022	—¿Ab'iste ve't axh q'i uve' naale'? As al sqe, tan la qootzi ti' b'en qalat te unq'a chajol qetze'. ¿As kam u eejle'me' uve' la b'en qale'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43001023	As ech tal ve't u Xhun ile': —A' u vijle'me' uva' tal kan u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' Isaías, tul ech tal ile': Tan ine' uva' nunsik'ine' tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e'. As ech ni val ile': «¡Eb'antaj etuche' ti' ek'ulat u kuB'ooq'ole' eche' ijikb'a'l umaj b'ey!» ti'k u Isaías tal kan,—  ti'k u Xhune'.
43001024	As a' unq'a fariseo chajon b'en unq'a naje' ti' ich'otil itzi' u Xhune'.
43001025	As ech tal ve't unq'a naj ile' te u Xhune': —Asoj jit axh u Cristo, jit axh u Elías, jit axh u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' la uli, as ¿kam q'i uve' naaq' ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43001026	As ech tal ve't u Xhun ile': —Tan xe' kuxh a'e' ni vaq'kat ku' unq'a uxhchile'. Pet at uma'l u uxhchil sexo'l uva' ye' ootzimal u tijle'me' seta'n.
43001027	As xekel ve't tzan svi'. As jit unk'ulele' uva' la unsaaput vixa'pe', tan nim talche' svi',— ti'k u Xhune'.
43001028	As a' ib'ankat tu uma'l u tal tenam uve' Betania jalit u nimla a'e' uve' Jordán. As tzitzi' nik taq'kat ku' u Xhune' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e' tuk' vib'ii u Tiixhe'.
43001029	Ech ve't q'ejal stuul, as til ve't u Xhune' ijetz'en ok u Jesús sk'atz. As ech tal ve't u Xhun ile' xo'l unq'a tename': —¡Etiltaj, tan il Aak ile' uva' ech tatine' eche' kaneero' uva' niyatz'pu vatz u Tiixhe'! As Aake' chajel ve't tzan ta'n u Tiixhe' ti' ul isotzsal ipaav unq'a tename' skajayil.
43001030	As Aake' uva' kat val sete uva' ech val ile': «Xekel tzan uma'l u uxhchil svi'. As atik chite' tul ye'xnik itz'eb' in,» ch'in kat vala.
43001031	As mita'n in ootzin tetz Aak. Pet kat ul vaq' ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e', aq'al uva' la ootzil ve't Aak ta'n u kutename' uva' tiaal Israel,— ti'k u Xhune'.
43001032	As ech tal u Xhun ile' unpajte: —Kat vil iku' ve't ch'u'l u Tiixhla Espíritu tu almika', eche' iku' ch'u'l umaj paroomaxh. As ul ik'ujb'a' ve't tib' tiib'a Aak.
43001033	As tul ye'xnik vootzi Aak, as ma'tik talat u chajol vetze' sve uva' chajon tzan in ti' vaq'at ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e': «Ab'il uva' la eel iku' ve't ch'u'l u Tiixhla Espíritu stiib'a as la atin sk'atz, as Aake' la aq'on ve't ok u Tiixhla Espíritu tu vetaanxelale',» ti'k sve.
43001034	As a'e' kat vila. Esti'e' ni val sete uva' Aake' viK'aol u Tiixhe',— ti'k u Xhune' tal te unq'a tename'.
43001035	Ech q'ejal stuul, as atik ve't u Xhune' tuk' ka'va'l vichusulib'e' tzi' u a'e'.
43001036	Tul til u Xhune' ipal u Jesús, as ech tal ve't ile': —¡Il Aak ile'! ¡As Aake' uva' ech tatine' eche' kaneero' uva' niyatz'pu vatz u Tiixhe'! As chajel ve't tzan Aak ta'n u Tiixhe' ti' ul isotzsal ipaav unq'a tename' skajayil,— ti'k u Xhune' tal te ka'va'l vichusulib'e'.
43001037	As tul tab'i ve't chajnaj uva' tal u Xhune' ti' u Jesús, as taq' ve't kan chajnaj u Xhune'. As xekeb' ve't chajnaj ti' u Jesús.
43001038	As isuchq'i ve't tib' Aak. Isaji ve't Aak ka'va'l u naje' uva' xekik ti' Aak. As ich'oti ve't Aak itzi' chajnaj: —¿Kam nechuke'?— ti'k Aak tal te chajnaj. Ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Rabí, katil jejle'lkat axh?— ti'k chajnaj.
43001039	As ech tal Aak ile': —Si'unaj. Etiltaj,— ti'k Aak tal te chajnaj. B'en ve't chajnaj ti' Aak. B'ex til ve't chajnaj katil uve' atikkat Aak. As kaa ve't chajnaj k'atz Aak, tan kamal kajva'l oora ku' q'ii oon chajnaj k'atz Aak.
43001040	As Lixh ib'ii uma'l u naje' uva' kat ab'in viyol u Xhune'. As xekeb' ve't naj ti' u Jesúse'. As a' u Lixhe' u titz'in u Simón uva' Lu'.
43001041	As b'ex ichuk ve't u Lixhe' u Simón. As tul ilej naj u Simón uva' Lu', as ech tal naj ile': —¡Kat kulejlu ve't u Mesías!— ti'k naj, tan «Cristo» isuuchil u yole' uva' «Mesías.»
43001042	As teq'o u Lixhe' u Simón sti'. B'ex ik'uch ve't naj u Jesús. Tul oon u Simón vatz u Jesús, as aalik ok Aak te naj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Axh Simón, ik'aol Jonás, cheel jit ve't axh Simón. Pet axh ve't Cefas la ib'ane',— ti'k u Jesús, tan a' isuuchil u yole' uva' «Cefas» as «Lu'» tu kuyolb'al.
43001043	Ech q'ejal stuul, as tal ve't u Jesús ib'en tu u Galilea. As tul oon ve't Aak, ilej ve't Aak uma'l u naj uva' Pi'l. As ech tal Aak ile' te naj: —Xekeb'en svi',— ti'k Aak.
43001044	As a' tzaanajkat u Pi'le' tu u Betsaida, tan uma'l kuxh itenam naj tuk' u Lu'e' as tuk' u Lixhe'.
43001045	As b'ex ichuk ve't u Pi'le' u Natanael. Tul ilej naj u Natanael, as ech tal naj ile': —Kat kulejlu ve't u uxhchile' uva' itz'ib'a kan u Moisés tuk' uva' tal kan unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe'. As a'e' vil uva' Jesús, vik'aol u Xhu'le', uva' aa Nazaret,— ti'k u Pi'le'.
43001046	As ech tal u Natanael ile': —¿La kol chit el ch'u'l umaj b'a'nla uxhchil q'a tu u Nazaret?— ti'k naj. Ech tal ve't u Pi'l ile': —¡Ko'on! ¡Kuxh ila!— ti'k naj.
43001047	As tul til ve't u Jesús toon u Natanael sk'atz, as ech tal ve't Aak ile' ti' naj: —Il uma'l u tiaal Israel ile' uva' jik chit itxumb'al, tan ye'l yol nichuli naj,— ti'k u Jesús.
43001048	As ich'oti ve't u Natanael te Aak: —¿Katil q'i ootzikat in?— ti'k naj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ma'tik vilat axh jaq' uma'l u higuera tul ye'xnik oon u Pi'le' ti' amolole',— ti'k Aak tal te naj.
43001049	Ech tal u Natanael ile': —Chusul, axhe' vil viK'aol u Tiixhe'. As axhe' u tijlenaal u kutename' uve' tiaal Israel,— ti'k naj.
43001050	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —¿Ma nak'ujb'a' ak'u'l svi' ti' uva' kat val see uva' kat vil axh jaq' u tze'e' uva' higuera? Pet tuk val see, tan nime' uve' tuk eele' ti' uva' kat val see.
43001051	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Tan jik chit tuk val sete, tan la etil uva' jajle'l ve't u almika'e'. As tuk etil ije'e' as iku' ch'u'l unq'a ángele' uva' tetz u Tiixhe' tiib'a ti' ilochpe',— ti'k u Jesús.
43002001	Tu ve't itoxvu q'ii, as ti' uma'l u nimla q'ii ti' teq'ot tib' umaj uxhchil tu u tenam uva' Caná uva' echen tu u Galilea. Atik vitxutx u Jesús tzitzi'.
43002002	As sa'b'elal ve't u Jesús tuk' unq'a ichusulib'e' tu u tzumb'a'e'.
43002003	As til ve't vitxutx u Jesús uva' motx ve't u vino xo'l unq'a tename'. As ech tal ve't ile': —Kat motxyu ve't u vino,— ti'k vitxutx Aake' tal ste.
43002004	As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —¿Txutx, kam ni tokkat u yole' uve' naal sve? Tan ye' ileje'te uva' la unk'uch u vijle'me' te unq'a tename',— ti'k Aak.
43002005	As ech tal ve't vitxutx u Jesús ile' te unq'a lochonaale': —Eb'antaj kam uve' tuk tal Aak sete,— ti'k vitxutx u Jesús.
43002006	As atik vaajil unq'a nimla chaj lo'ch. As kamal o'vo'j txe'n a' nikat ib'en tu junun u lo'che'. As a' itxa'k unq'a lo'che' ti' imolpu a' uva' nik itxakonsa unq'a tiaal Israel ti' itx'aat iq'ab' tuk' ti' itx'aat unq'a aq'onb'ale' tu kab'al.
43002007	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te unq'a lochonaale': —Enoosataj unq'a lo'che' ta'n a',— ti'k Aak. As inoosa ve't chajnaj unq'a lo'che'.
43002008	As tul noo ve't unq'a lo'che', as ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Eteesataj el tzan unb'ooj uve' at tu u lo'che'. As b'en etaq'taj te u ilol tetz isuuchil u nimla q'iie' ti' teq'ot tib' me'al ik'aol umaj uxhchil,— ti'k Aak.
43002009	As tul tuk'a ve't u ilol tetz isuuchil u tzumb'a'e' u a'e' uve' ib'ensa u Jesús sb'a'nla vino, as jit alpu te naj uva' katil tzaakat u vino. As a'ik kuxh unq'a lochonaale' ootzin tetz. As imolo ve't u ilol tetz isuuchil u nimla q'iie' u naje' uve' teq'o tib' tuk' tixqel.
43002010	As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Jank'al chit unq'a naje' as a' nib'axsa chajnaj unq'a b'a'nla chaj vino. As tul nimal ma't tuk'ale', as a'n kat pal ve't u vino uve' ye'l itxa'k. Pet ech koj axh, tan kat akol u b'a'nla vino. As a'n ile' naaq' ve'te',— ti'k naj tal te u naje'.
43002011	As a' u b'axa k'uchb'al tetz u tijle'm u Jesús uva' kat ib'ana. As a' kat ib'ankat tu u tal tenam uva' Caná uva' echen tu u Galilea. As kat ik'uch ve't Aak uva' nim talchu ve't Aak. As aal chit ik'ujb'a' ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aake' ik'u'l sti'.
43002012	As tul ma'tik itzojpu ve't u nimla q'iie' ti' teq'ot tib' me'al ik'aol umaj uxhchil, as b'en ve't Aak tu u Capernaúm tuk' vitxutxe' tuk' unq'a titz'in Aake' tuk' unq'a ichusulib'e'. As ye' kuxh jatva'l q'ii ib'an Aak tzitzi'.
43002013	As b'iitik kuxh tul ve't u nimla q'iie' uva' pascua ib'ii. As b'en ve't u Jesús tu u Jerusalén tuk' unq'a ichusulib'e'.
43002014	As tul ok ve't Aak vatz viq'anal u tostiixhe', as til ve't Aak unq'a uxhchile' uve' nik ik'ayine'. At chajnaj nikat k'ayin vaakaxh, kaneero', paroomaxh ti' toksat unq'a tename' unq'a avane' vatz u Tiixhe'. As til Aak uva' xonlik ka't unq'a naj uva' nik jalon unq'a puaje'.
43002015	As ipaatx'u ve't Aak uma'l u tz'u'm. As ilaq'b'a ve't el Aak unq'a uxhchile' skajayil uve' nik k'ayin unq'a ikaneero'e' tuk' unq'a ivaakaxhe'. As imak'e'l Aak vipuaj unq'a naje' uve' nikat jalon puaj. As ipilq'u ve't Aak unq'a imeexha chajnaje'.
43002016	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te unq'a k'ayin paroomaxhe': —¡Eteq'otaj el unq'a etetze'! ¡Ye' kuxh etoksa u tostiixhe' sk'ayib'alil, tan tetz vunB'aale'!— ti'k Aak.
43002017	As a'n ul ve't u yole' sk'u'l unq'a ichusulib' Aake' uva' tz'ib'amal kan uva' ech ni tal ile': As nich'o'n vaama ti' unq'a vee' ni tuch tu vakab'ale', ti'k u yole'.
43002018	As ech tal ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tenam ile' te u Jesús: —¿Kam k'uchb'al tetz u eejle'me' la ak'uch sqe uva' la uch ab'anata' uve' nab'ane'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43002019	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —K'uxh la ete'pu u kab'ala', as la untxakpisa titoxvu q'ii,— ti'k Aak.
43002020	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Ma a' naale' uva' oxva'l kuxh q'ii la atxakpisakat u tostiixhe'? As tul vaajil toxk'al yaab' (46) kat txakpisalkat,— ti'k unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename'.
43002021	As ye'l uva' a' koj chit u kab'ale' uva' tal Aak. Pet a' vichi'ol Aake' uva' tala, tul uva' la ul taama Aak unpajte.
43002022	As xamtik ve't stuul tul ma'tik tul ve't taama Aak, as ul ve't viyol Aake' sk'u'l unq'a ichusulib'e' uva' tal Aak. As inima ve't chajnaj u yole' uve' tz'ib'amal kan ti' u tuleb'al taama Aake' as tuk' u yole' uva' tal Aak.
43002023	As tul atik u Jesús tu u Jerusalén ti' tilat u nimla q'iie', as ye' saach unq'a tename' ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' Aak, tan ti' uva' til ve't unq'a tename' unq'a k'uchb'al tetz u tijle'm Aake' uve' nik ib'ane'.
43002024	Pet jit ik'ujb'a' Aak ik'u'l ti' unq'a tename', tan ootzimalik ta'n Aak kam uva' at tu u taanxelal unq'a tename'.
43002025	As jit tz'ajinal la alpu te Aak uva' kam b'an ta'n itxumb'al unq'a tename', tan ootzimal vitxumb'al unq'a tename' ta'n Aak skajayil.
43003001	Atik uma'l u fariseo uva' Nicodemo ib'ii. As naj uma'l viq'esal unq'a tiaal Israel.
43003002	As oon ve't naj aq'b'al xe' u Jesús. As ech b'ex tal naj ile': —Chusul, as ootzimal sqa'n uva' a' u Tiixhe' kat chajon tzan axh, tan ye'xheb'il la tx'olon ib'anax unq'a k'uchb'al tetz u tijle'm u Tiixhe' uve' nab'ane', asoj ye'l Aak at sk'atz,— ti'k naj.
43003003	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Jik chit tuk val see, tan ab'il uva' ye' la itz'eb' tika'pa, as ye' la uch tok xo'l unq'a tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe',— ti'k u Jesús.
43003004	As ech tal ve't u Nicodemo ile': —¿Kam la tulb'e umaj naj q'i titz'eb'e' tul q'estu ve't naj? ¿Ma la uch b'a uva' la ok naj k'atz vitxutxe' ti' titz'eb' unpajte?— ti'k naj.
43003005	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Jik chit tuk val see, ab'il uva' ye'xhkam itz'eb'nal k'atz u Tiixhe' ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritu as ye'xhkam itz'eb'nal ta'n u a'e', as ye' la uch tok xo'l u tename' uva' at jaq' u tijle'm u Tiixhe'.
43003006	As ab'il uve' kat itz'eb' k'atz vitxutxe' as vatz tx'ava'illa chi'ol kuxhe'. Pet ab'il uve' la itz'eb' ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritu, as at ve't itiichajil k'atz u Tiixhe'.
43003007	As ye' kuxh sotz ak'u'l ti' u yole' uve' ni val see uva' techal chit la itz'eb' ex tika'pa,
43003008	tan eche' u kajiq'e' tan k'uxh naab'i ivulune', as ye' natx'ol eelata' kati'ch itzaae', as kati'ch ib'ene'. Echat kuxh b'anel ta'n unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni titz'eb' ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritu,— ti'k u Jesús.
43003009	As ech tal ve't u Nicodemo ile': —¿La kol chit ib'an q'a eche' uve' naale'?— ti'k naj.
43003010	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te naj: —Axh uma'l u chusul tetz viyol u Tiixhe' xo'l unq'a tename'. ¿As ma ye' napal b'a tu unq'a yole'?
43003011	Ile' jik chit tuk val see tan kam unq'a vee' ootzimal sqa'n as a'e' ni qale'. As kam uva' ni qile' as a'e' ni qal isuuchil. As k'uxh a' visuuchil u yole' uve' ni val sete, as ye' nenima.
43003012	As k'uxh a' unq'a vatz tx'ava'illa yole' uve' ni val sete, as ye' kat enima. ¿As a' kol chit la enima unq'a yole' q'a uva' tetz u Tiixhe' uva' la val sete?
43003013	Tan ye'xheb'il kat je' tu almika', pet ta'n kuxh ine' uva' in uva' kat ku' ch'u'l tu almika'.
43003014	As echat chit la unb'ane' eche' uva' kat ib'an u Moisés, tul kat taq' je' uma'l u vatzib'al tx'i'latxoo vatz uma'l u tze' tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e' ti' tel unq'a tename' vatz u kamchile'. As techal la aq'pik je' in vatz uma'l u tze' uva' in,
43003015	aq'al uva' at itiichajil u taanxelal unq'a uxhchile' k'atz u Tiixhe', jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' la ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l svi'. As ye' la itz'ej vitiichajile' uve' ye'l iya'teb'al,— ti'k u Jesús.
43003016	Tan kat itxum u Tiixhe' ivatz unq'a tename' skajayil vatz u tx'ava'e'. Esti'e' kat taq' tzan Aak unch'i'til viK'aole' ti' ikame', aq'al uva' jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uva' la ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' viK'aol Aake' as ye' la tz'ejxi. Pet at itiichajil uva' ye'l iya'teb'al.
43003017	As ye' kat ichaj tzan u Tiixhe' viK'aole' vatz u tx'ava'e' ti' uva' la taq' b'en Aak unq'a tename' tu u k'axk'oe'. Pet kat ichaj tzan Aak viK'aole' ti' iq'alpul unq'a tename' vatz vipaave'.
43003018	Esti'e' jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' la niman viK'aol u Tiixhe' as ye'l u k'axk'oe' at tzan sti'. Pet jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uva' ye' ni niman as a'e' at ve't tzan u k'axk'oe' sti', tan ti' uva' ye' kat ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' unch'i'til viK'aol u Tiixhe'.
43003019	As kat teesa ve't el tib' unq'a tename' k'atz u txijun tetz u taanxelale' tul uva' kat ul Aak vatz u tx'ava'e', tan ti' uva' nisa' unq'a tename' ib'anat u va'lexhe'. Pet ye' nisa' inimat u txijun tetz u taanxelale'. Esti'e' at ve't tzan u k'axk'oe' ti' unq'a tename'.
43003020	As jank'al unq'a tename' uve' a' kuxh u va'lexhe' nib'ane' as nichi'an taama ti' u txijun tetz u taanxelale'. As ni teesa ve't el tib' sk'atz, tan a' isa' uva' ye' la majax ivatz ti' ipaavine'.
43003021	Pet ech koj unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni b'anon u jike', tan nijetz'en ok k'atz u txijun tetz u taanxelale', aq'al uva' la tootzi unq'a tename' uva' a' u Tiixhe' aq'ol tetz vitxumb'ale' ti' ib'anat u b'a'ne'.
43003022	As xamtik ve't stuul, as el ve't u Jesús tu u Jerusalén tuk' unq'a ichusulib'e'. As oon ve't Aak tu u Judea uva' nik taq'axkat ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e' ta'n Aak.
43003023	As echat nik ib'an u Xhune' unpajte, tan nik taq' ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e' tu u tename' uva' Enón, najlich u Salim, tan ti' uva' nim u a'e' uva' atik tzitzi'. As ye' saach unq'a uxhchile' uli ti' iku' xe' u a'e',
43003024	tan ye'xnik oksal u Xhune' tu u kaarsa.
43003025	As nik iyaa tib' unq'a ichusulib' u Xhune' tuk' ka't vimoole' uva' tiaal Israel, ti' uva' kam la tulb'e unq'a uxhchile' teesat el u va'lexhe' tu u taanxelale' vatz u Tiixhe'.
43003026	As ech b'ex tal ve't unq'a ichusulib' u Xhun ile' ste: —Chusul, u naje' uva' atik sak'atz jalit u nimla a'e' uva' Jordán, uva' yolon axh sti', as ni taq' ku' naj unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e'. As ye' saach tok ve't unq'a tename' k'atz naj,— ti'k chajnaj.
43003027	Ech tal ve't u Xhun ile' te chajnaj ti' u Jesús: —A'e' nib'ane' uva' alel tzan ste ta'n u Tiixhe', tan ye'xhkam la uch ib'anat umaj uxhchil, asoj jit u Tiixhe' tu almika' kat aq'on ste.
43003028	As an chit exe' kat ab'in vunyole' uva' ech kat val ile': Jit ine' u Cristo, tan Tiixhe' kat chajon tzan in b'axa vatz u Cristo,— ch'in kat val sete,
43003029	tan ech vatine' vatz u Cristo eche' umaj tetz k'ultzi' u tzumelae' uva' at txala, tan a' kuxh u tzumelae' k'ujle'l ti' u ixqelae'. Pet ech koj u tetz k'ultzi' u tzumelae', tan nichiib'e' tul ni tab'i u tuul ivi'e'. As echat chit b'an va'n, tan va'l chit unchiib'e'.
43003030	As aal tuk oksaloj ve't iq'ii Aak. Pet ech koj in, tan ye'l unq'ii la oksal ve'te'.
43003031	Tan a' tzaanajkat Aak tu almika'. As Aak ve'te' nim talche' ti' unq'a tename' skajayil. Pet ech koj in, tan in kuxh vatz tx'ava'il aama, as a' kuxh u vatz tx'ava'il yole' ni vale', tan a' kuxh u vatz tx'ava'il txumb'ale' eq'omal sva'n. Pet ech koj u Jesús, tan a' tzaanajkat Aak tu almika'. As ta'n Aake' nim talche' ti' unq'a tename' skajayil.
43003032	As a'e' ni tal u Jesús kam uve' kat til Aak tuk' uve' kat tab'i Aak. As ka'l kuxh unq'a uxhchile' ni niman viyol Aake'.
43003033	Pet ab'il uva' ni niman u yole' uva' ni tal u Jesús, as nik'uche' uva' jik chit u yole' uve' ni tal u Tiixhe' ste,— ti'k u Xhune'.
43003034	Kat ichaj tzan u Tiixhe' u Jesúse'. As tul uva' niyolon u Jesús, as an chit u Tiixhe' niyolone'. Tan aya'l chit ik'u'l u Tiixhe' kat taq' Aak viTiixhla Espíritu te u Jesús.
43003035	As xo'n chit viK'aol u Kub'aale' ste. As kat toksa Aak viK'aole' B'ooq'olil ti' unq'a vee' skajayil.
43003036	Esti'e' uva' ab'il la ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' viK'aol u Tiixhe' as at ve't itiichajil uva' ye'l iya'teb'al. Pet ab'il uva' ye' la niman Aak as ye'l ve't itiichajil u taanxelale' k'atz u Tiixhe', pet a' ve't vitx'i'tzi'l u Tiixhe' at ve't tzan sti'.
43004001	As ootzimalik ta'n u Jesús uva' ma'tik tab'it unq'a fariseo itzib'lal Aak uva' nimal chit unq'a uxhchile' nikat iku' xe' u a'e' ta'n Aak ti' uve' nik ib'an u Xhune'.
43004002	As tul jit u Jesús nik aq'on ku' unq'a uxhchile' xe' u a'e'. Pet a' unq'a ichusulib' Aake' nik b'anon.
43004003	As tul tab'i u Jesús uva' ma'tik tab'it unq'a fariseo, as el ve't ch'u'l u Jesús tu u Judea. As tal ve't Aak ib'en tu u Galilea unpajte.
43004004	As echik ipal Aak tu u Samaria.
43004005	As oon ve't Aak tu uma'l u tenam uva' Sicar uva' echen tu u Samaria. As a' atikkat u tx'ava'e' uve' kat taq' kan u Jacob te vik'aol uva' Xhu'l najlich u Sicar.
43004006	As k'otik uma'l u jul tzitzi' uva' ni teq'olkat je' tzan a' uva' k'otik kan ta'n u Jacob. As tul chaq'aan ve't q'ii, as xoneb' ve't u Jesús tzi' u jule', tan koolinalik ve't Aak ta'n xao'm.
43004007	As ul uma'l u ixoj uva' aa Samaria tzi'a'voj tu uve' atikkat u a'e'. As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te ixoj: —Aq' unb'ooj vaa' uva' la vuk'a,— ti'k Aak,
43004008	tan ma'tik ib'en ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aake' tu u tename' ti' iloq'at echb'ub'al.
43004009	As ech tal ve't u ixoj ile': —¿Kam q'i uve' nu kuxh ajaj avaa' sve? As tul axh tiaal Israel. As in aa Samaria,— ti'k ixoj te u Jesús, tan ye' nik iq'iila tib' unq'a tiaal Israel tuk' unq'a aa Samaria.
43004010	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ootzimal koj vib'a'nil u Tiixhe' ta' a'n, as la pal axhe' ta' stuul uva' ab'iste in uve' ni jajon u a'e' see. As lajaj sve. As la vaq'e' u a'e' see uve' la aq'on atiichajil,— ti'k u Jesús.
43004011	As ech tal ve't u ixoj ile' te u Jesús: —Pap, mita'n chit umaj aatinb'al ati ti' eeq'ot je' tzan u a'e'. As tul nim chit tuul u jule'. ¿As kat la eeq'okat je' tzan u a'e' q'i uve' naale'?
43004012	¿As nim kol chit aalchu ve't q'a ti' u kub'aal Jacob? Tan aake' k'otol kan tetz u a'e'. As tzitza' nik tul teq'okat aak taa' tuk' unq'a me'al ik'aole'. As tzitza' nik tuk'a'kat unq'a tavan aake',— ti'k ixoj.
43004013	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' la uk'an u a'e' uva' at tzitza' as eche' la koj pal vitzajitzi'le'.
43004014	Pet jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' la uk'an u a'e' uve' la vaq'e' as eche' jatu koj la tzaj ve't itzi'. As eche' nib'an unq'a a'e' uve' ni tel ch'u'l tu u vitze' as ech la ib'ane' ti' taq'ax etiichajil uve' ye'l iya'teb'al,— ti'k u Jesús.
43004015	As ech tal u ixoj ile': —Pap, aq' u a'e' b'a sve uve' naale', aq'al uva' ye'xh jatu la tzaj ve't untzi'. As ye'l in la ul ve't in tzi'a'voj tzitza',— ti'k ixoj.
43004016	Ech tal u Jesús ile': —B'a'n kuxhe' b'a. Kuxh molo vatzumele'. As eela etule',— ti'k u Jesús.
43004017	As ech tal ve't ixoj ile': —Ye'l untzumel ati,— ti'k ixoj. Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te ixoj: —An chite' b'a naale' uva' ye'l atzumel ati,
43004018	tan o'va'x naj ajatx eeb' stuk'. As u naje' uve' eq'omal a'n cheel as jit atzumel naje'. An chite' b'a uve' naale',— ti'k Aak.
43004019	As ech tal ve't ixoj ile': —Pap, texh axh q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' ni vab'i. As la unch'oti see,
43004020	tan tzitza' vi' u vitze' nik inachkat unq'a q'esla kub'aale' u Tiixhe'. Pet ech koj ex, tan a' netale' uva' tu kuxh u Jerusalén la nachpukat Tiixh,— ti'k ixoj.
43004021	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Nima uve' tuk val see, tan la ul uma'l u q'ii uva' jit kuxh tz'ajinal vi' u vitze' as jit tz'ajinal tu u Jerusalén la nachpukat u Tiixhe'. Pet katil kuxh la uch inachpukat ve't Tiixh.
43004022	Tan nu kuxh enach uma'l u tiixh uva' ye' ootzimal seta'n. Pet ech koj o', tan ootzimal u Tiixhe' sqa'n uve' nu kunache', tan a' xe'tikkat tzan u sotzb'al paave' sukuxo'l, o' unq'a tiaal Israel.
43004023	As u q'iie' uva' ni val see as ile' najli ve't cheel ti' uva' la inach unq'a tename' u Tiixhe' tuk' chit taanxelal, tan a' isa' Aak uva' jik chit itxumb'al unq'a uxhchile' la ib'ane' tul la inach Tiixh.
43004024	As jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uva' la nachon Tiixh, as techal chit la inach Tiixh tuk' chit taanxelal as tuk' tijikil, tan ech u Tiixhe' eche' u kajiq'e', tan ye' na'l,— ti'k u Jesús.
43004025	As ech tal ve't u ixoj ile': —Ootzimale' sva'n uva' la ul uma'l u uxhchil uva' alel kan u tuleb'ale' ta'n u Tiixhe' uva' Cristo ch'elel. As a'e' la alon ve't isuuchil sqe skajayil tul uva' la uli,— ti'k ixoj.
43004026	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ine' ta' uve' nunyolon see,— ti'k Aak.
43004027	As tul tzojpu iyolon Aak tuk' u ixoje', as b'ex uloj ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aake'. As sotz ve't ik'u'l chajnaj ti' uve' til chajnaj uva' nik iyolon Aak tuk' u ixoje', tan ti' uva' ye'l umaj chusul la uch iyolon tuk' umaj ixoj xo'l tenam. As jit ich'oti umaj naj te Aak uva': —¿Kam nayol tuk' u ixoje'?— ti'k koj umaj chajnaj tal te Aak.
43004028	As taq' ve't kan u ixoje' vitxe'ne'. As b'ex tal ve't ixoj tu vitename'. As ech tal ve't ixoj ile' te unq'a uxhchile':
43004029	—¡Si'unaj! ¡Ul etiltaj uma'l u naj uve' kat alonyu sve ti' unq'a vee' b'anel sva'n skajayil! ¿As ma jit u naje' u Cristo?— ti'k ixoj.
43004030	As el ve't ch'u'l unq'a uxhchile' tu vitename' ti' tul ve't k'atz Aak.
43004031	As tul ma'tik ib'en ve't ixoj, as jetz'en ve't ok unq'a ichusulib' Aake' sk'atz. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te Aak: —Chusul, tx'a'on,— ti'k chajnaj.
43004032	Ech tal ve't Aak ile': —At uma'l u vechb'ub'al uve' ye' ootzimal seta'n,— ti'k Aak.
43004033	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' svatzaj: —¿Kam q'i esta'n? ¿Pet moj ab'il kat eq'on tzan unb'ooj techb'ub'al Aak?— ti'k chajnaj.
43004034	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —As a' ve't vechb'ub'ale' uva' la unb'ane' kam uve' ni tal taama u chajol vetze'. As la untzojpisa uva' kat tal Aak sve.
43004035	As netale' uva': «Kajva'ten ich' imakax ivatz u chikoe',» ch'ex netale'. As ile' ni val sete, esajitaj b'en unq'a tename', tan ech unq'a tename' eche' unq'a chikoe' uve' q'antu ve'te' ti' imakle'.
43004036	As ab'il uve' la molon tzan unq'a tename' ti' tok itiichajil uve' ye'l iya'teb'al as eche' uma'l u uxhchil uva' ni makon ivatz unq'a chikoe', tan la til ivatz u taq'one'. As esti'e' uva' eela ichiib' unq'a uxhchile' uva' ni makone' tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uve' kat avan.
43004037	As an chite' ta' u yole' uva': «Uma'l uxhchil ni avan. As uma't uxhchil ni makon,» ti'k u yole'.
43004038	As cheel nunchaj b'en ex ti' b'en emakat uve' jit ex kat avan, tan va'len kat aq'onvan sevatz. As cheel antu ve't ex tuk ilon ve't ivatz unq'a taq'on unq'a uxhchile',— ti'k u Jesús.
43004039	As ye' saach unq'a aa Samaria uva' atik tu u tenam uva' Sicar, as kat ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' u Jesús ta'n u yole' uve' tal u ixoje', tan ech ma'tik talat ixoj ile': —¡Tan nimal unq'a va'lexhe' uva' b'anel sva'n, as kat tal Aak sve!— ti'k ixoj.
43004040	As ul ijaj unq'a aa Samaria b'a'nil te u Jesús ti' uva' la kaa Aak tu u tename'. As ka'va'l q'ii atin ve't Aak xo'l unq'a aa Samaria.
43004041	As aal chit kat ik'ujb'a' ve't unq'a uxhchile' ik'u'l ti' u Jesús ti' unq'a yole' uve' nik tal Aak.
43004042	As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile' te u ixoj: —Jit kuxh ti' u yole' uve' kat aal sqe nu kuk'ujb'a'kat kuk'u'l. Pet kat qab'il ve'te', as kat qootzil ve'te' uva' an chite' vil uva' Aak u sotzsan tetz ipaav unq'a tename' skajayil,— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
43004043	Tu ve't ika'v u q'iie', as el ve't ch'u'l u Jesús tu u Samaria. As b'en ve't Aak tu u Galilea.
43004044	As atik sk'u'l Aak uva' ye' la oksal iq'ii Aak ta'n unq'a uxhchile' tu vitename', tan ma'tik talat Aak uva' ye'l umaj q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' la oksal iq'ii tu vitename'.
43004045	As oon ve't Aak tu u Galilea. As jank'al unq'a aa Galilea uve' ma'tik tex tu u Jerusalén ti' u nimla q'iie', as oora chit ik'ul ve't ok chajnaj Aak, tan ma'tik tilat chajnaj kam uve' kat ib'an Aak tu u Jerusalén.
43004046	As oon ve't u Jesús unpajte tu u tename' uva' Caná uva' echen tu u Galilea, uva' ib'ensakat Aak u a'e' vinoil. As atik uma'l u naj tzitzi' uva' lochol tetz u ijlenaale', uva' nikat ich'o'n uma'l vik'aol tu u Capernaúm.
43004047	As tul tab'i ve't naj itzib'lal uva' ma'tik itzaa u Jesús tu u Judea as ma'tik toon ve't Aak tu u Galilea, as oon ve't naj ti' ijajat kuyb'al te Aak uva' la b'en Aak ti' ib'a'nxisal vik'aol naje', tan b'iitik kuxh ikam vik'aol naje'.
43004048	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te naj: —Ye' koj kat unk'uch unq'a texhlal u tijle'm u Tiixhe' sete, as kamal ye'l ex ta' la ek'ujb'a' ek'u'l svi',— ti'k u Jesús.
43004049	As ech tal ve't u lochol tetz u ijlenaal ile': —Pap, b'an b'a'nil. Kuxh il vas unk'aole' cheel tan tuk kamoj ve'te',— ti'k naj.
43004050	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te naj: —Kuxh ve'te'. Il vak'aol ile' isle'le,— ti'k Aak. As tul tab'i ve't u naje' viyol Aake', as inima ve't naj. As b'en ve't naj tu vitename'.
43004051	As tul b'iitik kuxh toon naj tu vitename', as ul k'ulpoj ve't naj tu b'ey ta'n ka'l unq'a ik'am. As ech tal chajnaj ile': —Pap, ¡isle'l ve't vak'aole' cheel!— ti'k chajnaj.
43004052	As ech tal ve't u lochol tetz u ijlenaal ile': —¿Kam oora q'i kat b'a'nxi?— ti'k naj. As ech tal ve't unq'a k'am ile' te naj: —E'ttzane' txalq'u q'ii ya' ve't u xamale' ti' naj,— ti'k chajnaj.
43004053	As tul tab'i ve't u lochol tetz u ijlenaale' u yole' uva' tal unq'a k'ame', as ul ve't sk'u'l naj uva' ech oorae' uva' tal u Jesús te naj uva': «Il vak'aol ile' isle'le,» ti'k Aak. As kat ik'ujb'a' ve't naj ik'u'l ti' Aak tuk' unq'a tatine' tikab'al.
43004054	As tu u Galilea ik'uchkat u Jesús vika'v u k'uchb'al tetz u tijle'me' vatz unq'a tename' tul ma'tik itzaa Aak tu u Judea.
43005001	As xamtik ve't stuul tul uva' ilej uma't u nimla q'iie' uve' nikat inima unq'a tiaal Israel tu jun yaab', as b'ex ve't u Jesús tu u Jerusalén unpajte.
43005002	As b'anik uma'l u nimla tz'aj tetz molb'al a' uva' Betesda ib'ii tu yolb'al hebreo. As a' echenkat najlich itzi' u tapiaale' uva' tokeb'al kaneero' ib'ii. As u nimla molb'al a'e' uve' atik je' ivi' as o'va'l toj uva' tz'aj tx'apike.
43005003	As ye' saach unq'a aach'o'me' koxhlik tzi' u molb'al a'e'. At ko'x, at tzot, ati uva' k'oro'xhin tib' ta'n ch'o'm. As nikat itx'eb' unq'a aach'o'me' uva' la tiin ve't u a'e',
43005004	tan jit kuxh nim la ul itiinsa umaj ángel u a'e'. As ab'iste kuxh u aach'o'me' uva' b'axel la ok xe' u a'e' tul la itiinsa tib' u a'e', as la b'a'nxi, k'uxh kam kuxh ch'o'mil uva' nik b'anon.
43005005	As atik uma'l u aach'o'm tzi' u nimla molb'al a'e' uva' ma'tik ib'anat ve't vinaj vaaxajlaval (38) yaab' ixe't ch'o'noj.
43005006	As til ve't u Jesús u aach'o'me' uva' koxhlik tzi' u a'e'. As atik ve't sk'u'l Aak uva' na'xnik ixe't naj ch'o'noj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —¿Ma nasa' uva' la b'a'nx ve't axh?— ti'k Aak.
43005007	Ech tal ve't naj ile': —¡Kano, Pap! As ye'xheb'il ni b'anon b'a'nil sve ti' vaq'ax b'en xe' u a'e'. As k'uxh nunya'lu vib' ti' unku'e' tul ni tiinsa tib' u a'e', as b'axel nib'axsa tib' uma't uxhchil sunvatz,— ti'k u aach'o'me'.
43005008	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Txakpen. Eq'o vach'achi'm tze'e'. As kuxh ve't takab'al,— ti'k Aak tal te naj.
43005009	As yak chit b'a'nx ve't u aach'o'me'. As teq'o ve't naj u ch'achi'm tze'e'. As xaan ve'te'. As tu u xeem q'iie' ib'a'nxisa u Jesús u aach'o'me'.
43005010	As ech tal ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tenam ile' te u naje' uva' ma'tik tel u ch'o'me' sti': —Xeem q'ii ta' cheel. As txaae' uva' ijamal kuxh vach'achi'm tze'e',— ti'k chajnaj te naj.
43005011	As ech tal ve't naj ile': —U uxhchile' uve' kat b'a'nxisan in as a'e' kat alon sve: «Sik' vach'achi'm tze'e'. As kuxh ve'te',» ti'k sve,— ti'k naj.
43005012	As ich'oti ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' itzi' naj. As ech tal chajnaj ile': —¿Ab'il u naje' q'i uve' kat alon see uva': «Sik' vach'achi'm tze'e'. As kuxh ve'te',» taq' kat tal see?— ti'k chajnaj.
43005013	As ye' tootzaj naj uva' ab'il b'a'nxisan naj, tan ma'tik tel ch'u'l u Jesús xo'l unq'a tename' uve' atik tzitzi'.
43005014	As xamtik ve't stuul, ik'ul tib' u Jesús tuk' u naje' vatz viq'anal u tostiixhe'. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te naj: —Ile' tuk val see, tan il axh b'a'n ve't axh cheel. As ye' paavin ve't axh, aq'al uva' ye' la ul uma'toj k'axk'o see' uva' nim ti' unq'a vee' kat apaleb'e,— ti'k Aak.
43005015	As b'ex tal ve't naj te unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' uve' a' u Jesús kat b'a'nxisan naj.
43005016	Esti'e' uve' ib'an ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' ik'u'l ti' ichukat txumb'al ti' u Jesús, tan ti' uva' ib'a'nxisa Aak u aach'o'me' tu u xeem q'iie'.
43005017	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te chajnaj: —As k'uxh tu u xeem q'iie', ye' niya' vunB'aale' ti' ib'anat u b'a'nile'. Esti'e' nunb'an u b'a'ne' tu u xeem q'iie' unpajte,— ti'k Aak.
43005018	As tab'i ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' u yole' uva' tal u Jesús. As aal chit ichuk ve't chajnaj txumb'al ti' iyatz'ax Aak. As jit kuxh ti' uva' ma'tik ib'a'nxisat Aak u aach'o'me' tu u xeem q'iie'. Pet ti' uva' «VunB'aale',» ti'k Aak ti' u Tiixhe'. As nik tal tib' Aak uva' eela Aak tuk' u Tiixhe'.
43005019	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te chajnaj: —Ile' jik chit tuk val sete tan ye'xhkam la uch unb'anata' sunjunal. Pet a' nunb'ane' uve' ni vile' uva' nib'an vunB'aale'. As jank'al uve' nib'an vunB'aale' as echat nunb'ane' unpajte,
43005020	tan xo'n chit in te vunB'aale'. As nik'uch Aak sve jank'al uve' nib'an Aak, tan nim chite' u b'a'nile' uve' la ik'uch Aak sve ti' unq'a vi'la'. Esti'e' la chit teq'o etaama ti' uve' la etile',
43005021	tan echat la unb'ane' eche' uva' nib'an vunB'aale'. As ni tulsa Aak taama unq'a kamnaje'. As ni taq' Aak itiichajil u taanxelal unq'a uxhchile'. As echat in unpajte, tan la vaq' itiichajil u taanxelal unq'a uxhchile' k'atz Aak, as jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uva' la unsa' la vaq' itiichajil.
43005022	As ye'xheb'il nib'an vunB'aale' isuuchil. Pet kat ik'ujb'a' ve't in Aak ti' uva' in la b'anon ve't isuuchil unq'a tename' skajayil,
43005023	aq'al uva' la toksa unq'a tename' unq'ii eche' toksat iq'ii vunB'aale'. Tan ab'il uva' ye' ni oksan unq'ii as ye'l iq'ii vunB'aale' ni toksa unpajte, as tul Aake' chajol tzan vetz.
43005024	As ile' jik chit tuk val sete, u uxhchile' uve' la niman unq'a yole' uva' ni vale' as la ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' u Tiixhe' uva' chajol tzan vetz, tan at chit itiichajil u taanxelale' uve' ye'l iya'teb'al. As ye'l u k'axk'o at ve't tzan ti' unq'a uxhchile', tan elnallu ve't vatz u kamchile'. As at ve't itiichajil uva' ye'l iya'teb'al.
43005025	Tan tuk chit val sete tan tuk ilej u q'iie' uva' k'ujle'l ve't ta'n u Tiixhe', as ile' at ve't scheel. As unq'a uxhchile' uve' kamnajlu ve't u taanxelale' vatz u Tiixhe' as tuk chit tab'i u tuul unvi'e', tan ine' viK'aol u Tiixhe'. As ab'il uva' la niman unq'a yole' uva' ni vale' as a'e' la iseb' u taanxelale' k'atz u Tiixhe',
43005026	tan eche' ta' vunB'aale' tan at itiichajil Aak sijunal. As echat chit in, tan kat taq' Aak sve uva' at untiichajil sunjunal, tan in viK'aol Aake'.
43005027	As kat taq' ve't Aak u vijle'me' ti' unb'anat isuuchil unq'a tename' skajayil, tan ine' .
43005028	As ye' la sotz ek'u'l ti' uva' ni val sete, tan tuk ilej uma'l u q'ii uva' jank'al chit unq'a kamnaje' uva' mujel tu u jule' as la tab'i u tuul unvi'e' tul la unmolo.
43005029	As jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uva' b'a'n kat ib'ana vatz u tx'ava'e' as la je' ve't ch'u'l tu unq'a ijule' ti' tul taama unpajte. As ech ib'en k'atz u Tiixhe', tan at itiichajil u taanxelale' k'atz Aak. Pet ech koj unq'a uxhchile' uve' kat b'anon u va'lexhe' vatz u tx'ava'e', tan tul la ul taama, as a' la b'enkat tu u choob'al paave'.
43005030	As ye'xhkam la uch unb'anat isuuchil sunjunal. Pet kam uve' ni tal vunB'aale' sve ti' unb'anat isuuchil unq'a tename' skajayil as a'e' nunb'ane'. As jik chite' ni val isuuchil, tan jit vuntxumb'ale' ni voksa. Pet a' vitxumb'al vunB'aale' eq'omal sva'n uva' chajol tzan vetz,
43005031	tan asoj an kuxh in la alon u vijle'me', as eche' la koj nimal in. As la koj alaxi uva' jik chit vunyole',
43005032	pet Aake' ni alon u vijle'me'. As ootzimal sva'n uva' kam chit uve' ni tal Aak svi' as an chite' viyol Aake' uve' ni tale'.
43005033	As exe' kat chajon b'en ka'l unq'a uxhchil ti' ich'otil itzi' u Xhune'. As kam chit uve' kat tal tzan u Xhune' sete as jik chite' uve' kat tal tzan svi'.
43005034	As jit iyol umaj uxhchil k'ujb'a'n tetz u vijle'me'. Pet ni val isuuchil u yole' sexo'l, aq'al uva' at ve't sotzb'al epaav.
43005035	Tan ech u Xhune' eche' uma'l u xamal uva' kat txijun ex. As kat chiib' ex ti' viyol u Xhune'. As ye'xh jank'al q'ii kat chiib' ve't ex sti'.
43005036	Pet an chit unq'a b'a'nile' uva' nunb'ane' as a'e' ni k'uchun u vijle'me', tan nim chit talche' unq'a b'a'nile' uva' nunb'ane' ti' unq'a yole' uva' kat tal u Xhune' svi', tan a' u b'a'nile' uve' kat taq' vunB'aale' sve ti' uva' techal la unb'ane', as a'e' la k'uchun u vijle'me' uva' a' vunB'aale' kat chajon tzan in.
43005037	As vunB'aale' uve' chajol tzan vetz as Aake' ni alon isuuchil u vijle'me' unpajte. Ye' atixoj etab'i tuul ivi' Aak. As mita'n ika'y Aak kat etila.
43005038	Pet ye'l viyol Aake' at koj tu vetaanxelale', as ye' nek'ujb'a' ek'u'l svi' uva' kat ichaj tzan in Aak.
43005039	As tul b'enameen chit nechus etib' ti' viyol Aake' uva' tz'ib'amal kan, tan a' netale' uva' at itiichajil uva' ye'l iya'teb'al, tan ti' uva' chusel etib'. As tul a'e' ni alon isuuchil u vijle'me'.
43005040	As ye' nesa' etoksat etib' sunk'atz. As tul ine' la aq'on itiichajil uva' ye'l iya'teb'al.
43005041	As ye' la voksa stuul k'uxh la etoksa unq'ii,
43005042	tan ootzimal ex sva'n uva' ye'l u Tiixhe' xo'n koj sete tuk' etaanxelal.
43005043	As k'uxh tuk' vib'ii vunB'aale' kat ulkat in, as ye' kat ek'ul in. Pet asoj la ul uma'toj naj tuk' kuxh itxumb'al, as oora chit la txuq'txun ex ti' ek'ulat naj.
43005044	As nu kuxh etoksa je' eq'ii sevatzaj. Pet ye' neb'ane' kam uva' nisa' u Tiixhe' seti' ti' uva' la toksa Aak eq'ii. As tul ta'n Aake' Tiixh. As mita'n in nek'ujb'a' ek'u'l svi'.
43005045	Pet etalaki uva' in la alon ok vepaave' te vunB'aale', tan a' unq'a yole' uve' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Moisés tuk alon ok vepaave', k'uxh netal je' sete uva' at k'ujleb'al ek'u'l ti' uva' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Moisés.
43005046	As kat koj enima unq'a yole' uve' kat tal u Moisés, as ine' ta' kat enima in, tan ine' uva' ni tal u yole' uve' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Moisés.
43005047	Tan asoj ye' nenima unq'a yole' uve' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Moisés, ¿as a' kol chit ve't unq'a vee' q'a la enima uve' ni val sete cheel?— ti'k u Jesús.
43006001	As xamtik ve't stuul, as el ve't ch'u'l Aak tu u Jerusalén. As b'en ve't Aak tu u Galilea, ok ve't Aak tu uma'l u barco. As q'ax ve't Aak jalit u mar uve' echen tu u Galilea uva' Tiberias ib'ii.
43006002	As a' chit mama'la tename' xekik ti' Aak, tan ti' uva' ma'tik tilat unq'a tename' u k'uchb'al tetz vib'a'nil Aake' uve' ib'an ti' unq'a aach'o'me'.
43006003	As je' ve't Aak vi' uma'l u tal vitz. As xoneb' ve't Aak tuk' unq'a ichusulib'e'.
43006004	As txantik kuxh tul ve't u nimla q'iie' uva' pascua uva' nik inima unq'a tiaal Israel jun yaab'.
43006005	Tul til ve't Aak uva' mama'la tenam xekelik ti' Aak, as ech tal ve't Aak ile': —¿Tikat la b'en kuloq'kat paan ti' kutx'a'nsat unq'a tename'?— ti'k Aak tal te u Pi'le'.
43006006	As tal kuxh Aak te u Pi'le', tan ootzimalik ta'n Aak uva' kam la ib'an Aak. Pet a' isa' Aak uva' kam la tal u Pi'le'.
43006007	As ech tal ve't u Pi'l ile' te u Jesús: —Ye' la tz'aj ija'mil laval k'alal (200) q'ii aq'on ti' qaq'at unb'ooj techb'ub'al unq'a tename',— ti'k u Pi'le'.
43006008	Pet uma't u chusulib' uva' Lixh, titz'in u Simón uve' Lu', as ech tal naj ile' te Aak:
43006009	—Il uma'l u xaak ila' uva' eq'omal o'va'l paan sta'n uva' cebada tuk' ka'va't tal txay. As eche' la koj tz'aj xo'l unq'a tename',— ti'k u Lixhe'.
43006010	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te unq'a ichusulib'e': —Etaltaj te unq'a tename' uva' la xoneb' skajayil,— ti'k Aak, tan echenik unq'a tename' vatz uma'l u nimla chaq'aala. As xoneb' ve't unq'a tename' skajayil. As kamal o'va'l mil unq'a naje' atike.
43006011	As itxey ve't u Jesús o'va'l u paane' uva' atik xe' u xaake'. As tul ma'tik taq'at ve't Aak ta'ntiixh te u Tiixhe' sti', as ijatx ve't Aak, as taq' ve't Aak te unq'a ichusulib'e'. As echat chit ib'an Aak tuk' unq'a txaye'. As aq'ax ve't te unq'a tename' uva' xonlik vatz u chaq'aalae', jank'al uva' nik isa' unq'a tename'.
43006012	As tul ma'tik itx'a'n unq'a tename' sb'a'n, as ech tal ve't Aak ile' te unq'a ichusulib'e': —Emoltaj unq'a ya'l paane'. As ye'xhkam la etxaq'u kan,— ti'k u Jesús.
43006013	As imol ve't chajnaj unq'a ya'l paane'. As inoosa ve't chajnaj kab'lavat xu'k u ya'l paane' ta'n o'va'l unq'a paane' uva' atik cebada xo'l uve' ijatx u Jesús.
43006014	As til unq'a tename' u k'uchb'al tetz vib'a'nil u Tiixhe' uve' ik'uch u Jesús. As ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile' svatzaj: —An chite' vil. Kat ulyu ve't u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' alel kan u tuleb'ale' ta'n u Moisés,— ti'k unq'a tename'.
43006015	As na'lik vatz u Jesús uva' nikat tal ve't unq'a tename' toksal Aak ijlenaalil. As b'en ve't Aak vi' u tal vitze' sijunal unpajte.
43006016	As tul tz'otin ve'te', as ku' ve't ch'u'l unq'a ichusulib' Aake' vi' u tal vitze' ti' toon tzi' u mar.
43006017	As k'uxh ma'tik itz'otin ve'te', as ye'xnik ul u Jesús k'atz chajnaj. As ok ve't chajnaj tu uma'l u barco. As b'en ve't chajnaj vi' u mar ti' ib'en tu u Capernaúm.
43006018	As xe't ve't uma'l u kajiq' vi' u mar uva' xo'veb'al chittu'. Va'lik chit ipilq'ut ve't tib' u a'e' ta'n u kajiq'e'.
43006019	Kamal pal ti' uma'l i'l ma'tik ixaat ok chajnaj vi' u a'e'. As aat kuxh til ve't chajnaj u Jesús uva' nikat ixaan ve't Aak vi' u mar. As b'iitik kuxh tul ve't Aak k'atz u barco. As xo'v ve't chajnaj ta'n Aak.
43006020	As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ye' kuxh xo'v ex, tan ine',— ti'k Aak.
43006021	As aya'l chit ik'u'l chajnaj ik'ul ve't je' chajnaj Aak tu u barco. As aat kuxh til ve't chajnaj toon tuk' u barco tzi' u tx'ava'e' tu uve' yakikkat chajnaj.
43006022	Ech ve't q'ejal stuul, as sotz ve't ik'u'l unq'a uxhchile' uve' kaaik kan jalit u mar ti' uva' kam kat ib'an u Jesús ti' toon jalit u mar, tan ootzimalik ta'n unq'a uxhchile' uva' uma'l kuxh u barco ma'tik ib'en vi' u a'e'. As jit b'en ve't u Jesús tu u barco. Pet a' kuxh unq'a ichusulib' Aake' b'eni.
43006023	As ma'tik tul ve't unjoltu unq'a uxhchil tuk' ka't unq'a barco uva' tzaa tu u Tiberias ti' ichukat u Jesús. As a' ulkat unq'a barco tzi' u a'e' najlich uve' ma'tik inachatkat u Jesús Tiixh ti' u paane', tul a's itzujb'et Aak o'va'l mil unq'a naje'.
43006024	As tul til ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' ye'lik u Jesús as mita'n unq'a ichusulib' Aake' atike, as ok ve't unq'a uxhchile' unpajte tu unq'a barco. As b'en ve't tu u Capernaúm ti' ichukat u Jesús.
43006025	As tul ilej ve't unq'a tename' u Jesús jalit u mar, as ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile': —¿Chusul, jatu tzan q'i ul axh tzitza'?— ti'k unq'a tename'.
43006026	Ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ile' jik chit tuk val sete, tan nechuk in. As jit ti' uva' kat etil unq'a k'uchb'al tetz vib'a'nil u Tiixhe' uve' kat unb'ana. Pet ti' kuxh uva' kat etx'a' u paane' as kat noo ve't ex sb'a'n.
43006027	As jit kuxh ti' u echb'ub'ale' la etoksakat etaama uve' nimotxe'. Pet a' la etoksakat etaama ti' u echb'ub'ale' uve' ye' la motxi uve' la aq'on etiichajil uve' ye'l iya'teb'al, tan ine' la aq'on sete, uva' in, tan nichiib' u Kub'aal Tiixhe' svi' ti' vaq'at sete,— ti'k u Jesús.
43006028	As ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile' te u Jesús: —¿Kam la kub'ane' q'i ti' kub'anat uve' nisa' u Tiixhe'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43006029	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —A' nisa' u Tiixhe' seti' uva' la enima in, tan ine' kat ichaj tzan in Aak sexo'l,— ti'k u Jesús.
43006030	As ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile': —¿Kam umaj k'uchb'al tetz u tijle'm u Tiixhe' la ak'uch sukuvatz ti' uva' la kunima ve't axh?
43006031	As eche' unq'a q'esla kub'aale' tan kat techb'u chajaak u maná tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e', eche' uva' ni tal uma'l u yol uva' tz'ib'amal kan, tan ech ni tal ile': As taq' ve't ku' tzan u Tiixhe' u echb'ub'ale' tu almika', aq'al uva' la techb'u unq'a tename', ti'k u yole',—  ti'k chajnaj tal te u Jesús.
43006032	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Jik chit tuk val sete, tan jit u Moisés kat aq'on u echb'ub'ale' uva' kat ku' ch'u'l tu almika' te unq'a tename'. Pet vunB'aale' uva' kat aq'on ku' tzan u echb'ub'ale' na'ytzan, as an chit Aake' ni aq'on ku' tzan u b'a'nla echb'ub'ale' cheel, uva' ye'xhkam uma'toj la lejon sti'.
43006033	As u echb'ub'ale' uve' ni taq' Aak cheel, as a'e' uva' ni val sete uva' kat ku' ch'u'l tu almika'. As ni taq' itiichajil unq'a tename' vatz u tx'ava'e',— ti'k u Jesús.
43006034	As ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile': —Pap, aq' u echb'ub'ale' sqe b'enameen, uve' naale',— ti'k chajnaj.
43006035	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ine' uva' ech vatine' eche' u echb'ub'ale' uve' ni aq'on itiichajil unq'a uxhchile' cheel. As ab'il uva' la toksa tib' sunk'atz, as ye'xh jatu la va'yi; as ab'il uva' la ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l svi', as ye'xh jatue' la tzaj ve't itzi'.
43006036	Pet kat vallu sete uva' k'uxh kat etil in, as ye' nek'ujb'a' ek'u'l svi'.
43006037	As jank'al chit unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni taq' vunB'aale' sve, as la toksa tib' sunk'atz. As ab'il uva' la toksa tib' sunk'atz, as ye' la uch vixvata'.
43006038	As la val sete, tan ye'l in kat koj ku' ch'u'l in tu almika' ti' unb'anata' kam uva' ni tal vaama. Pet a' tul unb'ane' kam uve' ni tal u chajol tzan vetze'.
43006039	As a' ni tal u chajol tzan vetze' uva' ye'xheb'il la untz'ej kan. Pet jank'al uve' kat taq' Aak sve, as la vulsa taama timoxtel q'ii.
43006040	As a' ni tal u chajol vetze' uva' at itiichajil unq'a uxhchile' uve' ye'l iya'teb'al, jank'al uva' ni ootzin u vijle'me' as nik'ujb'a' ik'u'l svi'. As la vulsa taama timoxtel q'ii, in uva' in viK'aol u Tiixhe',— ti'k u Jesús.
43006041	As yan ve't viyol u Jesús tivi' unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' ti' uva' tal Aak uva': —Ech vatine' eche' u echb'ub'ale' uve' kat ku' ch'u'l tu almika',— ti'k Aak.
43006042	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' svatzaj: —¿As jit kol ik'aol u Xhu'le' q'a u Jesús? Tan ootzimale' vib'aal naje' tuk' vitxutx naje' sqa'n. ¿As kam q'i uve' ni tal naj uva', «Ine' kat ku' ch'u'l in tu almika',» taq' naj ni tale'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43006043	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te chajnaj: —Ye' kuxh eyol in sevatzaj,
43006044	tan ye'xheb'il la toksa tib' sunk'atz, asoj jit vunB'aale' la alon, uva' kat chajon tzan in. Pet jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uva' la toksa tib' sunk'atz, as ine' la ulsan taama timoxtel q'ii,
43006045	tan ech la ib'ane' uva' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' ech ni tal ile': La chee itxumb'al unq'a tename' ta'n u Tiixhe', ti'k u yole'.  Esti'e' ni val sete uva' jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni ab'in viyol vunB'aale' as nichee itxumb'al sta'n, as a'e' uva' ni toksa tib' sunk'atz.
43006046	As ye'xheb'il kat ilon vunB'aale'. Pet ine' kat ilon Aak, uva' k'atz Aak tzaanajkat in.
43006047	As jik chit tuk val sete, tan ab'il uve' nik'ujb'a' ik'u'l svi', as at itiichajil uve' ye'l iya'teb'al.
43006048	As ech vatine' eche' u echb'ub'ale' uva' ni aq'on itiichajil unq'a uxhchile'.
43006049	As kat techb'u unq'a q'esla kub'aale' u maná tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e'. As kat kami.
43006050	Pet il in at in cheel, uva' ech vatine' eche' u echb'ub'ale' uva' kat ku' ch'u'l tu almika', aq'al uva' ye'xh jatu la kam unq'a uxhchile' jank'al uva' la echb'un.
43006051	As in uva' kat ku' ch'u'l in tu almika', as ech ine' eche' u echb'ub'ale' uva' ni aq'on itiichajil unq'a uxhchile'. As ab'il uva' la echb'un u echb'ub'ale', as at itiichajil uve' ye'l iya'teb'al. As u echb'ub'ale' uve' la vaq'e', as a' vunchi'ole' uva' la vaq' kamoj ti' unq'a tename', aq'al uva' at itiichajil uve' ye'l iya'teb'al,— ti'k u Jesús.
43006052	As iyaa ve't tib' unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' svatzaj. Ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Kam la tulb'e u naje' q'i taq'at vichi'ole' sqe ti' qechb'uta'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43006053	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te chajnaj ti' talat Aak isuuchil vikameb'ale': —Jik chit tuk val sete, in uva' . Tan asoj ye' la etechb'u vunchi'ole', asoj ye' la etuk'a vunkajale', as ye'l etiichajil ati.
43006054	As ab'il uve' la echb'un vunchi'ole' as la tuk'a vunkajale', as at itiichajil uve' ye'l iya'teb'al. As la vulsa taama timoxtel q'ii.
43006055	As a' vunchi'ole' u echb'ub'ale' uva' ye'xhkam uma'toj la lejon sti'; as a' vunkajale' u uk'a'e' uva' ye'xhkam uma'toj la lejon sti'.
43006056	As ab'il uve' la echb'un vunchi'ole' as la tuk'a vunkajale', as la toksa taama svi'. As la voksa vaama sti' unpajte.
43006057	As a' vunB'aale', u aq'ol tetz tiichajil, as Aake' uva' kat chajon tzan in. As at itiichajil Aak, esti'e' at untiichajil. As echat chit la ib'an u uxhchile' uva' ech vatine' svatz eche' u techb'ub'ale', tan tuk' vuntiichajile' at ve't itiichajil sunk'atz.
43006058	As ech vatine' eche' u echb'ub'ale' uva' kat ku' ch'u'l tu almika'. As jit ech ine' u maná uve' kat techb'u unq'a q'esla kub'aale' tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e', tan k'uxh kat techb'u, as kat kami. Pet ab'il uve' la echb'un u echb'ub'ale' uve' ni vale', as at itiichajil sunk'atz uve' ye'l iya'teb'al,— ti'k u Jesús.
43006059	As a' unq'a yole' uva' kat ichus kan u Jesús te unq'a uxhchile' tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh tu u Capernaúm.
43006060	As tul tab'i ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aake' unq'a yole' uva' tal Aak, as nimal chajnaj alon ve't svatzaj: —¡Ti' tab'il u yole' uve' ni tal Aak! ¡Ab'il koj la niman!— ti'k chajnaj.
43006061	As ootzimal ta'n u Jesús uva' kat yan u yole' tivi' chajnaj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te chajnaj: —¿Ma kat iyansa ex u yole' uve' kat val sete?
43006062	Pet la pal ex stuul tul la etil ije' tu almika' uve' atikkat sb'axa.
43006063	As a' u Tiixhla Espíritu aq'ol tetz u tiichajile'. As ye'l umaj uxhchil la oleb' ti' taq'at etiichajil. Pet ech koj unq'a yole' uva' ni val sete, tan a'e' la aq'on etiichajil ta'n u Tiixhla Espíritu.
43006064	As at ka't ex uva' ye' ni niman unq'a yole' uva' ni val sete,— ti'k u Jesús, tan ootzimalik ta'n Aak tul simolot Aak unq'a ichusulib'e' sk'atz ab'il uve' ye' nik niman Aak. As atik sk'u'l Aak uva' ab'iste naj la k'ayin Aak.
43006065	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' xo'l unq'a uxhchile': —Esti'e' ni val sete uva' ye'xheb'il chite' ta' la toksa tib' sunk'atz, asoj jit vunB'aale' la alon,— ti'k u Jesús.
43006066	As tab'i ve't unq'a ichusulib' u Jesús u yole' uve' tal Aak. As nimal unq'a uxhchile' teesa ve't el tib' k'atz Aak. As jit xekeb' ve't unq'a uxhchile' ti' Aak.
43006067	As tul til ve't Aak uva' nik teesa ve't el tib' unq'a uxhchile' k'atz Aak, as ech tal ve't Aak ile' te kab'laval unq'a ichusulib'e': —¿Kano ex q'i? ¿Ma antu ex la eteesa ve't el etib' sunk'atz?— ti'k u Jesús.
43006068	Ech tal ve't u Simón ile' uva' Lu' te u Jesús: —¿Pap, ab'il uma'toj q'i uva' la qoksa qib' sk'atz? Tan ta'n axhe' uve' ni alon u yole' sqe uve' tetz kutiichajil uve' ye'l iya'teb'al.
43006069	As kat kunima axh, tan ootzimal sqa'n uva' axh u Cristo, viK'aol u islich Tiixhe',— ti'k u Lu'e'.
43006070	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ootzimale' seta'n uva' kab'laval ex kat untxaa ex. As at uma'l ex uva' ech vetxumb'ale' eche' u tx'i'lanaje',— ti'k Aak.
43006071	As a' u Judas uva' Iscariote, vik'aol u Simón, nikat tal Aak, tan atik sk'u'l Aak uva' naj tuk aq'on ok Aak tiq'ab' unq'a uxhchile' uva' nich'o'n taama ti' Aak.
43007001	As xamtik ve't stuul, as a' nikat ixaankat ve't u Jesús tulaj unq'a tename' tu u Galilea, tan jit isa' Aak tatin tu u Judea, tan nikat ichuk unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' txumb'al ti' iyatz'pu ve't Aak.
43007002	As txantik ilejat u nimla q'iie' uva' nik ilak unq'a tiaal Israel unq'a talaj ipache' ti' tulsat sk'u'l ti' uva' ka'viinqil yaab' kat atin unq'a q'esla ib'aale' tu u tzuukin tx'ava'e'.
43007003	As ech tal ve't unq'a titz'in u Jesús ile' ste: —Kuxh tu u Judea, aq'al uva' la til unq'a achusulib'e' unq'a k'uchb'al tetz vib'a'nil u Tiixhe' uve' nab'ane',
43007004	tan ab'il uva' nisa' uva' la ootzil ta'n unq'a tename' as ye' la uch imujat tib'. As kuxh k'uch eeb' vatz unq'a tename', asoj nim vab'a'nile' nab'ane',— ti'k chajnaj,
43007005	tan mita'n kuxh unq'a titz'in Aake' nikat niman Aak.
43007006	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ye' ileje't u q'iie' ti' unb'en tu u nimla q'iie'. Pet ech koj ex, tan kam kuxh q'iil la uch eb'ene'.
43007007	As eche' la koj tixva ex unq'a tename'. Pet ech koj in, tan ni tixva in unq'a tename', tan ti' uva' ni valo'k ste uva' va'lexh nib'ane'.
43007008	As b'enoj etiltaj u nimla q'iie'. Pet ech koj in, tan ye'l in la b'en in cheel, tan ye' ileje't u q'iie' ti' unk'uchat vib' vatz unq'a tename',— ti'k u Jesús.
43007009	As tul ya' Aak ti' talat unq'a yole', as kaa ve't Aak tu u Galilea.
43007010	As tul kuxh b'en unq'a titz'in u Jesús tu u nimla q'iie', as b'en ve't Aak unpajte. As ye' kat ik'uch Aak ib'ene'. As jit ik'uch tib' Aak vatz unq'a tename'.
43007011	As nik ichuk ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' Aak xo'l unq'a mama'la tename' tu u nimla q'iie'. As ech nikat tal chajnaj ile' svatzaj: —¿Katil atkat u naje'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43007012	As nik iyolb'e ve't unq'a tename' u Jesús. As at jolol uxhchil ech nik tal ile': —Ch'i'umal itxumb'al u naje',— ti'k chajnaj. Pet ech koj unjolte, tan ech nik tal ile': —Ye' b'a'n ve't nib'an u naje', tan nu kuxh iyansa naj itxumb'al unq'a kumoole',— ti'k chajnaj.
43007013	As nik kuxh ijutxi unq'a tename' iyolone' ti' u Jesús, tan ti' uva' nik ixo'v chajnaj vatz unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename'.
43007014	As tul ma'tik ipok'o'chin u nimla q'iie', as ok ve't u Jesús vatz iq'anal u tostiixhe'. As ichus ve't Aak unq'a tename'.
43007015	As sotz ve't ik'u'l unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename'. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Kam kat tulb'e u naje' tootzit viyol u Tiixhe'? As tul ye'l naj kat ichus tib',— ti'k chajnaj.
43007016	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Unq'a yole' uve' nunchus sexo'l as jit ine' ni alon. Pet a' u chajol vetze' ni alon.
43007017	As ab'il uva' la sa'on ib'anat uve' ni tal u Tiixhe' as la tootzi uva' ma xe' Aak tzaanajkat unq'a yole' uva' nunchuse', pet moj nu kuxh uncheesa tunvi'.
43007018	As ab'il uva' la kuxh icheesa umaj chusb'al tivi' as je'saib'e' nib'ane'. Pet ech koj in tan a' u chajol vetze' ni voksa iq'ii, as jik chit nunchusune'. As ye'l umaj va'lexh nunb'an sevatz.
43007019	¿As kam sti' q'i uve' netal unyatz'pe'? As tul at ve't u tzaq'ite' uva' tz'ib'amal kan sexo'l ta'n u Moisés. As ye'l umaj ex ni niman, tan netal unyatz'pe',— ti'k Aak.
43007020	As ech tal ve't unq'a tenam ile': —¡Sub'ule' ato'k sak'atz! ¿Ab'il ni alon ayatz'pe'?— ti'k unq'a tename'.
43007021	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ti' kuxh uma'l u b'a'nil uve' kat unb'an tu u xeem q'iie' as kat teq'o etaama sti'.
43007022	As la val sete, tul uva' nilej vaaxil q'ii titz'eb' umaj ne' uva' xaak, as netzok'e'l unb'iil vichi'ole' eche' uva' tal kan u Moisés. As jit tetz u Moisés u yole', pet Tiixh kat alon te unq'a q'esla eb'aale'. As k'uxh tu u xeem q'ii ni chit eb'ane'.
43007023	Asoj ni tuch itzok'ax el unb'iil ichi'ol umaj ne' xaak tu u xeem q'iie' ti' uva' ye' la epaasa tzii ti' u tzaq'ite' uva' tal kan u Moisés, as ¿kam q'i uve' ni tul evi' svi' ti' uva' kat unb'a'nxisa uma'l u aach'o'm tu u xeem q'iie'?
43007024	As jikoj chit eb'an unsuuchil. As eb'antaj tevi' asoj b'a'n nunb'ane' moj ye'le,— ti'k u Jesús.
43007025	As ech tal ve't ka'l unq'a aa Jerusalén ile' svatzaj ti' u Jesús: —¿Ma jit u naje' nichukpe' uva' ni talax iyatz'pe'?
43007026	As il naj ile' niyolon xo'l unq'a tename'. As ye'xhkam kuxh ni talax ti' naj. Kamal na'l vatz unq'a kub'ooq'ole' uva' a' u Cristoe' u naje'.
43007027	Pet ootzimal sqa'n uva' katil tzaakat naj. Pet ech koj u Cristo, tan tul la ul Aak, as ye'xheb'il la ootzin katil la tzaakat Aak,— ti'k unq'a tename' svatzaj.
43007028	As tul nikat ichusun u Jesús vatz iq'anal u tostiixhe', as taq' ve't je' Aak tuul ivi' xo'l unq'a tename'. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ootzimal in seta'n. As ootzimal seta'n uva' katil tzaanajkat in. As ye'l uva' kat kuxh koj ul in tuk' untxumb'al. Pet a' u jikla Tiixhe' kat chajon tzan in uva' ye' ootzimal seta'n.
43007029	As ootzimal Aak sva'n, tan k'atz Aak tzaanajkat in. As Aake' chajon tzan in,— ti'k u Jesús.
43007030	As k'uxh nik tal ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename' itxeyat Aak, as ye'xheb'il kat txeyon Aak, tan ye'xnik ilejat u q'iie' uva' la txeypu ve't Aak.
43007031	As ye' saach unq'a tename' ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' Aak. Ech nik tal ve't ile' svatzaj: —Asoj jit u Cristo u Jesús, as tul la ul u Cristo, as ¿la kol pal ve't vib'a'nile' q'a ti' u mama'la k'uchb'al tetz u tijle'm u Jesús uve' kat ib'anlu ve'te'?— ti'k unq'a tename'.
43007032	As tab'i ve't unq'a fariseo unq'a yole' uva' nik tal unq'a uxhchile' ti' u Jesús. As imol ve't tib' chajnaj tuk' unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh. As ichaj ve't b'en chajnaj ka'l unq'a xeen tetz u tostiixhe' ti' itxeypu u Jesús.
43007033	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' xo'l unq'a tename': —Unb'iitoj kuxhe' tuk unb'an sexo'l. As tuk q'aavoj ve't in k'atz u chajol vetze'.
43007034	As k'uxh la echuk ve't in, as eche' la koj elej ve't in, tan la koj uch etoone' tu u atinb'ale' uve' la atinkat in,— ti'k u Jesús.
43007035	As ech tal ve't unq'a fariseo ile' svatzaj tuk' unq'a iq'esal unq'a nachol Tiixhe': —¿Katile' q'i la b'enkat u naje' uve' ni tale', uva' ye' la kulej ve't naj? ¿Ma a' la b'enkat naj b'a xo'l unq'a kumoole' uva' jejle'l xo'l unq'a tename' uva' jit tiaal Israel? ¿Pet moj la b'en ichus ve't naj unq'a tename' uva' jit tiaal Israel?
43007036	¿As kam ni tokkat viyol naje' uve' ni tale': «K'uxh la echuk in, as ye'l in la elej ve't in. As la koj etx'ol etoone' tu u atinb'ale' uve' la atinkat in,» taq' kuxh naj ni tale',— ti'k chajnaj?
43007037	As timoxteb'al u nimla q'iie' as a' u q'iie' uve' nim talche' tu u nimla q'iie'. As txakpu ve't u Jesús vatz unq'a tename'. As taq' ve't je' Aak tuul ivi'. Ech tal Aak ile': —Ab'iste ex nitzaj etzi' as etoksataj etib' sunk'atz. As uk'a'oj ex sunk'atz,
43007038	tan ab'il uva' la ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l svi' as ech la ib'ane' eche' uva' tz'ib'amal kan tu viyol u Tiixhe'. Tan ech tel ch'u'l vunb'a'nile' tu u taanxelale' eche' nib'an u a'e' tul ni tel ch'u'l tu u vitze' uva' ni aq'on tiichajil,— ti'k u Jesús.
43007039	As a' u Tiixhla Espíritu nikat tal Aak, uva' la ok ve't tu u taanxelal unq'a uxhchile' uva' la ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' Aak, tan ye'xnik ul u Tiixhla Espíritu ti' tok tu u taanxelal unq'a niman tetz Aake'. As ye'xnik oon Aak tu u atinb'ale' uve' la oksalkat iq'iia Aak k'atz viB'aale'.
43007040	As tul tab'i ve't unq'a tename' unq'a yole' uve' tal u Jesús, as ech tal ve't unjolol unq'a naj ile': —An chite' vil. A' u q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' kat ulyu ve'te' uva' alel kan u tuleb'ale',— ti'k chajnaj.
43007041	As ech tal unjoltu unq'a naj ile': —An chite'. A' u Cristo kat ulyu ve'te',— ti'k chajnaj. As atik ka't uxhchil uva' ech tal ile': —¿As tu kol u Galilea q'a la tzaakat u Cristo?
43007042	¿As ye' kol q'a sek'u'l uva' alel kan tu viyol u Tiixhe' uva' tiaal David u Cristo la ib'ane'? Tan a' la tzaakat tu u Belén, uva' atikkat u David,— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
43007043	As ye' nik ik'ul tib' iyol unq'a tename' svatzaj ti' u Jesús.
43007044	As atik unjolol unq'a uxhchile' nik alon uva' la txeyax Aak. As ye'xheb'il kat txeyon Aak.
43007045	As tul q'aav ve't unq'a xeen tetz u tostiixhe' uva' ma'tik ichajax b'en ta'n unq'a iq'esal oksan iyol tenam vatz Tiixh tuk' unq'a fariseo ti' itxeypu ve't u Jesús, as ech alpu ve't ile' te chajnaj: —¿Kam tetze' uve' ye' kat eteq'o tzan u Jesús?— ti'k unq'a chajol tetz chajnaje'.
43007046	Ech tal ve't unq'a xeen tetz u tostiixh ile': —As ye' atixoj qab'i iyolon umaj uxhchil uva' acha'v iyolone' eche' iyolon u naje',— ti'k chajnaj.
43007047	As ech tal ve't unq'a fariseo ile' te chajnaj: —¿Ma antu ve't ex b'a kat yanyu ve't etxumb'al ta'n u naje'?
43007048	¿As ma ye' ootzimal seta'n uva' ye'l umaj unq'a kuq'esale' ni niman u naje'? As mita'n o' uva' o' fariseo ni niman naj.
43007049	As jank'al unq'a tename' uve' ni niman u naje', as niyansa ve't tib', tan eche' ootzimal koj u tzaq'ite' uva' tz'ib'amal kan ta'n naj,— ti'k unq'a fariseo.
43007050	As u Nicodemo uva' b'ex yolon xe' u Jesús aq'b'al, tan imool tib' naj tuk' unq'a fariseo. As ech tal ve't naj ile' te vimoole':
43007051	—Palojtaj o' stuul uva' a' ni tal u kuleye' uva' lanal qab'i isuuchil b'axa. As a'n la qal itxeypu umaj uxhchil tul uva' la qootzi vipaave',— ti'k naj.
43007052	As ech tal ve't unq'a imool naj ile': —¿As ma a' nooksakat eeb' k'atz unq'a aa Galilea? ¡Chus eeb' sb'a'n ti' viyol u Tiixhe', tan ye'l umaj q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' uva' aa Galilea!— ti'k chajnaj.
43007053	As ijatx ve't tib' chajnaj. As b'en ve't chajnaj tulaj ikab'al.
43008001	As b'en ve't u Jesús. As oon ve't Aak vi' u tal vitze' uva' Olivos ib'ii.
43008002	Ech q'ejal stuul, as q'aav ve't Aak tu u tostiixhe'. As mama'la tename' imol ve't tib' ti' Aak. As tul xoneb' ve't Aak xo'l unq'a tename', as xe't ve't Aak chusun.
43008003	As ka'l unq'a fariseo tuk' ka't unq'a uxhchil uva' chusel tib' ti' unq'a tzaq'ite', as teq'o ve't tzan chajnaj uma'l u ixoj uva' b'ex lejpoj tul nik ipaavine' tuk' uma't naj. As oksal ve't ok ixoj vatz u Jesús xo'l unq'a tename'.
43008004	As ech tal ve't ok chajnaj ile' te Aak: —Chusul, il uma'l u ixoj ila' kat kulejla' tul nipaavin ixoj tuk' uma't naj.
43008005	¿As kam tuk aal sti'? Tan tz'ib'amal kan ta'n u Moisés uva' asoj la kulej umaj ixoj uva' ech nib'ane', as la kusuti k'ub' ti' ixoj ti' iyatz'pe',— ti'k chajnaj,
43008006	tan a' nikat tal chajnaj uva' la chee ipaav Aak ti' uva' la b'en ixoch chajnaj Aak. As ixib'b'a' ku' tib' Aak. As xe't Aak tz'ib'oj vatz tx'ava' tuk' vi' iq'ab'.
43008007	As ya'ltik chit chajnaj ti' ich'otil ok te Aak ti' u ixoje'. Txakpu ve't Aak. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ab'iste umaj ex uva' ye'l epaav ati as ex la sutin u k'ub'e' b'axa ti' u ixoje',— ti'k Aak.
43008008	As ixib'b'a' ku' tib' u Jesús unpajte. As xe't ve't Aak tz'ib'oj vatz u tx'ava'e'.
43008009	As junun kuxh ib'en ve't unq'a xochol tetz u ixoje'. As b'axik chit b'en unq'a q'esla aamae'. As tul b'en chajnaj skajayil, as a' kuxh ve't u ixoje' kaaik kan k'atz u Jesús xo'l unq'a tename'.
43008010	As txakpu ve't Aak unpajte. As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te ixoj: —¿Kech unq'a naj uva' ni xochon axh? ¿Moj ye'xheb'il ni alon akame'?— ti'k Aak.
43008011	As ech tal u ixoj ile': —Ye'le, Pap. Ye'xheb'il ve'te',— ti'k ixoj. As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Mita'n in la alon akame'. Pet kuxh ve'te'. As ye' paavin ve't axh,— ti'k u Jesús.
43008012	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' xo'l unq'a tename': —Ine' txijun tetz u taanxelal unq'a uxhchile' skajayil. Ab'il uve' la xekeb' svi', as ye'xh jatu la xaan ve't tu u q'ej toktoe', tan at ve't in sk'atz, tan ine' u txijun tetze' uva' la aq'on itiichajil u taanxelale',— ti'k u Jesús.
43008013	As ech tal ve't unq'a fariseo ile' te Aak: —An kuxh axh nayolon je' see'. Esti'e' uva' a' chit vayole' ye' la txakoni,— ti'k chajnaj.
43008014	As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —As k'uxh an kuxh in ni val je' vib', as jik chite' nunyolone', tan ootzimal sva'n uva' katil tzaanajkat in, as kati'ch unb'ene' la b'en in. Pet ech koj ex, tan ye' ootzimal seta'n kat tzaanajkat in, as katil la b'enkat in.
43008015	As vatz tx'ava'illa txumb'al kuxhe' neb'an svi' ti' eb'anat unsuuchil. Pet ech koj in, tan ye'l umaj uxhchil nunb'an isuuchil cheel.
43008016	Pet tul la unb'an isuuchil unq'a tename' as jik chite' la unb'an isuuchil, tan jit kuxh in la b'anon sunjunal. Pet ante' u chajol tzan vetze' la b'anon isuuchil,
43008017	tan ech ni tal u yol ile' uva' tz'ib'amal kan: «Tan asoj la ik'ul tib' iyol ka'vo'j uxhchil ti' umaj txumb'al, as la nimal viyole',» ti'k u yole'.
43008018	Esti'e' uva' jit kuxh in nunyolon je' svi'. Pet ante' vunB'aale' uve' kat chajon tzan in uve' ni alon u yole' svi',— ti'k u Jesús.
43008019	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Kech vab'aale' q'i uva' ni alon u yole' see'?— ti'k chajnaj. Ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ye' netexhla ab'iste u vijle'me'. ¿As a' kol chit vunB'aale' q'a la etexhla u tijle'me'? Tan asoj la etexhla uva' ab'iste u vijle'me', as ante' vunB'aale' la etexhla u tijle'me',— ti'k u Jesús.
43008020	As a' unq'a yole' uva' tal ve't Aak tul nik ichus ve't Aak unq'a uxhchile' vatz u tostiixhe' k'atz u atinb'ale' uva' nik imolpukat unq'a puaje' uva' nik toyal vatz u Tiixhe'. As eche' ab'il koj txeyon Aak, tan ti' uva' ye'xnik ilejat u q'iie' ti' uva' la txeypu ve't Aak.
43008021	As ech tal u Jesús ile': —La b'en in. As la echuk ve't in. As katil uve' la b'enkat in as eche' la koj uch etoon sunk'atz, tan a' vepaave' la eq'on ex tu u kamchile',— ti'k Aak.
43008022	As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile' svatzaj uva' nikat ich'o'n taama ti' u Jesús: —¿As kam ni tokkat viyol naje' uve' ni tale'? «Katil uve' la b'enkat in, as eche' la koj uch etoon sunk'atz,» taq' kuxh naj ni tale'. Kamal tuk kuxh iyatz' je' tib' naj sijunal uve' ni tale',— ti'k chajnaj.
43008023	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Echen vetxumb'ale' tzitza' vatz u tx'ava'e'. Pet ech koj in, tan a' tzaanajkat in tu almika'. As vatz tx'ava'illa txumb'al kuxhe' eq'omal seta'n. Pet ech koj in, tan jit vatz tx'ava'illa txumb'al eq'omal sva'n.
43008024	Ech ni valkate' sete tan an kuxh vepaave' la eq'on ex tu u kamchile', tan ti' uva' ye' kat enima uva' ab'iste u vijle'me' uve' ni val sete,— ti'k Aak.
43008025	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te Aak: —¿As kam eejle'm q'i uva' naale'?— ti'k chajnaj. Ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Jatpajux kuxh val u vijle'me' sete.
43008026	As nimatel unq'a yole' la val sete tul la unb'an esuuchil. As atoj sek'u'l uva' jik chit itxumb'al u chajol vetze'. As kam chit unq'a yole' uve' kat tal Aak sve as a'e' ni val sete. As ni val te unq'a tename' vatz u tx'ava'e' unpajte,— ti'k Aak.
43008027	As eche' nikat koj ipal unq'a uxhchile' tu u yole' uva' a' u Kub'aal Tiixhe' uve' nikat tal Aak.
43008028	Esti'e' uve' ech tal Aak ile': —As la etexhla ve't in uva' ab'iste u vijle'me' tul uva' la eteesa el in vatz u tx'ava'e'. As a'n la pal ve't ex stuul uva' ye'l umaj txumb'al nunb'an sunjunal. Pet a' unq'a yole' uve' ni vale' uve' kat ichus vunB'aale' sve, tan ine' .
43008029	As at chit vunB'aale' svi' uva' kat chajon tzan in. As ye'l in ni taq' kan in Aak sunjunal, tan nunb'ane' kam uva' b'a'n te Aak,— ti'k u Jesús.
43008030	As tul tal u Jesús u yole', as ye' saach unq'a tename' ik'ujb'a' ik'u'l ti' Aak.
43008031	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile' te unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni niman ve't Aak: —Asoj la enima unq'a yole' uva' ni val sete, as ex ve't unchusulib' la ib'ane'.
43008032	As la pal ve't ex stuul uva' kam isuuchil u jikla yole', tan a' u jikla yole' la q'alpun ex,— ti'k u Jesús.
43008033	As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile': —¿Kam ni tokkat vayole' uve' naale' ti' uva' la q'alpu ve't o'? Tan ye' atixoj ok o' sk'amil xe' umaj uxhchil, tan o' tiaal u Abraham,— ti'k chajnaj.
43008034	As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ile' jik chit tuk val isuuchil sete, tan jank'al unq'a uxhchile' uve' a' kuxh u paave' nib'ane', as a'e' ik'am u paave'.
43008035	As ye'l u k'ame' la koj jejeb' tu u kab'ale' xe' u b'aal kab'ale'. Pet ech koj u k'aolae', tan a' jejle'lkat k'atz vib'aale' tu u kab'ale' ti' chit ib'ene'.
43008036	Esti'e' ni val sete, tan asoj a' viK'aol u Tiixhe' la q'alpun ex, as q'alpinal chit ve't ex la ib'ane'.
43008037	As ootzimal sva'n uva' ex tiaal u Abraham. As netal ve't unkame', tan ti' uva' ye' nepal tu unq'a yole' uva' ni val sete.
43008038	As unq'a yole' uve' ni vale', as a'e' uva' k'uchel sve ta'n vunB'aale'. As ile' ni val sete. Echat kuxh ex unpajte, tan kam uve' netab'i ta'n veb'aale' as a'e' neb'ane',— ti'k u Jesús.
43008039	As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile': —O' tiaal u kub'aal Abraham,— ti'k chajnaj. Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ex koj tiaal u Abraham, as a' la eb'ane' uve' nik ib'an u Abraham.
43008040	Pet ech koj ex tan netal ve't unyatz'pe' ti' uva' kat val isuuchil u jikla yole' sete uva' kat tal u Tiixhe' sve. As ech koj kat ib'an u Abraham eche' uve' neb'ane',
43008041	tan a' kuxh neb'ane' kam uve' nib'an veb'aale',— ti'k Aak. As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¡Ye'l uva' sik'el tzan kuxh koj o' xe' pe'! Pet ootzimal Kub'aal sqa'n. As a' u Tiixhe' ta' u Kub'aale',— ti'k chajnaj.
43008042	As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —As a' koj chit u Tiixhe' veb'aale', as xo'n ine' sete tan k'atz u Tiixhe' tzaanajkat in. As eche' tuk' kuxh koj untxumb'al uva' kat ul in tzitza', pet Aake' kat chajon tzan in.
43008043	As tuk val sete kam sti' uve' ye' nepal tu vunyole' uve' ni vale', tan ti' uva' ye' nesa' etab'it vunyole',
43008044	tan a' u tx'i'lanaje' veb'aale'. As kam chit uva' nisa' veb'aale' as a'e' neb'ane', tan a'e' yatz'ol tetz unq'a uxhchile' b'axa yol. As echat chit nib'an cheel, tan ye'l u jikla txumb'ale' eq'omal sta'n. As tul niyolone' tuk' vichuli yolile', as a' vitxumb'ale' nik'uche', tan a' u tx'i'lanaje' cheesan tetz u chuli yole'.
43008045	Pet ech koj in tan ni valo'k u jikla yole' sete. As ye' nenima in.
43008046	Asoj jik chit unq'a yole' ni val sete, ¿as kam sti' q'i ye' nek'ujb'a' ek'u'l svi'? ¿Pet moj at umaj ex uva' la k'uchun sve ab'iste vunpaave'?
43008047	Tan ab'il uva' a' u Tiixhe' vib'aale', as aya'l chit ik'u'l nisa' inimat viyol u Tiixhe'. Pet ech koj ex, tan jit u Tiixhe' veb'aale'. Esti'e' ye' nesa' enimat viyol u Tiixhe',— ti'k u Jesús.
43008048	As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile': —An chite' vil uve' ni qal see', tan ¡ech axhe' aa Samaria! ¡As a' u sub'ule' ato'k sak'atz!— ti'k chajnaj.
43008049	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ye'l sub'ul ato'k sunk'atz. Pet a' vunB'aale' ta' ni voksa iq'ii. Pet ech koj ex, tan neteesa unq'ii.
43008050	As a' koj ni vale' uva' la oksal unq'ii seta'n. Pet at uma'l u oksan tetz unq'ii. As a'e' vunB'aale' uva' la b'anon esuuchil.
43008051	As ile' jik chit tuk val sete, tan ab'il uve' la niman vunyole' as ye'xh jatue' la kami,— ti'k Aak.
43008052	As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile': —¡Ile' kat qootzil ve't cheel uva' ato'k chit u sub'ule' sak'atz! Tan kat kam u Abraham tuk' unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe'. As naale' uva', «Ab'il la niman vunyole' as ye'xh jatue' la kami,» ch'axh naale'.
43008053	¿As ma nim aalchu ve't b'a ti' u kub'aal Abraham? Tan kat kam u Abraham. As kat kam unq'a q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe'. ¿Pet kam ve't u eejle'me' q'i uve' naale'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43008054	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Asoj an kuxh in la voksa je' unq'ii, as ye'l itxa'k vunyole'. Pet a' vunB'aale' ni oksan unq'ii. As an chit vunB'aale' ta' uve' «kuTiixh» ch'ex netal sti'.
43008055	As tul ye'l Tiixh at tu vetaanxelale'. Pet ech koj in, tan ootzimal chit Aak sva'n. As la koj vale' uva', «Ye' vootzaj Aak,» chaj koj in, tan at Aak sunk'atz. Asoj la vale' uva', «Ye' vootzaj Aak,» chaj in, as in chulin yole', eche' ex. Pet ootzimal Aak sva'n. As nimamal viyol Aake' sva'n.
43008056	Pet u Abraham uva' «kub'aal» ch'ex netal sti', as nikat ichiib' ve't aak svi'. As nikat itxuq'txun aak ti' itx'eb'lu u q'iie' ti' u vuleb'ale', tan na'lik vatz aak uva' la ul in,— ti'k u Jesús.
43008057	As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile': —Ye'l axh ta' ab'ane't lavoj toxk'al (50) yaab'. ¿As ma kat eel u Abraham b'a uve' naale'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43008058	Ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ile' jik chit tuk val sete, as tul ye'xnik itz'eb' u Abraham, as atik chit ine',— ti'k Aak.
43008059	As isik' ve't unq'a uxhchile' k'ub' ti' isutil ti' Aak. As imuj ve't tib' Aak ti' tel ch'u'l tu u tostiixhe' xo'l chajnaj.
43009001	As tul nikat ixaan u Jesús tu b'ey, as til ve't Aak uma'l u naj uva' tzotike stitz'eb'e'.
43009002	As ech tal ve't unq'a ichusulib' Aak ile': —¿Chusul, ab'il etz u paave' ti' uve' tzot vas naje' stitz'eb'e'? ¿Ma ipaav naj? ¿Pet moj ipaav u txutx b'aalae'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43009003	Ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Ye'le. Jit ipaav naje'. As jit ipaav vitxutx naje' tuk' vib'aal naje' uva' tzotik naj stitz'eb'e', pet aq'al uva' la ik'uch u Tiixhe' vib'a'nile' ti' naj. As esti'e' tzotik naj stitz'eb'e'.
43009004	As techal chit tuk unb'an unq'a b'a'nile' uva' tal tzan u chajol vetze' sve tul uva' ye'xnaj b'en q'ii, tan tul la ok aq'b'al, as ye'xheb'il la uch ve't taq'onve'.
43009005	As tul atiltel in vatz u tx'ava'e', as in txijun tetz u taanxelal unq'a uxhchile',— ti'k Aak.
43009006	As tzub'ik ve't ku' Aak tu tx'ava'. Ib'an ve't Aak unb'iil u suj. As toksa ve't ok Aak u suje' tzi' ivatz u tzote'.
43009007	As ech tal ve't Aak ile' te u tzote': —Kuxh tx'aa vavatze' tu u piilae' uve' Siloé,— ti'k Aak. As isuuchil u yole' uva' Siloé, uve' «chajel tzan.» As oora chit b'ex itx'aa ve't u tzote' vivatze' tu u a'e'. As tul q'aav ve't naj, as nik tilon ve't naj.
43009008	As unq'a uxhchile' uve' echen k'atz ikab'al naj tuk' unq'a uxhchile' uva' ootzinik tetz naj uva' tzotik naj, as ech tal ve't ile': —¿Ma jit u naje' uve' nikat ixoneb' ti' ijoyat ipuaj?— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
43009009	As at uxhchil nik alon: —Kano. Naje' ta',— ti'ke. As at jolte uva': —Ye'le. Jit naje'. As eela unb'iil tilon naj tuk' u tzote',— ti'ke. As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Ine' uva' inik tzot,— ti'k naj.
43009010	As ech tal ve't unq'a uxhchil ile' te naj: —¿Kam q'i uve' neelon ve't cheel?— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'.
43009011	Ech tal ve't u naj ile' uva' tzotike: —U naje' uva' Jesús ib'ii as kat ib'an unb'iil u suj. As kat toksa ok tzi' unvatz. As ech tal ile' sve, «Kuxh tx'aa vavatze' tu u a'e' uva' Siloé,» ti'k sve. As kat b'ex untx'aa ve't vunvatze'. As yak kuxh ilon ve't in,— ti'k u naje' uva' tzotike.
43009012	As ech tal unq'a uxhchil ile' te naj: —¿Kat atkat u naje' q'i?— ti'k unq'a uxhchile'. Ech tal ve't u naj ile' uva' tzotike: —Ye' vootzaj,— ti'k naj.
43009013	U naj uva' tzotike as eq'ol ve't ok naj vatz unq'a fariseo,
43009014	tan ti' uva' tu u xeem q'iie' uve' ib'an u Jesús u suje'. As ib'a'nxisa ve't Aak vivatz u naje'.
43009015	As ich'oti ve't unq'a fariseo te u naje' ti' uva' kam kat ib'an naj ti' uva' ni tilon ve't naj. As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Suj kuxhe' kat toksa tzi' unvatz. As tul kat b'ex untx'aa vunvatze', as kat ilon ve't in,— ti'k naj.
43009016	As ech tal ve't ka'l unq'a fariseo ile': —¡Junk'u! Tan a' texhlal tetz uva' jit xe' u Tiixhe' tzaanajkat u naje', tan nipaasa naj tzii tu u xeem q'iie',— ti'k chajnaj. Pet ech koj ka't chajnaj: —Asoj aapaav u naje', as ¿kam la tulb'e naj q'i ik'uchat umaj k'uchb'al tetz tijle'm u Tiixhe' eche' u vee'?— ti'k chajnaj. As nik tok ve't ixo'l chajnaj svatzaj ti' u Jesús.
43009017	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te u naje' uve' tzotike: —¿Kano axh q'i? ¿Kam ni tal aama ti' u naje' uve' kat b'a'nxisan vavatze'?— ti'k chajnaj. As ech tal ve't u naj ile': —Ni vale' uva' q'ajsan tetz viyol u Tiixhe' u naje',— ti'k naj.
43009018	Pet ech koj unq'a uxhchile' uva' nik ich'o'n taama ti' u Jesús, tan ye' nik inima uva' tzotik u naje', as nik tilon ve't naj. As b'ex mololoj ve't vitxutx naje' tuk' vib'aal naje'.
43009019	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile' te vitxutx naje' tuk' vib'aal naje': —¿Ma a' vak'aole' u vaa' tzotike stitz'eb'e' uve' ni tal unq'a tename'? ¿As kam kat ib'an naj uva' ni tilon ve't naj cheel?— ti'k chajnaj.
43009020	Ech tal ve't vitxutx naj ile' tuk' vib'aal naje': —Ta'n qootzajle uva' qetz naj, as tzotik naj stitz'eb'e'.
43009021	Pet ye' qootzaj kam kat ib'an naj uva' ni tilon ve't naj, as ab'il kat b'a'nxisan vivatz naje'. Pet ech'otitaj te naj. As an kuxh naje' tuk alon sete, tan tz'ajnajlu ve't iyaab' naj,— ti'k cha'ma.
43009022	Tan nikat ixo'v ve't cha'ma te unq'a iq'esal unq'a tename', tan ma'tik ik'ulat tib' iyol chajnaj uva' asoj ab'il la niman uva' a' u Cristo u Jesús, as la laq'b'al el tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh, uve' nikat tal chajnaj.
43009023	Esti'e' tal vitxutx u naje' tuk' vib'aal naje' uva': —Ech'otitaj te naj, tan tz'ajnajlu ve't iyaab' naj,— ti'k cha'ma.
43009024	As molol ve't u naje' uve' tzotike. As ech tal ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tenam ile' te naj: —Ye' eesa iq'ii u Tiixhe' tuk' u chuli yole', tan ile' ootzimal sqa'n uva' aapaave' u naje' uve' kat b'a'nxisan vavatze',— ti'k chajnaj.
43009025	As ech tal ve't naj ile': —Ye' vootzaj b'a asoj aapaav u naje' moj ye'le. Pet ta'n kuxh ootzimale' sva'n uva' inik tzot, as cheel il in ni vilon ve'te',— ti'k naj.
43009026	As ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿Kam q'i kat tulb'e axh naj ti' ib'a'nxisal vavatze'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43009027	As ech tal ve't u naj ile': —As valle' sete. As ye' kuxh ni tok vunyole' tevi'. ¿As kam q'i uva' nesa' etab'it unpajte? ¿Ma a' nesa' b'a uva' antu ve't ex la ok ex sichusulib' u naje'?— ti'k naj.
43009028	As yoq'on ve't chajnaj te u naje'. Ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¡Echen nooksakat eeb' k'atz naj! ¡Pet ech koj o', tan a' ni qoksakat qib' k'atz u Moisés!
43009029	As ootzimal sqa'n uva' kat yolon u Tiixhe' tuk' u Moisés, pet ech koj u naje' tan ye' qootzaj katil tzaanajkat naj,— ti'k chajnaj.
43009030	As ech tal ve't naj ile' te chajnaj: —¡Va'len kuxh eyolone'! Ye' etootzale katil tzaanajlukat Aak, as tul Aak kat b'a'nxisan vunvatze'.
43009031	As ootzimal sva'n setuk' uva' ye' ni tab'i u Tiixhe' viyol unq'a aapaave'. Pet ab'il uva' ni niman Aak as nib'ane' kam uva' ni tal Aak, as a' uxhchile' ni tab'i u Tiixhe' viyole'.
43009032	Pet ye' atixoj vab'i uva' at umaj uxhchil la ilon umaj tzot sta'n uva' tzotik stitz'eb'e'.
43009033	Asoj jit k'atz u Tiixhe' tzaanajkat, as ye'xhkam chite' la itx'ol ib'anata',— ti'k naj.
43009034	As ech tal ve't unq'a iq'esal unq'a tenam ile': —¡Axh chit uma'l u aapaav tul kat itz'eb' axh! ¿As la kol achuso'k tzan o' q'a uva' naale'?— ti'k chajnaj. As ilaq'b'a ve't el chajnaj vas naje' tu u atinb'ale' tetz nachb'al Tiixh.
43009035	As tul tab'i ve't u Jesús uva' ma'tik ilaq'b'al el tzan u naje', as ech tal ve't Aak ile' te naj tul ilej Aak naj: —¿Ma k'ujle'l ak'u'l ti' viK'aol u Tiixhe'?— ti'k Aak.
43009036	As ech tal ve't naj ile': —¿As ab'iste viK'aol u Tiixhe' q'i, ti' uva' la unk'ujb'a' unk'u'l sti'?— ti'k naj.
43009037	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —As ootzimal ve'te' a'n, tan ine' uve' nunyolon see,— ti'k Aak.
43009038	Ech tal ve't naj ile': —¡Tuk unk'ujb'a' ve't unk'u'l see'!— ti'k naj. As ku' ve't naj qaaloj vatz Aak.
43009039	As ech tal ve't Aak ile': —Esti'e' kat ul in vatz u tx'ava'e' ti' ul unjatxat ixo'l unq'a uxhchile', tan la ilon ve't unq'a uxhchile' uva' ye' ni tilone'. Pet ech koj unq'a uxhchile' uve' ni tilone' ni tale', as a'e' uva' tzot ve'te',— ti'k Aak.
43009040	As tul tab'i ve't ka'l unq'a fariseo, as ech tal ve't chajnaj ile': —¿As ma o' tzot b'a uve' naale'?— ti'k chajnaj.
43009041	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —Ex koj tzot, as ye'l epaave' ati. Pet ti' uva' netale' uva', «Ni qilone',» ch'ex netale', as esti'e' uve' eq'omal vepaave' seta'n,— ti'k u Jesús.
43010001	As ech tal ve't u Jesús ile': —As jik chit tuk vale', tan ab'il uva' jit'e'ch tok tzi' ipe' unq'a kaneero'e' asoj ech tok vi' u pe'e', as a'e' u elq'ome'.
